Job Title: Store Manager (Retail - Aeon Mall Long Bien Hanoi)
Company: Kkv Vietnam
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Đồng phục', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: 1. Sales Management: • Based on the monthly target issued by the headquarters, manage the store sales and profit indicator; • Track the performance and regularly do data analysis and improvement; • Control cost and maintain sensitive analysis of competing products. 2. Store Management: • Pay attention to the shopping environment and store safety before and after the store, and effectively manage the safety of store assets. 3. Product Management: • Responsible for inventory management such as daily inventory and product expiration date checking; • Develop a loss prevention plan to reduce store losses; • Analyze store product data to plan improvements and increase sales. 4. Display Management: • Inspect and manage the display of goods according to the display standard, supervise the implementation of store display work, and feedback on problems. 5. Training Management: • Responsible for the training and ensuring service management of store personnel, managing customer service feedback, and flexibly handling customer complaints to maintain brand image. 6. Financial Management: • Follow up and deal with the payment and tax work in the store; • Supervise the security of the payment and self-inspection of the store; • Formulate anti-theft measures to supervise the implementation of the store. 7. Personnel Management: • Responsible for the selection, use, teaching, and retention of store employees; • Ensure the staffing of the store, and the construction of the store personnel echelon in, timely training the company's standards and systems to the store staff; • Supervise the implementation of the work, timely summary, feedback, and optimization suggestions. 8. Cultural Management: • Deeply understand the company's information policy; • Promote and implement the company's corporate culture; • Build a good store culture to achieve simplicity and efficiency. 9. Recruitment and Training of new retail staff
Job Requirements: • Bachelor’s degree is preferred; • At least 3 years of experience in store management in the retail industry, especially newly set up retail stores (from 700m2). Preferable candidate from large scale (from 15 staffs) and fast retail company; • Strong data analysis ability, able to grasp the data contacted in the process of store management, including turnover-related data, attrition rate, turnover rate, promotion ratio, etc; • Strong overall planning ability, data statistics, induction, analysis and application ability, workflow and standard formulation ability, commodity analysis and adjustment ability, visual display ability, and keen risk management awareness; • Follow company regional deployment and identify with the company's corporate culture and values. Willing to relocate or travel outstation to other stores; • Able to work on rotating retail operation hours including weekends and public holidays; • Proficient in English (4 skills), and Chinese is a priority (directly report to Chinese Manager); • Expected onboarding date: the middle of February
Industry: Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh

Experience From 1 to 2 years of experience in a similar role, preferably in the food & beverage/ retail industry. Job Title: Cv/Cvc/Cvcc Lập Trình Tích Hợp Dữ Liệu (Sql/Plsql Developer)
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Chứng Khoán Asean
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Du Lịch', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: Phân tích yêu cầu nghiệp vụ, thiết kế lập trình chuyển đổi dữ liệu từ các cơ sở dữ liệu giao dịch về kho hợp nhất ODS (Operational Data Store). Thiết kế, xây dựng kho dữ liệu Data Warehouse, Data mart. Xây dựng và phát triển các hệ thống lưu trữ dữ liệu lớn (Big Data), các tiến trình đồng bộ dữ liệu thời gian thực (real-time) và streaming dữ liệu (streaming processing, stream analytics) Xây dựng, phát triển các công cụ khai thác dữ liệu lớn, xử lý, chuyển đổi dữ liệu lớn và quản trị dữ liệu lớn. Tìm hiểu, phân tích, đánh giá và xử lý các nguồn dữ liệu; xây dựng các phương án kết nối dữ liệu đúng logic, nhanh và ổn định Thực hiện các tiến trình ETL/ELT vào vùng ODS, model testing để đảm bảo dữ liệu đúng ý nghĩa. Xây dựng và cập nhật các bộ tài liệu để các đội phân tích dễ dàng sử dụng DW Kiểm soát khả năng hoạt động của DWH, theo dõi và giải quyết ngay khi có sự cố phát sinh Triển khai các ứng dụng phân tích trên BI, tạo báo cáo theo yêu cầu kinh doanh của Công ty.
Job Requirements: Tốt ngiệp Đại học trở lên các chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin, Hệ thống thông tin quản lý,... Có kinh nghiệm làm việc về Data Warehouse, BI, Data Lake, Big Data Có kiến thức, kinh nghiệm thực tế về hệ sinh thái Hadoop, các nền tảng NoSQL (MongoDB, Redis, Cassandra,..), các công cụ xử lý và chuyển đổi dữ liêu lớn, đặc biệt là nền tảng Cloudera và Confluent. Tư duy/khả năng lập trình tốt và có kỹ năng phân tích hệ thống. Có kiến thức, kỹ năng tốt về hệ quản trị CSDL Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng các tool Data Warehouse và BI, như: Oracle Warehouse Builder, OBIEE, ODI, Tableau, Power BI, SSIS, Informatica , … Khả năng viết câu lệnh SQL (Oracle), tuning hiệu quả. Biết lập trình Python, Java hoặc Scala là lợi thế.
Industry: Ngân hàng , Chứng khoán , CNTT - Phần mềm

Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Thương Mại Dịch Vụ Sản Xuất Hương Thủy
Job Description: 1. Collect and analyze sales data for reporting the sales situation of every brand - Collecting and updating sales data of GT customers from the admin team every day - Analysing sales data available to give the weekly detailed plan and monthly detailed plan for reminding PIC on distribution situation based on sales data of the GT channel extracted from the system. + Store coverage of each GT customer and ask sales to visit + Visit and Collect the display of each store by picture, and advise the improvement based on the data and pictures of each store. + Deploy the display and promotion activities is the best way for GT retailers to achieve stable and enough offtake from consumers + Control the inventory of each store, and ask for updates if any 2. Find out the problems in sales operations and suggest a suitable solution to improve management - Based on the analysis to make the weekly report of problem on selling, delivering, stock, coverage at store and give the suggestion to solve problem - Based on the problem with evidence to give the action plan with a timeline, the person in charge of improving sales volume and management in accordance with the brand - Give process, form, and evaluation for managing the progress of each item and confirm the final result until each item is completed. 3. Planning Execution -In charge of training for sales department (GT) and sub-distributor an and organize training plan in quarterly, and yearly for sales team sales techinic, knowledge of product, data management, skills for ASM, SS, SR, and distributor and GT retailer. - Organize sub-distributor meeting one time /year. To create relationship with each NPP and do sharing company strategy, sales plan for each brand, - Set up and maintain an effective field coaching system for the sales team in line with business requirements. 4. Planning audit team - The audit team is seprated organization with sales team, to check whether Sales staff and NPP, W/S is following guidelines or not. Such like Customer data, Discount apply, Inventory report is correct or not, how to avoid cheating 5. Temporary assignment for Non-Food Sales team (assignment until recruit sales manager for Non-Food) -Now Huong Thuy launch new sales team which sales mainly non food product, however still sales operation is not smooth and facing many trouble. - co-work with current RSM and ASM and MKT, Supplier, find out current issue and suggest improvement idea, also handle until solve each problem. 6 . Other tasks assigned by BOD
Job Requirements: - University with a Business Administration/ Marketing/ Economic major - At least 05 years of experience in sales and Marketing / Sales operation management for GT Channel - Sales data analyzing skill - English Communication B or over - Planning skills - Problem-solving skills
Industry: Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh

Job Title: Category Pricing Executive (Chuyên Viên Kiểm Soát Giá)
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần King Food Market
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Đào tạo', 'Nghỉ phép năm']
Job Description: Job Summary: We are looking for a detail-oriented and proactive Category Pricing Executive to join our dynamic team within the grocery retail sector. In this role, you will be responsible for supporting the development, implementation, and monitoring of pricing strategies to ensure competitive pricing, profitability, and consistency across our product range. You will work closely with cross-functional teams and help maintain a robust pricing system that aligns with market trends and business objectives. Key Responsibilities: Pricing Data Management : Support the management of pricing data across all grocery product categories, ensuring accuracy and consistency in pricing records and systems. Price Monitoring : Assist in monitoring and reviewing pricing across different stores and online platforms. Ensure prices are updated according to agreed pricing structures, seasonal promotions, and market trends. Competitive Analysis : Assist in gathering competitor pricing data through regular market research, evaluating the competitive landscape to identify pricing opportunities and risks. Promotions & Discounts : Support the implementation of promotional pricing, discounts, and special offers. Ensure that these are correctly applied in the system and on store shelves in alignment with the pricing strategy. Price Adjustments & Updates : Assist in implementing and tracking regular price adjustments in response to cost changes, competitor activity, or market conditions, ensuring timely updates to product prices. Reporting & Documentation : Prepare regular reports on pricing performance, including pricing trends, competitive positioning, and sales impacts. Provide insights and recommendations based on data analysis to help optimize pricing strategies. System Support : Assist with the maintenance and updating of pricing systems, ensuring smooth integration with other retail management systems (e.g., inventory, sales tracking) and accurate pricing execution. Price Compliance : Help monitor and ensure compliance with internal pricing policies, legal regulations, and company guidelines. Assist in identifying and addressing pricing discrepancies or errors. Collaboration : Work closely with category managers, procurement, sales, and finance teams to support pricing decisions, promotions, and cost structures that align with business objectives.
Job Requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Economics, Marketing, or a related field. At least 2 years of experience in pricing control, retail pricing, or a related analytical role. Experience in the grocery retail or FMCG (Fast-Moving Consumer Goods. Strong analytical skills with a good understanding of pricing strategy and market dynamics. Proficient in Microsoft Excel and other data analysis tools (e.g., Power BI, Tableau). Detail-oriented with a high degree of accuracy in managing and updating pricing data. Proactive attitude with a focus on problem-solving and improving processes.
Industry: Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ , Thực phẩm & Đồ uống , Tài chính / Đầu tư

Ability to work independently, take initiative, and manage tasks effectively. Proficiency in task management tools like Jira or similar.

You'll be responsible for administrative tasks, order processing, customer service, and data management. Your strong organizational skills, attention to detail, and ability to collaborate effectively with others will be essential to your success. Administrative Support: Provide administrative support to the sales team, including order processing, documentation, and data entry. Customer Service: Respond to customer inquiries, resolve issues, and ensure high customer satisfaction and support after-sales service processes. Salesforce CRM: Manage and update the CRM system to optimize customer data, supporting cross-selling and upselling strategies. Analyze customer data from CRM & Digital Engagement Metrics to improve conversion rates. Process Improvement & ERP Implementation: Participate in projects aimed at improving operational efficiency, including order automation, delivery tracking, and inventory optimization. Order Fulfillment: Coordinate with internal teams (technicians,operations, logistics) to ensure smooth order fulfillment, delivery, ensure timely resolution. Reporting: Prepare sales reports and presentations for internal and external stakeholders.
Job Requirements: Experience 1-2 years in Sales Admin, Services Admin, Customer Service roles Proficiency in Salesforce CRM, Microsoft Office Suite, and other relevant software Excellent communication and customer service skills. Strong data analysis to support decision-making. Ability in English is a plus. Teamwork ability, manage multiple tasks, and administrative skills.
Industry: Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Dịch vụ khách hàng

Company: Công Ty Tnhh Dệt Liên Châu
Job Description: Key Responsibilities: Data Analysis : Analyze historical sales, market trends, promotional data, and customer feedback to create accurate demand forecasts. Collaboration : Work with sales, marketing, and supply chain teams to gather insights and incorporate them into demand forecasts. Forecast Modeling : Develop and maintain statistical forecasting models using analytics tools to recognize demand patterns. Trend Identification : Monitor market trends and competitor activities, adjusting forecasts based on external factors. Inventory Optimization : Evaluate inventory levels to minimize stockouts and excess inventory through effective stock management. Performance Monitoring : Track forecast accuracy and KPIs to identify improvement areas and implement necessary changes. Scenario Analysis : Conduct scenario planning to evaluate risks and opportunities related to demand changes. Process Improvement : Identify and implement enhancements in demand planning processes and tools to achieve operational excellence. Required Skills: Analytical Skills : Strong analytical abilities with proficiency in data analysis tools and statistical modeling are essential. Communication Skills : Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively across departments. Business Acumen : Understanding of market dynamics and their effects on demand is important. Software Proficiency : Proficiency in forecasting software and ERP systems is necessary for effective analysis. Trend Identification : Ability to discern trends and patterns within complex datasets is essential for accurate forecasting. By fulfilling these responsibilities and leveraging the required skills, a Demand Planning Analyst can significantly contribute to a company’s operational efficiency and inventory management strategy.
Job Requirements: - Responsible for analyzing historical sales data, market trends, and customer insights to develop accurate demand forecasts, collaborating closely with sales, marketing, and supply chain teams to gather relevant information and ensure optimal inventory levels by predicting future product demand, ultimately aiming to minimize stockouts and excess inventory while maximizing operational efficiency
Industry: Sản xuất / Vận hành sản xuất , Dệt may / Da giày / Thời trang

Job Title: Nhân Viên Sale Admin - Mạnh Phân Tích Số Liệu
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Bw Japan
Job Description: I - Trách nhiệm - Chịu trách nhiệm tổng hợp phân tích số liệu kinh doanh, hiệu quả bán hàng của các kênh và kiểm soát hiệu quả kinh doanh của Công ty - Chịu trách nhiệm về tính trung thực, chính xác của thông tin cung cấp và trao đổi, báo cáo trong quá trình thực hiện công việc. - Những trách nhiệm về tài sản, công cụ dụng cụ mà công ty trang bị. II - Mô tả công việc 1. Theo dõi, tổng hợp phân tích các số liệu kinh doanh, hiệu quả bán hàng của các kênh - Xây dựng hệ thống tổng hợp và theo dõi kết quả kinh doanh, hiệu quả bán hàng của các kênh. - Phân tích số liệu, lập bảng so sánh và báo cáo định kỳ về các số liệu bán hàng, mức độ hoàn thành so với chỉ tiêu, chi phí bán hàng của từng kênh, theo từng mã hàng, tỷ lệ hàng hoàn ... - Phân tích báo cáo tình hình bán hàng của NPP, Cửa hàng, các khu vực kinh doanh và đề xuất giải pháp kịp thời. - Theo dõi, báo cáo định kỳ chi phí bán hàng của từng kênh. - Phân tích doanh thu, xu hướng tăng trưởng doanh số theo nhóm hàng, đưa ra các cảnh báo, khuyến nghị. Đưa ra các thông tin dự báo về mức độ tiêu thụ sản phẩm của cửa hàng, các kênh phân phối ... 2. Kiểm soát kế hoạch bán hàng và các hoạt động kinh doanh, hỗ trợ bán hàng của Công ty - Phối hợp với các bộ phận Kinh doanh, phòng Kế hoạch, Kế toán và các phòng ban liên quan kiểm soát hoạt động bán hàng. - Kiểm soát kế hoạch bán hàng, đặt hàng của các bộ phận Kinh doanh và điều chỉnh kịp thời. Tham mưu, góp ý về kế hoạch sản xuất thành phẩm của Công ty. - Theo dõi tốc độ bán hàng và thúc giục các kênh bán hàng. Theo dõi tình hình kinh doanh mã hàng mới, mã hàng cũ, thông báo bộ phận Kinh doanh thúc đẩy. Kịp thời đề xuất kế hoạch đẩy hàng, xả hàng. - Tham mưu, phối hợp hợp bộ phận Kinh doanh xây dựng các chính sách bán hàng, chương trình khuyến mại, đồng thời kiểm soát việc thực hiện và tuân thủ của bộ phận Kinh doanh. 3. Tìm hiểu, phân tích thị trường, đối thủ cạnh tranh và đề xuất các biện pháp cải tiến. 4. Báo cáo công việc theo quy định và thực hiện các công việc hỗ trợ, quản lý theo chỉ đạo của Chủ tịch.
Job Requirements: - Nam/Nữ từ 25 - 40 tuổi, tốt nghiệp đại học các chuyên ngành Kinh tế, QTKD, Kế toán, Phân tích số liệu..hoặc các chuyên ngành có liên quan - Có từ 01 năm kinh nghiệm làm Sale admin, Trưởng nhóm sale admin, Data analyst... trở lên tại các công ty hoạt động trong mô hình bán lẻ, bán buôn (FMCG) - Mạnh về Phân tích số liệu, kiểm soát số liệu bán hàng, hiệu quả kinh doanh - Kỹ năng nghề nghiệp: Kỹ năng tổng hợp, phân tích, thống kê, báo cáo, số liệu. Kỹ năng giao tiếp và làm việc nhóm. Kỹ năng thuyết trình, đào tạo, hướng dẫn và huấn luyện - Cẩn thận, chi tiết, quan tâm tới mức độ chính xác, trách nhiệm cao đối với công việc. - Thành thạo tin học văn phòng (công cụ phân tích số liệu).
Industry: Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh

Job Description: The Quality Assurance/ Quality Control Manager, or QA/QC manager, oversees quality standards to ensure the company delivers the highest quality goods or services. Quality Assurance Managers stay on top of the latest laws and regulations that impact products. Handling data related to quality to analyze the company’s performance as well as quality reports and documentation that are required as part of the QA procedures. Establishing and implementing the quality standards for products or services Monitoring quality testing and identifying gaps in the testing Staying current on laws and regulations to ensure compliance Overseeing the quality assurance team Training other employees on quality procedures Handling quality reports and documentation Collecting and analyzing quality assurance data Working with suppliers to ensure the quality of supplies
Job Requirements: Minimum 4 years experience in the same role. (Fashion Retail Industry is highly preferred.) Strong attention to detail and organizational skills Critical thinking skills Interpersonal and communication skills Strong ability with numbers and data analysis skills Technical skills and comfort with databases and report-generation software Understanding of quality assurance processes and standards Leadership and teaching skills

Job Title: Senior Customer Experience Specialist - Nps Projects
Company: Công Ty Cp Vàng Bạc Đá Quý Phú Nhuận - Pnj
Job Description: Position Overview The Senior Customer Experience Specialist will lead the design, implementation, and analysis of the Net Promoter Score (NPS) framework to measure and enhance customer experience. This role focuses on customer journey mapping, developing measurement methods, analyzing CX trends, and driving actionable insights to improve performance and strategic outcomes. Key Responsibilities 1. NPS Project Management Identify, evaluate, and collaborate with partners to develop and implement NPS solutions. Design and deploy effective methods for measuring customer experience at critical touchpoints. Monitor and maintain NPS systems, ensuring reliable and actionable data collection. 2. Customer Journey Mapping Analyze and map customer journeys to identify key touchpoints, pain points, and areas for improvement. Develop detailed journey insights to optimize customer engagement and satisfaction. 3. Market Analysis and Trend Application Research and analyze customer experience best practices and trends in the Southeast Asia region. Benchmark against competitors and integrate global CX trends into strategic planning. 4. Performance Measurement and Monitoring Track and analyze key NPS metrics to identify issues and trends that impact customer experience. Use insights to pinpoint improvement opportunities and optimize performance. 5. Actionable CX Recommendations Translate NPS data into actionable insights and provide recommendations to the CX Project Team. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement solutions that enhance customer experience and drive business growth.
Job Requirements: Key Qualifications Education: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Customer Experience, or a related field. Experience: 3-5 years of experience in customer experience, project management, or data analysis. Hands-on experience with NPS frameworks or similar measurement methodologies is preferred. Skills: Strong project management and organizational skills. Analytical mindset with expertise in data interpretation and report generation. Excellent communication and presentation skills for cross-functional collaboration. Proficiency in CX tools and data visualization platforms (e.g., Power BI, Excel). Key Competencies Analytical skills to derive actionable insights from NPS data. Strategic thinking to align NPS outcomes with business objectives. Collaborative mindset to work with internal teams and external partners. Proactive problem-solving with a focus on continuous improvement. Reporting Structure Reports to: Customer Experience Manager or CX Department Head. Works closely with: CX Project Teams, Marketing, and Operations. Benefits Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses. Opportunities for professional development in CX strategy and project management. Collaborative and dynamic work environment.
Industry: Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Dịch vụ khách hàng

Strong understanding of Google Ads, Bing Ads, Meta, LinkedIn, TikTok and social media advertising platforms. Proficiency in analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics) and experience in data analysis & reporting on ad performance. Excellent attention to detail and the ability to manage multiple campaigns simultaneously. Strong analytical skills and a data-driven approach to decision-making. Excellent communication skills and the ability to work effectively in a team environment. Proficiency in English. Google Ads certification or similar qualifications.

Collect and analyze to point out the risk & opportunity and come up proposal to management team. Data monitor and ensure C1/C2 program achievement. Update and share targets vs actual per region. Responsible in monitoring key strategy segment Fungicide/ Insecticide/ Herbicide/ Bio/ Plant growth regulator. 2. External: a. Sell-out Target Setting in detail per region/ per Area Sales Manager (ASM)/Agronomist Sales Executive (ASE) and Reports Generation & Analysis. Provides sell-out targets to Regional Agronomist Sales Manager (RASM). b. Monitors & analyzes sell-out data. Maintains and analyzes critical sales & product KPI scorecards/dashboard to understand trend. c. Develop optimal coverage plan/working plan for RASM/ASM/ASE/Retailer mapping). d. Review / deliver feedback market information to the HoS & HoM/HoO to improve performance per region product KPI meeting to align objective of team (Initiative, update status, market insight). e. Market visit checking to evaluate region performance / giving action plan for improvement. f. Ensure effective implementation of CROP calendar for Field Force. g. Managing the ongoing development and implementation of the Field Force, responsible for Field Force Capability Enhancement. 3. Sales Generation and Reports Management: a. Market Sensing, Retailer Mapping, Price & Stocks Monitoring and other relevant periodic reports are important to be submitted timely. Identifies and drives execution of retailer opportunities. Responsible for retailer budget planning, analysis and reporting. Identifies, develops plans and analyses appropriate retailer investment to drive sell-out. b. Works closely with product marketing team on product launch planning.

Provide data to help the Board of Directors decide issues related to the Category Frequent contact with relevant departments, update fluctuations in costs, prices, sales ... interact with the department to process information effectively. Analyze the sales, cost factors that affect profitability over a monthly, quarterly, or annual plan (launch/re-launch), forecast risk, opportunity Present financial plan for the commodity sector. Company: Công Ty Tnhh Wind Supply Chain One (Việt Nam)
Job Description: 1. Warehouse On-Site Process Management: • Formulate, monitor, and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) of the warehouse, ensuring timely improvements are made by third parties. The four major KPIs include: o Timely receipt rate o Timely delivery rate o Inventory accuracy rate o Delivery accuracy rate • Oversee safety, 5S (Sort, Set in order, Shine, Standardize, Sustain), inventory checks, and ensure standardized operations at the warehouse managed by third parties. • Monitor third-party efficiency, personnel attrition rate, and changes in core management personnel. • Maintain close communication with regional warehouse management and corresponding professional line management at the headquarters to issue and train on system requirements. • Identify opportunities for process optimization, lead pilot summaries of on-site operational micro-innovations, and provide feedback. • Cooperate with the management department to verify expense settlement data. • Check monthly expense settlements with third-party vendors. 2. Communication with Various Functional Areas of Business: • Procurement: Coordinate and handle returns and receipt exceptions. • Stock Control/Supply Chain: Manage business demand planning and inventory. • Carrier: Coordinate capacity demand and scheduling. • Store: Address discrepancies and process related documentation. • Technical Support: Report and track abnormal situations, including system fault tolerance and optimization. • Finance: Supervise on-site confirmation of profit and loss disposal, and confirm the settlement of value-added service fees. • Quality Control: Handle temporary reports and assess abnormal situations. • Other Temporary Work: Perform ad hoc tasks as needed
Job Requirements: • Education: college degree or above. • Professional experience: More than 2 years of experience in large-scale warehouse management, familiar with ERP, WMS, OFFICE operations, strong data analysis ability, logical language expression ability, • Strong communication skills. • Experience in team management of more than 50 people, Walmart, Carrefour, Darunhua, Meiyijia and other large supermarket warehousing work experience is preferred

Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Đồng phục', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: I. Compensation Management Compensation System Construction : Lead the implementation and continuous optimization of the compensation and benefits system. Regularly conduct comprehensive market research and competitiveness analysis to ensure that the compensation system has internal fairness and external competitiveness, attracting and retaining core talents. Compensation Issuance and Execution : Coordinate the salary calculation and payment across multiple business segments of the group to ensure the accuracy and timeliness of salary disbursement. Be responsible for the preparation of the annual labor cost budget and carry out dynamic management and control, keeping the annual labor cost within ±[X]% of the budget. Benefits Compliance Management : Rigorously review the operation of social security, provident fund, and the distribution of various welfare subsidies to ensure full compliance with national and local relevant policies and regulations. Guarantee data accuracy to avoid potential risks. Meanwhile, closely collaborate with the finance department to regularly verify labor cost data and ensure the consistency of financial data. II. Performance Management Full - cycle Performance Closed - loop : Establish a scientific and effective performance management system. Develop personalized assessment plans based on the company's strategic goals and promote organizational performance transformation. Continuously monitor the application of assessment results to ensure that performance appraisal is closely integrated with employee incentives, promotions, training, etc., achieving a [X]% improvement in the company's overall performance through performance transformation. Performance Dispute Resolution : Take the lead in performance interviews and dispute mediation, deeply understand employees' demands, and output reasonable suggestions for job transfer and salary adjustment. Actively promote the implementation of performance incentive policies to stimulate employees' enthusiasm and creativity. At the same time, maintain close communication with business departments and adjust performance indicators in a timely manner according to business changes. III. System Operation and Maintenance Digital Tool Empowerment : Be responsible for the stable operation of the attendance and performance systems, and promptly handle data anomalies. Actively promote the online process of human resources management to improve work efficiency and data accuracy and reduce manual operation errors.
Job Requirements: Hard Requirements Educational Background : A bachelor's degree or above in human resources, economics, or related fields. Experience Requirements : More than 3 years of overall management experience in compensation and performance, with rich experience in designing multi - format compensation systems. Language Proficiency : English is the working language. Proficiency in written and spoken English is required for daily communication Core Competencies Professional Proficiency : Proficient in compensation research methodologies and data analysis tools (such as calculating compensation percentile values), and capable of independently completing complex compensation data analysis. Master labor laws, social security policies, and performance appraisal tools (OKR, KPI, BSC, etc.). Compliance and Risk Control : Possess a keen sense of compensation audit, be able to anticipate and effectively avoid labor dispute risks, and ensure the legal and compliant operation of the company. Data - driven : Good at cost - reduction and efficiency - improvement through labor cost modeling, and optimize compensation and performance strategies using data analysis. Soft Skills : Have excellent communication skills to effectively communicate compensation and performance - related matters with employees at all levels; strong team management skills to lead the team to complete various tasks; outstanding project management skills to ensure the smooth progress of projects such as performance transformation. Benefits Competitive salary and benefits, negotiated based on skills and experience. Social insurance contributions are based on the full gross salary. Full compliance with Vietnam Labor Law, including contributions to social, health, and unemployment insurance. Annual leave and public holiday entitlements according to the regulations of the Vietnamese government. A dynamic, professional, and friendly work environment with ample opportunities for growth and advancement. Working Hours: Monday to Saturday Monday to Friday: from 08:30 to 17:30. Saturday: from 09:00 to 17:00.
Industry: Nhân sự

Company: Highlands Coffee
Job Description: Brief summary of job profile: This role is responsible for: Leading the Supply Chain customer care operations team to provide the best service to stores and customers Ensuring right stock availability, right time, and right quality Monitoring data and metrics to drive operational efficiency and cost-effectiveness Key Accountabilities: 1. Planning and Budgeting Develop a comprehensive plan of the customer care operations team to support the seamless integration and optimization of purchasing, logistics, and store operations Propose the budget, resources allocation, priorities setting, and oversee the execution of the plan & budget management Continuously evaluate and refine the plan & budget based on changing market conditions and customer demands Track and manage key supply chain efficiency metrics, such as cost-to-serve, to identify opportunities for optimization and cost reduction 2. Operational & Inventory Management Oversee the day-to-day supply chain operations, including monitoring inventory management processes, managing the order fulfillment process, and ensuring accurate PO placement and pricing to maintain optimal stock availability and achieve targeted on-time and in-full (OTIF) delivery performance at stores Drive continuous improvement across end-to-end order management lifecycle, identifying root causes for performance gaps and delivering results through scalable solutions Identify and implement best practices to optimize inventory management, distribution, and product availability Partner with QA/QC to ensure compliance with relevant policies, regulations, and industry standards (labeling, Halal, ingredient content…) Facilitate new product rollouts, LTOs, deletions, and transitions with distributors and suppliers. Identify risks and propose solutions to support supply in meeting demand Gather and incorporate customer feedback to enhance the overall customer experience 3. Supply Chain Stakeholder Management Serve as the primary point of contact for stores to address all supply chain-related issues, collaborating with cross-functional teams (including store operations, procurement, and suppliers) to resolve problems Drive the collaboration with Procurement key sourcing activities, milestones and manage supplier relationship to provide a steady supply, availability and efficient production lead times maintaining brand specifications Develop partnerships across key stakeholders including Store Operations, Marketing, Product Innovation, Planning and Finance to leverage best practices and create cross-functional alignment Lead the implementation of administrative processes and procedures to ensure smooth day-to-day operations of the function
Job Requirements: Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Supply Chain, Logistics or a related field 07+ years of experience in supply chain operations, customer care or retail management Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to interpret data, make data-driven decisions and perform root cause analysis Strong customer & result orientation, emphasis on service quality, and ability to adapt Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills; conflict resolution skills Respond quickly to urgent situations Excellent organizational skills, ability to prioritize tasks and meet constant deadlines with strong attention to detail and quality control Fluent English in Speaking and Writing
Industry: Vận chuyển / Giao nhận / Kho vận

Job Description: Thực hiện giám sát truy cập vào các hệ thống cơ sở dữ liệu, bao gồm định nghĩa, thiết kế, phân quyền, thực hiện kiểm tra các ngoại lệ của toàn bộ các hệ thống; Xây dựng và kiểm soát các quy tắc an ninh cho các hệ thống dữ liệu và phần mềm; Quản lý mật khẩu các user đặc quyền trên các hệ thống; Quản lý và cập nhật quyền truy cập kho dữ liệu Data-Warehouse, ODI, môi trường Production và môi trường Test; Đảm bảo các phương pháp mã hóa phù hợp cho các dữ liệu của tổ chức với các mục đích sử dụng khác nhau; Rà soát và đảm bảo bảo mật cho hệ thống CSDL; Xây dựng và quản trị hệ thống cơ sở dữ liệu đáp ứng nhu cầu cân bằng tải, sẵn sàng hoạt động; Turning hệ thống thường xuyên, đảm bảo performance cho toàn hệ thống.
Job Requirements: Bằng cấp & Kinh nghiệm chuyên môn: Bằng cử nhân về khoa học máy tính hoặc chuyên ngành liên quan; Có từ 3 năm kinh nghiệm CNTT liên quan; Có ít nhất 2 năm kinh nghiệm quản trị toàn bộ hệ thống trong môi trường Cơ sở dữ liệu SQLServer, Oracle; Có chứng chỉ OCA, OCP của Oracle, MS SQL Server hoặc tương đương là một lợi thế; Kiến thức nhưng không giới hạn về MySQL, MongoDB... Kiến thức và kỹ năng: Có kinh nghiệm trong phân tích điều chỉnh hiệu suất và đo điểm chuẩn; Có khả năng nghiên cứu, đánh giá, cập nhật và tiếp cận công nghệ mới; Khả năng giao tiếp và diễn đạt vấn đề tốt; Khả năng giải quyết vấn đề; Kỹ năng nghiên cứu và đề xuất áp dụng các tính năng, công nghệ mới; Tiếng anh: Bằng B trở lên, ưu tiên ứng viên có chứng chỉ tiếng Anh quốc tế: TOEIC, TOEFL, IELTS,... Lương thưởng: 30-40tr/tháng

Company: Wall Street English
Job Description: Key purpose of the role: The Group Technology Director is a key leadership role responsible for shaping and executing the technology strategy of Asia Strategic Holdings Group. This position ensures that the Group adopts scalable, cost-effective, and innovative system solutions that align with business objectives, drive efficiency, and support long-term growth. The role involves leading digital transformation initiatives, optimizing system processes, and ensuring seamless integration of technologies across all business units. A critical focus is placed on data governance, cybersecurity, and business intelligence , ensuring that data is secure, accessible, and leveraged for strategic decision-making . The Group Technology Director will work closely with executive leadership and key stakeholders to enhance the organization's technology infrastructure, analytics capabilities, and digital innovation roadmap across all operations. 1. Software technology strategy · Engage with the key business stakeholders within the ASIA Group and identify the key technology needs to support the organization’s operations and drive performance · Lead the innovation discussions across the ASIA Group and provide guidance on the realistic possibilities offered by technology to enable operational efficiency for the organization · Align with ASIA Group COO on the technology priorities and develop a quarterly and annual technology roadmap adapted to short-term and long-term objectives of the organization · Enable scalability by leveraging technology platforms across Business Units when relevant and drive efficiency through system integration across the ASIA Group 2. Technology ecosystem innovation, design, configuration and deployment · Map and manage the various technology ecosystems across the Group through architecture diagrams and IT audits · Identify technology gaps in the ecosystem and advise key stakeholders accordingly with clear business cases, including ROI analysis, risk assessments, and implementation roadmaps · Conduct internal research to source technology solutions that are scalable, sustainable and cost effective in order to drive innovation and efficiency · Lead the vendor selection process from start to finish, accounting for compliance, cost-effectiveness, security standards, and data privacy, and manage license renewals · Build teams and use best practice for documentation for system build designs and ensure effective archiving of the documentation for easy reference by the management or authorized business users · Lead the project management of the various system rollouts, including user training programs, and ensure compliance between designs and the system configuration · Continuously improve processes and procedures through automation and AI-driven analitics 3. Analytics operations and services · Deploy and manage a top-tier Analytics capability for the ASIA group supported by an insightful, scalable, flexible and cost-effective Business Intelligence application · Define data architecture requirements while ensuring data security and enabling the Analytics capabilities in compliance with data privacy laws of the jurisdictions the Group operates · Implement data management and digital marketing retargeting capabilities · Hire, train and manage a team supporting the business users across the ASIA Group by providing data visualization and reporting services to enable effective decision making for the business stakeholders 4. IT network architecture management and user support · Design, document and rollout a performant and reliable IT network architecture to support the business activities of the ASIA Group · Ensure optimal processing and bandwidth capacity across the different operations of the ASIA Group · Establish in-house IT support operations covering all operating hours of the Group · Establish a RBAC access management framework and manage systems access and permissions for all members of the organization · Define the IT hardware requirements across the Group while driving cost efficiency · Manage and track all IT hardware inventory and equipment leased to the employees or locations within the organization · Manage and ensure the security of the Group digital ecosystem, IT infrastructure, and data, including cybersecurity governance, compliance oversight, and risk assessment
Job Requirements: Required Competencies · Bachelor's degree in IT, Computer Science, or a related field. · 15 Years of related experience in IT management, software development, or digital transformation and 7 years of managerial experience, managing technology teams. · Technology Leadership & Strategic Vision – Proven ability to align IT strategy with business goals, driving digital transformation and operational efficiency · Software Engineering Mastery – Strong experience in software development, system architecture, and enterprise technology deployment · Business Acumen & Process Optimization – Deep understanding of business processes, operational scalability, and system integrations to support growth · Data Architecture & Analytics – Expertise in data governance, business intelligence tools (e.g., Power BI, Tableau), and cloud-based analytics solutions · Cybersecurity & IT Governance – Strong knowledge of IT security frameworks, risk management, compliance standards (ISO 27001, GDPR, PDPA) · Vendor & Stakeholder Management – Experience in negotiating with technology vendors and aligning IT investments with business priorities · Agile Project Management – Skilled in leading cross-functional teams, managing complex technology rollouts, and ensuring adoption · Communication & Leadership – Ability to influence C-suite executives and collaborate with diverse teams across different business units · Fluent English Proficiency – Strong written and verbal communication skills for international collaboration · High Integrity & Resilience – Trusted leader with a problem-solving mindset and the ability to work under pressure *Required Professional Qualification : Software engineering, business process optimization, and data architecture
Industry: CNTT - Phần mềm

Company: Vietmap - Công Ty Cổ Phần Ứng Dụng Bản Đồ Việt
Job Description: We are seeking General Marketing Executive with the following key responsibilities: 1. Develop and Execute IMC (Integrated Marketing Communication) Campaigns • Develop and manage integrated communication campaigns (IMC) to ensure brand consistency across all communication activities. • Enhance brand value and recognition through IMC and 360-degree marketing campaigns. • Analyze the characteristics and behavior of target audiences to create suitable content and select the right communication channels. • Collaborate with internal teams and external partners to execute detailed plans. 2. Execute 360-Degree Marketing Campaigns • Create detailed plans for each phase of the campaign, monitor progress, and adjust flexibly to optimize results. • Develop content and messaging tailored to different channels and audience segments, ensuring unified and engaging communication. • Work closely with content, design, and production teams to create diverse marketing assets. 3. Manage and Optimize Diverse Communication Channels • Understand the characteristics of various communication channels to select the most suitable ones for each campaign based on target audiences and brand objectives. • Stay updated on emerging media trends to refine strategies and enhance promotional efficiency. • Master key digital metrics (e.g., CTR, CPM, CPA, ROI) to monitor, operate, and adjust campaigns in real-time, ensuring maximum effectiveness. 4. Support Other Marketing Activities • Assist and collaborate with other departments in product promotion, internal communication, and company events. • Act as a bridge between internal teams to ensure all marketing activities align with the company's overall goals. 5. Budget Management and Performance Measurement • Work with the finance team to effectively manage marketing budgets, ensuring spending aligns with objectives and achieves optimal results. • Compile comprehensive campaign reports with specific performance metrics (KPIs) to evaluate effectiveness and propose improvements for future campaigns. 6. Market and Competitor Analysis • Monitor and analyze market trends and competitor activities to develop timely and appropriate marketing strategies. • Identify new opportunities and suggest improvements to marketing strategies based on data and customer feedback.
Job Requirements: • Experience: At least 3-5 years of experience in marketing, particularly in managing IMC and 360-degree marketing campaigns. • Comprehensive Marketing Knowledge: Strong understanding of diverse communication channels, both online and offline, with skills in managing and executing integrated campaigns. • Strategic Planning and Audience-Centric Thinking: Ability to develop long-term strategies based on deep audience insights and brand-building expertise. • Data Analysis and Measurement Skills: Proficiency in data analysis tools such as Google Analytics, Data Studio, and other measurement platforms, with the ability to convert data into actionable insights. • Communication and Teamwork Skills: Excellent communication skills and the ability to work closely with internal teams and external partners to achieve common objectives. • Creative and Flexible Thinking: Capable of generating creative ideas and adapting strategies to optimize campaign performance. • Preferred: Candidates with experience in the automotive, technology, or other industries requiring comprehensive marketing skills.
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing

Company: Norbreeze Collective Asia
Job Description: Objective of role: The Assistant Digital Manager is responsible for planning & managing the organization's digital channels, ensuring that they are effective, efficient and aligned with the organization's overall goals and objectives. Detailed responsibilities/accountabilities People: Manage & Supervise Delegate & assign tasks to team members. Evaluate team member performance & Propose development plan for team members. Team Leading: Oversee & guide team on daily basis tasks. Guide to measure and track performance vs campaign KPIs and objectives. Planning & Managing: Develop, implement, and manage the organization's digital strategy to achieve business goals and objectives. Build and execute digital strategies through digital marketing campaigns to achieve digital marketing growth. Plan and manage digital campaigns across all digital channels of O2O. Manage social media & digital marketing budgets with constant tracking of expenditure versus ROIs. Digital Marketing Implementing: Develop and deliver the digital plans and campaigns in line with strategic goals. Drive and optimize performance on social, digital advertising, through Facebook Ads, Google Display, SEO/SEM, Zalo, Tiktok, Programmatics and EDM. Collaborate with inhouse team to create advertising visual and content for a successful campaign. Able to contribute with creative/ novel ideas and solutions to improve implementation of digital communication. Participate in communications with brand principal and ensure that guidelines and processes are applied in assigned market. Generate commercial sales and optimize marketing ROI through digital campaigns, social media management and analytics, as well as performance marketing. Supervising & Reporting: Demonstrate strong project/ campaign management skills – with digital marketing projects and campaigns executed within stipulated timeline for launch Display strong thought process and eye for details when executing a 360-integrated marketing campaign - which is seen through communication consistency/ accuracy across all touchpoints. Display strong communication skills in liaison with both external and internal stakeholders to ensure accuracy/ efficiency of execution. Build dashboard of report for deeply analysis on data to evaluate the advertising performance on each campaign and have quick action plan on each campaign to reach the goals. Conduct a set of reports as per timeline to evaluate & monitor campaign effectively Team Development: Stay up to date with industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies to ensure that the digital team remains competitive in the digital space Supervise a team of digital specialists and ensure their performance aligns with company goals. Develop and implement training programs to help develop the skills of digital specialists.
Job Requirements: 4-5 years’ work experience in Digital Marketing role A keen sense in retail industry is an added advantage. Proficient in Microsoft office & English communication Good knowledge of Zalo Ads, EDM, Google and Facebook Ads tools Proficient in Google Analytics, Google Data Studio, Website Platform, Basic data analyst tool. Highly adaptable to change and an excellent team player with the ability to influence and negotiate. Takes initiative and ownership Excellent planning and analytical skills Ability to work in a fast-paced setting under tight deadlines
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Tiếp thị trực tuyến , Dệt may / Da giày / Thời trang

Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Sữa Vitadairy Việt Nam
Job Description: Responsibilities: Planning, operating and developing consumer workflows, Marketing campaigns and Customer care activities Campaign management: 1. Research & analyze consumer insight to build user workflows using marketing tools 2. Coordinate with related departments (Brand team, Loyalty team) to plan and build user flows (automated or partner) for Marketing campaigns/Loyalty activities 3. Implement surveys, A/B testing to optimize outcome of campaigns 4. Create and develop short-term and long-term use cases according to business objective System management: 1. Manage data integration between platforms 2. Analyze & optimize data for smooth operations on SFMC 3. Monitor and resolve problems during operation Other tasks : 1. Train relevant personnels 2. Integrate other system/platforms 3. Manage budgets and related pawerwork
Job Requirements: - Experience in CRM, CDP (Customer data platforms), or Salesforce Marketing Cloud... - Experience in building workflow, business flow, be good at logical and analytical thinking - Mindset of Marketing, basic knowledge of database SQL - Background in FMCG is a plus - Strong interpersonal and communication skills
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing

Job Description: JOB SUMMARY Be responsible for quality system establishment and maintenance, setting quality standards, trouble shooting, data analysis by leveraging quality tools, leading or co-leading quality continual improvements. Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Thời Trang & Mỹ Phẩm Duy Anh (Dafc)
Job Description: The CRM Supervisor will be responsible for overseeing the development and execution of the CRM strategy to foster customer loyalty, enhance customer experience, and increase retention in line with the luxury positioning of DAFC and all the brands within DAFC portfolio. This role involves leveraging customer data to create personalized communication, implementing trade promotion programs and customer engagement campaigns, and managing the loyalty program to drive high-value customer retention. Client Engagement: • Devise and implement tailored strategies for VIP clients and various membership levels to enhance their engagement and loyalty. • Maintain and nurture existing client relationships while actively reactivating sleeping clients. Data Management: • Utilize data-driven insights to segment the customer base for targeted marketing campaigns, enhancing client engagement and sales. • Conduct thorough data analysis to identify trends, opportunities, and areas for improvement. Client Experience Management: • Collaborate closely with brand, retail, and marketing teams to optimize every touchpoint with clients, both online and in-store. • Implement initiatives that ensure consistency and excellence in the client experience across all channels. • Develop and execute innovative client-focused programs and events. Trade Promotions & Events: • Plan and execute generic trade promotions, such as end-of-season sales, Black Friday, Tet, and more, to drive sales and engage clients. • Organize and manage trade events, including private sales and exclusive events, creating unique shopping experiences for our clients. Others: follow other requests and assignments from Line Manager based on business needs
Job Requirements: Qualification: • Bachelor’s degree Experience • Proven experience in CRM, preferably within the luxury retail sector • Customer connectedness and customer centric mindset • Proficiency in CRM software and Microsoft Office Suite • Good thinking about data and system integration • Problem solving skills • Communication and teamwork skills
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing

Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Thương Mại Dịch Vụ Sản Xuất Hương Thủy
Job Description: Responsibility: Analyzing historical sales data, market trends, and other relevant factors to create accurate predictions of future customer demand, collaborating with cross-functional teams to gather insights, and utilizing forecasting models to optimize inventory levels and support sales and operations planning by proactively identifying potential risks and opportunities in the market; essentially ensuring the right amount of product is available at the right time to meet customer needs. Key responsibilities may include: Data Analysis: Analyzing historical sales data, market trends, promotional activities, and other relevant data to develop accurate demand forecasts. Model Development: Creating and maintaining statistical forecasting models using advanced techniques to predict future demand patterns. Collaboration: Working closely with sales, marketing, operations, and supply chain teams to gather market insights, customer feedback, and align demand forecasts with production/shipment plans. Trend Identification: Monitoring market dynamics, economic factors to identify potential demand shifts and adjust forecasts accordingly. Sales & Operations Planning (S&OP): Participating in S&OP meetings to present demand forecasts and collaborate on inventory management strategies. Risk Assessment: Performing scenario analysis to identify potential risks and opportunities impacting demand and develop contingency plans. Forecast Monitoring: Regularly monitoring forecast accuracy, identifying deviations from actual demand, and taking corrective actions to improve future forecasting. Reporting and Communication: Presenting demand forecasts and insights to key stakeholders through clear and concise reports and presentations. Process Improvement: Identifying areas for improvement in the demand planning process and implementing new methodologies or tools to enhance forecast accuracy.
Job Requirements: Required Skills: Strong analytical skills with proficiency in data manipulation and statistical analysis techniques Expertise in forecasting methodologies (e.g., time series analysis, moving average, exponential smoothing) Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams Proficiency in demand planning software and tools Understanding of supply chain dynamics and inventory management principles Business acumen and ability to interpret market trends and economic factors
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh

Company: Công Ty Tnhh Thời Trang Và Mỹ Phẩm Âu Châu
Job Description: Support business functions in expense management and proposed actions on material deviations vs. budget and rolling forecast. Actively monitor actual performance, highlight any difference between Actual & Budget. Perform pricing analysis to highlight risk/opportunity to support management team facilitating decision making. Perform analysis of indicators of inventory, revenue, cost of goods, by store/brand/product details. Control of promotional programs proposed by the brand ensures effectiveness, stable operation, and no arising risks. Based on analysis reports and data models, select and propose actions and solutions to: + Optimizing time, workload, and capital usage. + Optimize inventory at each store and by brand. Make periodical management reports. Work with the IT department to systematize and automate analyst reports on revenue, inventory, and management reports, ensuring accuracy and reasonableness. Assist in other tasks required by Internal Control Manager (if any).
Job Requirements: Graduated from University majoring in Accounting/Finance. At least 2 years of experience in Finance - Accounting. Have skills in thinking, analyzing, and synthesizing. Have critical thinking. Good data processing with ability to use analytical tools such as Pivot Table, Power BI. Able to work in groups and independently. Dynamic, progressive, enthusiastic, eager to learn. Proficient in using office computers (especially Excel).
Industry: Kế toán / Kiểm toán , Tài chính / Đầu tư

Company: Công Ty Tnhh Mtv Thương Mại Dịch Vụ Blue Ocean- Thế Giới Skinfood
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Du Lịch', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: Market Expansion: Develop and implement strategies to increase market share for all channels (include offline, online, e-commerce) Customer Satisfaction Enhancement: Focus on improving customer experience and loyalty through various initiatives. Sales Performance Optimization: Analyze sales data to optimize product offerings and promotional strategies, aiming to exceed sales targets. Implement the business development plans within budget and on time, coordinating the resources of the organization to achieve approved objectives Develop marketing strategy include marketing retail and branding. Manage account budgets annually, and update forecast monthly basis. Establish a business partnership with key personnel in the relevant accounts Work closely with strategic planning team on category analysis and monitoring account performance in all areas, including sales, profit, marketing result management and promotional effectiveness. Strategically align, plan, negotiate and review business activities within the relevant on a regular basis. Understand the number analysis of retail market, understand the P&L.
Job Requirements: Analytical Skills: Ability to analyze market trends, customer behavior, and sales data. Strategic Thinking: Develop and implement effective marketing and branding strategies. Relevant Work Experience: Previous at least 2 years’ relevant experience in retail planning, marketing, understand e-commerce platform, brand or distributor particularly in the cosmetics industry. Performance Metrics: Meeting or exceeding set marketing targets and ensuring efficient marketing management. Proactively analyze and resolve issues: Efficiently tackle problems and ensure tasks are completed promptly and accurately.
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh

Company: Công Ty Tnhh Wind Supply Chain One (Việt Nam)
Job Description: Assist in liaising with shopping malls in Vietnam, establishing and maintaining good cooperative relationships with mall owners and leasing teams. Participate in lease negotiations to secure favorable leasing terms and support the company’s store expansion. Monitor the development trends of local shopping malls, regularly collect commercial district information, assess the business environment, analyze foot traffic data, and identify potential business opportunities to support expansion strategies. Oversee the internal processes of expansion projects, including lease approval, contract signing, and project coordination, working closely with relevant departments (legal, finance, operations, etc.) to ensure project execution. Responsible for Vietnamese language translation in daily business communications and assisting the team in coordinating with malls, government agencies, and other stakeholders.
Job Requirements: Fluent in Vietnamese and English (both written and spoken), with proficiency in business terminology; Chinese language skills are a plus. Experience in retail, commercial real estate, or mall leasing is preferred. Strong negotiation and cross-cultural communication skills. Basic data analysis skills, with the ability to support site selection through market research and traffic monitoring. Willing to travel for fieldwork, conduct site visits, and visit shopping malls nationwide.
Industry: Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Bất động sản , Biên phiên dịch

Job Title: Nhân Viên Xác Minh/ Gắn Nhãn Dữ Liệu (Data Labeling_Line Tiếng Anh) - Dự Án App Social Video
Company: Công Ty Tnhh Transcosmos Việt Nam
Job Description: Tìm kiếm thông tin sản phẩm trên các nền tảng thương mại điện tử dựa vào các thuộc tính, mô tả của sản phẩm. Thực hiện gắn nhãn chính xác và phù hợp với sản phẩm từ Nhà Bán hàng đăng tải dựa theo tiêu chuẩn nghiệp vụ. Thực hiện báo cáo và các công việc khác theo phân công của Quản lý. Thời gian làm việc: Làm việc 6 ngày/ tuần, nghỉ 1 ngày bất kì trong tuần trong khung giờ 10:00 – 19:00.
Job Requirements: Tốt nghiệp THPT, còn giữ bằng cấp. Có khả năng sử dụng Tiếng Anh trung cấp (tương đương chứng chỉ TOEIC 550; nếu chứng chỉ hết hạn thì ứng viên sẽ thực hiện 01 bài test đánh giá năng lực được gửi từ phòng Nhân sự). Ứng viên có kinh nghiệm kiểm duyệt nội dung, gắn nhãn hình ảnh, xử lý thông tin hình ảnh trong lĩnh vực BPO là một lợi thế. Ưu tiên ứng viên có hiểu biết, trải nghiệm về các nền tảng thương mại điện tử. Tin học văn phòng tốt. Có thể làm toàn thời gian (không vướng bận lịch học).
Experience: Ưu Tiên Ứng Viên Có Hiểu Biết, Trải Nghiệm Về Các Nền Tảng Thương Mại Điện Tử.
Industry: Dịch vụ khách hàng , Quản lý chất lượng (QA/QC)

Job Title: Chuyên Viên R&D Công Bố/ Research Data (Làm Việc Tại Thảo Điền, Quận 2, Hcm)
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Nafoods Group
Job Description: - Theo dõi, cập nhật thay đổi các quy định Pháp luật Việt Nam và các thị trường nước ngoài liên quan đến sản phẩm của công ty - Thực hiện kiểm nghiệm mẫu phù hợp quy định pháp luật và yêu cầu của khách hàng tại trung tâm được nhà nước chỉ định/ công nhận ISO 17025 cho các thông tin MKT, Sale phục vụ nhãn hàng, đơn hàng quốc tế - Kiểm tra hồ sơ NCC, đảm bảo nguyên liệu đầu vào đúng quy định theo luật - Kiểm tra nhãn, claim MKT. Tìm cơ sở khoa học chứng minh cho thông điệp sản phẩm - Cập nhật luật, giới hạn, phạm vi phụ gia thực phẩm liên quan qui định Việt Nam và các nước xuất khẩu - Check thông tin, hoàn thành tiêu chuẩn nguyên liệu, thành phẩm, BTP, bao bì. - Cung cấp thông tin sản phẩm phục vụ quá trình làm công bố sản phẩm. - Quản lý cập nhật sửa đổi hệ thống tài liệu R&D (Spec, hồ sơ công bố, phiếu kiểm, …) kịp thời cho hệ thống đảm bảo sản phẩm nghiên cứu mới đáp ứng các luật định an toàn trên toàn cầu.
Job Requirements: - Đại học trở lên chuyên ngành công nghệ thực phẩm,… - Kinh nghiệm từ 3 năm trở lên - Có kiến thức chuyên môn về công nghệ thực phẩm, công nghệ sản xuất các sản phẩm nước ép trái cây, IQF - Có kiến thức cơ sở về luật ATTP, các quy định nghị định liên quan đến yêu cầu chất lượng sản phẩm nước ép trái cây, IQF - Có hiểu biết về tiêu chuẩn, qui trình, yêu cầu luật định an toàn thực phẩm của Việt Nam và toàn cầu. - Hiểu biết về tiêu chuẩn quản lý chất lượng - Hiểu biết về công nghệ sản xuất chế biến nông sản - Có hiểu biết về hệ thống quản lý chất lượng - Có kỹ năng thu thập thông tin và trình bày.
Industry: Thực phẩm & Đồ uống , Công nghệ thực phẩm / Dinh dưỡng , Sản xuất / Vận hành sản xuất

Job Title: Kiểm Toán Viên (Mảng Công Nghệ/ Dữ Liệu) - Auditor (It/ Model/ Data) - Cơ Quan Kiểm Toán Nội Bộ (Ho24.396)
Company: Ngân Hàng Tmcp Quân Đội
Job Description: Triển khai chương trình kiểm toán/rà soát/đánh giá, xây dựng kế hoạch kiểm toán chi tiết theo phạm vi trách nhiệm được phân công. Trực tiếp thực hiện kiểm tra/rà soát/đánh giá theo kế hoạch kiểm toán phù hợp với cấp độ KTV; đề xuất kiến nghị/ khuyến nghị nhằm nâng cao hiệu quả các hoạt động/đơn vị được kiểm tra Báo cáo các phát hiện kiểm toán lên Trưởng nhóm/Trưởng đoàn KTNB và trao đổi thống nhất với nhân sự đơn vị được kiểm toán Thực hiện nhập liệu phần mềm và bàn giao hồ sơ kiểm toán cho đơn vị đầu mối quản lý theo quy định từng thời kỳ Hỗ trợ Trưởng phòng/Chuyên gia xây dựng/kiện toàn các giải pháp/công cụ số hóa, tự động hóa trong hoạt động KTNB. Triển khai việc phân tích dữ liệu sử dụng các công cụ/phần mềm chuyên sâu phục vụ hoạt động KTNB/ hỗ trợ các phòng/đoàn kiểm toán
Job Requirements: Cử nhân chuyên ngành kinh tế, quản trị kinh doanh, luật, kế toán, kiểm toán, công nghệ thông tin. Ưu tiên ứng viên có các chứng chỉ: CPA/ACCA/CIA/CPIA/CFA hoặc các chứng chỉ nghề nghiệp khác liên quan đến hoạt động KTNB Toeic 500 hoặc chứng chỉ tương đương Có tối thiểu 03 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực tài chính, ngân hàng, kế toán, kiểm toán, bảo hiểm, chứng khoán, quản lý quỹ, bất động sản. Ưu tiên ứng viên có kinh nghiệm quản lý nhóm, dẫn đoàn kiểm toán
Industry: CNTT - Phần mềm , Kế toán / Kiểm toán , Ngân hàng

Job Title: Nhân Viên Gắn Nhãn Dữ Liệu (Data Labeling_Line Tiếng Anh_Không Sales) - Thu Nhập Từ 8.5 Triệu
Company: Công Ty Tnhh Transcosmos Việt Nam
Job Description: Tìm kiếm thông tin sản phẩm trên các nền tảng thương mại điện tử dựa vào các thuộc tính, mô tả của sản phẩm. Thực hiện gắn nhãn chính xác và phù hợp với sản phẩm từ Nhà Bán hàng đăng tải dựa theo tiêu chuẩn nghiệp vụ. Thực hiện báo cáo và các công việc khác theo phân công của Quản lý. Thời gian làm việc: Làm việc 6 ngày/ tuần, nghỉ 1 ngày bất kì trong tuần trong khung giờ 10:00 – 19:00.
Job Requirements: Tốt nghiệp THPT, còn giữ bằng cấp. Có khả năng sử dụng Tiếng Anh trung cấp (tương đương chứng chỉ TOEIC 550; nếu chứng chỉ hết hạn thì ứng viên sẽ thực hiện 01 bài test đánh giá năng lực được gửi từ phòng Nhân sự). Ứng viên có kinh nghiệm kiểm duyệt nội dung, gắn nhãn hình ảnh, xử lý thông tin hình ảnh trong lĩnh vực BPO là một lợi thế. Ưu tiên ứng viên có hiểu biết, trải nghiệm về các nền tảng thương mại điện tử. Tin học văn phòng tốt. Có thể làm toàn thời gian (không vướng bận lịch học).
Experience: Ưu Tiên Ứng Viên Có Hiểu Biết, Trải Nghiệm Về Các Nền Tảng Thương Mại Điện Tử.
Industry: Dịch vụ khách hàng , Quản lý chất lượng (QA/QC)

Job Title: Chuyên Viên Tư Vấn Tuyển Sinh - Tư Vấn Du Học ( Data Nóng, Tỉ Lệ Chốt Cao, Thu Nhập Hấp Dẫn Lên Đến 50 Triệu)
Company: Công Ty Tnhh Cmmb Việt Nam
Job Description: *Mô tả công việc: Tư vấn và giải đáp các thắc mắc của khách hàng về các khóa học, điều kiện du học; Xây dựng thương hiệu cá nhân qua các kênh truyền thông dưới sự hướng dẫn của quản lý để tìm kiếm data khách hàng. Nắm bắt kịp thời nhu cầu của khách hàng và tư vấn vào hợp đồng dịch vụ của công ty. Chăm sóc khách hàng trước và trong quá trình sử dụng dịch vụ của công ty. Nhập và cập nhật thông tin khách hàng trong cơ sở dữ liệu; Duy trì và phát triển mạng lưới khách hàng và đối tác tiềm năng thuộc nhiều lĩnh vực (trực tiếp hoặc gián tiếp) Phối hợp liên phòng ban hỗ trợ chăm sóc phụ huynh/học viên sau tư vấn; Lập và triển khai kế hoạch tuần, tháng dựa trên kế hoạch của phòng/team. Báo cáo lên các cấp quản lý về nhu cầu, vấn đề, mối quan tâm của khách hàng; hoạt động của đối thủ cạnh tranh và tiềm năng trong việc phát triển kinh doanh sản phẩm/dịch vụ. Thực hiện các công việc khác theo yêu cầu của Cấp trên. *Quyền lợi: Thu nhập: lên tới 50 triệu đồng/tháng (Bao gồm lương cứng: 10-12tr + Hoa hồng 1-5%) Ngoài ra còn thưởng quý, thưởng năm, thưởng tết và thưởng các ngày lễ trong năm,... Công ty cung cấp điện thoại riêng, laptop riêng. Các chính sách hỗ trợ ăn trưa, gửi xe BHXH khi ký Hợp đồng lao động chính thức. Môi trường làm việc: năng động, chuyên nghiệp, thân thiện và trẻ trung. Có cơ hội thăng tiến lên leader sau 3 - 6 tháng Chế độ Đào tạo: - Được đào tạo về sản phẩm của công ty. - Được hướng dẫn về kỹ năng sales, quy trình làm việc, kỹ năng thuyết trình, thuyết phục khách hàng. Review lương 6 tháng /1 lần Chế độ thưởng các dịp Lễ (30/04 - 01/05, Quốc Khánh 02/09, Tết Dương lịch, Tết Âm lịch); chế độ thưởng KPIs hàng kỳ, Du lịch, team building, nghỉ mát mỗi năm 02 lần. Hưởng chế độ nghỉ phép theo quy định luật lao động Hưởng đầy đủ các chế độ như phụ cấp BHYT, BHXH theo quy định luật lao động. Thời gian làm việc: Thứ 2 đến sáng Thứ 7 (Từ 8h-12h & 13h30 - 17h30)
Job Requirements: Từ 22 tuổi trở lên, ngoại hình sáng, tự tin. Tốt nghiệp cao đẳng hoặc đại học. Có kinh nghiệm tối thiểu 3-6 tháng sales. Ứng viên ít kinh nghiệm sẽ được training về kỹ năng sales, kỹ năng thuyết trình. Ưu tiên ứng viên ở lĩnh vực tư vấn giáo dục (TOEIC/IELTS) hoặc các vị trí liên quan nghề khác (tư vấn, chăm sóc khách hàng, bảo hiểm, ngân hàng, BĐS...) Có Tiếng Anh là 1 lợi thế lớn. Năng động, nhiệt tình trong công việc, có khả năng làm việc độc lập và làm việc nhóm Giao tiếp tốt, có khả năng thuyết phục, tư vấn khách hàng qua điện thoại và trực tiếp, Tác phong chuyên nghiệp phù hợp hoạt động trong lĩnh vực giáo dục; Thành thạo tin học văn phòng.
Industry: Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Tư vấn , Giáo dục / Đào tạo

Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Công Nghệ Data Nest
Job Description: Monitor the portfolio of assigned clients by engaging with clients to ensure product/service performance Introduce new, additional, and premium products to your account portfolio as well as new prospective clients, establishing their needs and pain points to provide solutions Find new client prospects to generate revenue streams from new accounts Prepare responses to clients such as legal documents, pricing negotiation, product roll-out, launching timeline, etc. Develop strong relationships with decision-makers and key stakeholders of clients, working alongside colleagues to ensure a seamless buying and deployment process Manage project planning, including scope of work and timeline to deliver on time Manage daily operation tasks such as relationship management and client support Collaborate with internal and external cross-functional teams on projects, and new businesses to provide better products and services to meet the desired targets of new/existing clients Facilitate and lead project meetings Prepare and gather project requirements and product backlogs for each deployment Analyze and prepare various reports relating to current projects, product developments, and sales performance Understand and follow new Government Regulations to ensure the stability of services for clients Use your networking/relationship and your market awareness to prospect and forecast selling opportunities Develop a successful buyer journey, supporting and creating a positive experience for your customers, and mitigating contraction churn and cancellation
Job Requirements: B. SKILL 1. Must have: Have experience working in the Financial industry (Including Banking, Consumer Finance, microfinance, etc) for at least 3 years Or work at businesses that provide solutions for the Finance industry, including Science and Technology, Risk, Product, CRM, LOS, etc. (Solutions or services preferred) 5+ year Fluently in English Well-knowledge of unsecured financial products such as personal loans, consumer durable loans, and other revolving financial products such as credit cards and micro-lending products, etc Ability to resolve conflicts, manage crises and solve problems, withstand pressure, work efficiently, set priorities, and organize management time among numerous accounts needing urgent attention simultaneously, with initiative, creativity, resourcefulness, analytical ability, energy, and determination to execute and win. Ability to communicate well both orally and in writing, and to conduct meetings (often in hostile/confrontational circumstances and/or at high Senior Corporate / Bank levels) and focus on relevant issues Ability and willingness to exercise initiative, make decisions, exercise responsibility, and accept accountability for actions taken / decisions made Highly developed communication skills and a positive demeanor; Demonstrable previous success in a B2B sales role; Proven ability to consistently exceed sales targets; Can build and manage relationships with key stakeholders and strategic partners at all levels; A consultative, process-oriented, and persistent approach with exceptional written and verbal communication skills; 2. Plus points: Experience in working in Fintech Experience as Risk Officer/Product Owner/Project Manager in Bank Experience in implementing and managing Financial Risk Management strategies and activities Experience in Digital Banking Product's development or business development for the financial industry Experience with data analytics platforms. Understand risk policies, P&L specifically toward Product Development & Management, Legal and Technology aspects C. Benefits: Great problems to solve, great team to work with. Competitive starting salary. 13th salary, and bonuses depend on company profits, project reward. Company-provided Apple computers. Benefits for special holidays (Birthday, Marriage, Women’s Day, Tet Holidays, Mid-Autumn, Newborn babies, International Children ‘s Day, etc.) Social Insurance on TOTAL salary Support lunch (80.000 VND/day) and Happy Friday. 12 days of annual leave and 1 day of birthday leave. Annual Health check-up. Team building and company trip at 5-stars resort. Support Grab for work. Health care insurance for employees and family. Life Insurance for the employee with indefinite contract.
Industry: Ngân hàng , Tài chính / Đầu tư
