Job Title: Lập Trình Web -Fullstack Developer (C#.Net Core, Reactjs, Nextjs)
Company: Công Ty Cp Du Lịch Và Tiếp Thị Gtvt Việt Nam- Vietravel
Job Description: Phát triển các hệ thống web ứng dụng cho công ty du lịch theo mô hình Microservices . Xây dựng và tối ưu hệ thống Backend bằng C#.NET Core và Frontend bằng ReactJS, NextJS . Thiết kế, phát triển API (RESTful, GraphQL) để kết nối với các hệ thống khác (OTA, Booking, CRM, Chatbot…). Quản lý, tối ưu cơ sở dữ liệu ( SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis ). Ứng dụng AI trong lập trình để tối ưu hiệu suất, kiểm thử và cải thiện sản phẩm. DevOps : Triển khai, quản lý hệ thống trên AWS/Azure, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD . Tích hợp và làm việc với hệ thống Data Warehouse (ETL, BI tools). Phối hợp với đội UI/UX để tối ưu trải nghiệm người dùng. Tham gia vào quá trình bảo trì, phát triển các tính năng mới cho hệ thống.
Job Requirements: Kỹ năng bắt buộc: Backend : Thành thạo C#.NET Core , thiết kế API RESTful . Frontend : Thành thạo ReactJS, NextJS , hiểu về SSR, CSR, TailwindCSS hoặc MUI. Database : Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis . DevOps : Biết cách triển khai trên AWS, Azure, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD . Version Control : Sử dụng tốt Git, GitHub/GitLab . Unit Test : Có kinh nghiệm viết test bằng xUnit, Jest hoặc tương tự. Kỹ năng ưu tiên (lợi thế nếu có): AI trong coding : Biết cách ứng dụng AI tools (Copilot, ChatGPT, AutoML…) để tối ưu quá trình phát triển. Data Warehouse : Hiểu về kiến trúc ETL, Data Lake, BI Tools (Power BI, Tableau, Google Data Studio) . Microservices Architecture : Hiểu cách xây dựng hệ thống phân tán. Security : Nắm vững các phương pháp bảo mật API, JWT, OAuth2. Hiệu suất cao : Kinh nghiệm tối ưu hiệu suất database, caching, load balancing . Ưu tiên các ứng viên có kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực du lịch OTA .
Industry: CNTT - Phần mềm , Du lịch

Job Description: Perform a variety of accounting activities in compliance with accounting principles and standards to control the organization’s financial resources and with all relevant regulations, laws, and reporting requirements. Mainly: • Update regulations: - Updating new regulations/treatments from the accounting/ tax office/ Headquarters and other competent offices for accounting team/related departments. - Issue/update/revise accounting regulations as instructed by accounting manager. • Account Receivable: - Checking AR and AR overdue and coordinating with the departments for on-time collection. - Preparing AR reports (by term, by businesses,…) - Contact the departments for any matters related to AR. • Reports: - To learn new requirements and do the required reports. - To create and follow any management reports as required by GD and Accounting manager. - To support accounting manager in financial analysis and control. + Analyze data and processes to identify trends, anomalies, and areas of improvement, focusing on inventory management and expenses…. + Monitor costs through root cause analysis, addressing variances and potential cost leakage. + Develop and maintain a reporting suite to track key cost. + Conduct monthly reports, plans, and forecasts of stock levels and cost, providing variance analysis and insights. • Other responsibilities - Any others as required by the managers.

Company: Công Ty Tnhh Cj Foods Việt Nam
Job Description: Demand Forecasting Partner with the Commercial team (including Marketing, Trade Marketing, Customer Service-Sales Operations, and Sales) and Finance teams to generate precise demand forecasts for assigned categories. Leverage historical data, market trends, and sales insights to predict customer demand accurately. Inventory Management Oversee inventory levels to ensure alignment with forecasted demand while avoiding excess stock and minimizing the risk of shortages. Implement strategies to balance inventory turnover rates and optimize stock levels. Performance Monitoring Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) such as Forecast Accuracy (FA), Forecast Bias (FB), Out-of-Stock (OOS) incidents, (SLOB), and Days of Inventory (DOI). Assess the effectiveness of the Sales and Operations Planning (S&OP) process and make data-driven decisions to enhance performance. Planning Conduct comprehensive scenario analyses to evaluate various supply chain scenarios. Develop and implement contingency plans to address and adapt to evolving market conditions and unexpected disruptions. Other tasks are assigned by Line Manager.
Job Requirements: Educational Background: Bachelor’s degree in Supply Chain Management or a related field, or a demonstrated passion for supply chain management. Experience: Minimum of 03-4 years of progressive experience in Demand Planning/Supply Planning/Inventory Control Senior level Supply Chain Expertise: Extensive knowledge of demand forecasting, inventory management, production planning, and overall supply chain processes. Language Skills: Proficiency in written and spoken English (Prefer) Soft Skills: Analytical Skills: Ability to analyze data, identify trends, and derive actionable insights. Communication & Collaboration: Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to effectively communicate and collaborate across various teams. Adaptability & Problem-Solving: Capacity to adapt to changing environments and address complex problems with innovative solutions.

Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Green Speed
Job Description: Ensure the execution of trade marketing activities to maximize revenue and strengthen brand presence at the point of sale. Facilitate effective coordination between the marketing and sales teams to achieve business objectives. Trade Marketing Planning: Develop and implement trade marketing strategies and campaigns for beverage products at retail and distribution points. Create detailed budgets for trade marketing activities and ensure cost efficiency and alignment with objectives. Evaluate the effectiveness of trade marketing programs and propose enhancements for future campaigns. Collaboration with Sales Teams: Work closely with sales teams to execute strategies and promotional programs that drive sales growth. Analyze sales performance data and market feedback to optimize trade marketing initiatives. POSM and Product Display Management: Design and manage Point-of-Sale Materials (POSM) to enhance brand visibility and customer engagement. Ensure product displays comply with brand standards and effectively capture shopper attention. Market Research and Competitor Analysis: Collect and analyze market insights, shopper behavior, and competitor activities. Use data-driven insights to support the development of effective trade marketing strategies. Event Support and Activation: Plan and participate in retail events, in-store promotions, and brand activation programs to boost product awareness. Coordinate with external partners and vendors to ensure successful event execution.
Job Requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field. At least 1-2 years of experience in trade marketing, preferably in the FMCG or beverage industry. Strong planning and organizational skills. Analytical skills for data interpretation and performance evaluation. Excellent communication and teamwork abilities. Company: Oxford University Clinical Research Unit (Oucru Vietnam)
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Du Lịch', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: JOB SUMMARY In collaboration with the University of Oxford, MORU, Menzies, WEHI, and the National Malaria Control Programs (NMCPs) in Vietnam, Laos PDR, and Cambodia, OUCRU is conducting several regional projects focused on the genetic epidemiology of drug-resistant malaria parasites, asymptomatic malaria monitoring, and sero-surveillance to support local and regional malaria control and elimination efforts. The next phase of these projects will focus on capacity building—supporting NMCPs in malaria molecular testing and data analysis to advance national malaria elimination goals and ensure long-term sustainability. We are seeking a Senior Research Assistant to provide technical and data analysis training to NMCPs, ensuring the effective delivery of hands-on laboratory and analytical skills. The role will also involve performing and optimizing molecular and serology laboratory assays, analyzing project data, and contributing to research manuscripts and publications. This position will require frequent visits to malaria-endemic provinces and partner laboratories to support training. The successful candidate will work across ongoing malaria genetic projects and a pilot malaria serology study. * KEY TASKS AND RESPONSIBILITIES · Understand, comply with and follow research protocols and laboratory procedures · Providing technical and data analysis training sessions to local site staffs in malaria endemic provinces and international scientific partner staffs · Conduct and Optimize the new molecular, serology laboratory assays · Analyze project data and contribute to manuscript writing · Assist PIs in training junior staffs · Engage in frequent site visits to support local collaborators and field activities. · Other support tasks as required
Job Requirements: ESSENTIAL CRITERIA · MSc or PhD (preferable) in Molecular Biology, Bioinformatics, Immunology or a related field · At least 5 year-experience in NGS sequencing or serological laboratory work (both technical and analysis) · Ability to work with clinical samples · Strong data analysis skills (experience with R, or bioinformatics software is an advantage) · Excellent interpersonal skills, team working ability · Strong communication and training skills to engage with NMCP teams. · Self-motivated, detail-oriented, and able to work independently · Willingness to travel to malaria-endemic areas for fieldwork and training activities. · Proficient English skills (IELTS 7 or equivalent) DESIRABLE CRITERIA · Experience in clinical research, working with multiple partners · Vaccination of Hepatitis B · Interest in malaria research * BENEFITS · Contracted salary ranges: : $1,549 - $1,633 gross per month · Optional insurance: In-patient and out-patient medical coverage; Personal accident insurance coverage · Two months salary for annual bonus and clothes · Annual leave 18 days/year for the first year, a maximum of 30 days · Other responsibilities and benefits are based on Viet Nam Labor Law. * HOW TO APPLY Interested candidates are invited to send curriculum vitae, application and copies of relevant certificates, either by email or by post to Oxford University Clinical Research Unit Laboratory of Clinical Science Hospital for Tropical Diseases 764 Vo Van Kiet, Ward 1, District 5, HCMC * DEADLINE FOR SUBMISSION 26 March 2025 * We thank all applicants for their interest but only short-listed candidates will be contacted for interview.
Industry: Chăm sóc sức khỏe / Thẩm mỹ / Làm đẹp , Phi chính phủ / Phi lợi nhuận

Job Title: Lean Manager(Shuttle Bus From Ho Chi Minh)
Company: Công Ty Tnhh Maker Sixty Four
Job Description: Key responsibilities: Develop and Implement Lean Strategies: Lead the development and execution of Lean strategies and initiatives across the organisation, with a focus on methodologies such as Kaizen, 5S, Process Flow Diagrams, Value Stream Mapping, OEE, and Continuous Improvement. Team Leadership: Manage a team of Lean engineers and provide guidance, mentorship, and support to ensure successful execution of Lean projects. Cross-Functional Collaboration: Collaborate with senior management, department heads, and staff to identify process improvement opportunities, set improvement goals, and drive projects to completion. Performance Analysis: Analyse key performance indicators (KPIs) to identify trends, areas of improvement, and cost-saving opportunities. Training and Development: Develop and implement training programs to build Lean awareness and capability among employees at all levels of the organization. Lean Tools and Techniques: Promote the use of Lean tools and techniques to eliminate waste, reduce lead times, and enhance overall process efficiency. Collaborate with production teams to identify bottlenecks and balance production flows. Monitor the quality of products and work to reduce defects and waste. Coordinate with Supply Chain and Logistics to optimise inventory and delivery. Change Management: Lead change management efforts to ensure successful adoption of Lean principles and sustain improvements over time. Data-Driven Decision-Making: Utilize data and analytics to make informed decisions and track the progress of Lean initiatives. Conduct regular Lean Audits and monitor the progress of Lean initiatives. Project Management: Manage multiple improvement projects simultaneously, ensuring they are completed on time and within budget. Continuous Improvement Culture: Foster a culture of continuous improvement throughout the organisation, encouraging employees at all levels to actively participate in Lean activities. Ensure compliance with Health and Safety regulations.
Job Requirements: Key skills and experience Proven experience as Lean Manufacturing Manager. Lean Six Sigma Black Belt certification is preferred. Strong leadership and team management skills. Implementing Lean methodologies and driving process improvements in manufacturing operations and other departments. Strong leadership skills with the ability to motivate and lead cross-functional teams. Proficiency in using Lean tools and techniques. Experience with Lean software and data analysis tools. Other requirements Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Business Administration, or relevant field. Master's degree preferred. Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills. Proactive with a desire to drive change. Excellent English communication Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills. Effective communication and presentation abilities. Change management experience is desirable.
Industry: Sản xuất / Vận hành sản xuất , Đồ gỗ

Company: Heineken Vietnam
Job Description: We are on the hunt for a brilliant Innovation Product Owner to join our team and help us drive forward with some out-of-the-box thinking and ideas. As the Innovation Product Owner, you will be responsible for leading the charge on innovative product development, leveraging emerging technologies and pushing the boundaries of what's possible. In fact, we’re looking for someone who can make an impact to the market of food & beverage itself, in (several) innovative projects that connect end consumers and b2b customers. Responsibilities: Shape the value: Identify needs & gaps from current market and its distribution, internal stakeholders, and referrable oceans… to create values for the organization through initiations of new digital products, platforms, and technologies. Collaborate with stakeholders across the organization to ensure that innovative products and services align with the company's overall strategy and goals. Own the journeys : You create and define journeys for our end consumers, but also to connect them with the ecosystem of our organization. We don’t digitalize clumsy processes, but bring them to the next level (perhaps having less processes is actually better – it’s your call) Deliver stuff, digital stuff: Lead (and own the success of) the development of those innovative product ideas and concepts, leveraging emerging technologies and trends (either from the market or Heineken Global). Development teams can be in-house, our Innovation dev hub, or external partner and Global partner, or can buy / rent a technology entirely. It’s up to you! Understand the customers / users: Develop a deep understanding of customer needs and preferences and use this knowledge to drive the development of products that resonate with our target audience. Depending on projects, users can be a normal beer drinker, or an accountant doing manual work, or a retail owner who barely knows about tech & app. That’s the exciting part of the job. Be the connector: Work closely with cross-functional teams to plan and execute the development of innovative products and services, using Agile methodologies and tools. Champion the Innovation: Keep in touch with the world to identify trends, technology and opportunities in the market, and use this information to inform product development decisions. Live by data: Use data and analytics to track the performance of innovative products and services, identify areas for improvement, and make data-driven decisions. Some of your projects might generate invaluable data as well. Fun fact: you can work with a lot of 1st party data, and pionner the transformation game of extracting values from data.
Job Requirements: Requirements: 7-10 years of experience as a Digital Product Owner or similar role, with a proven track record of delivering digital products, services or transformation. A business domain regarding FMCG, Finance, HR, Process control & Improvement, Legal… is a plus. Strong process improvement & process design skill. Six Sigma and similar technique proficiency is a plus. Strong leadership skills, with the ability to inspire and motivate cross-functional teams to achieve shared goals. In fact, you need to shape your story and convince people to follow! Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to build strong relationships with stakeholders across the organization. Excellent project management skill, capable of driving projects from initiation to closing - sprinkled some pilots here and pivots there. Good financial & commercial skillset (and mindset). At least you can sell your project with a sufficiently good business case. Experience working in an Agile environment, with a relatively thorough understanding of Agile methodologies and tools. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to use data to drive decisions. A passion for emerging technologies and trends, with a strong understanding of the latest developments in the market. If you're a creative problem solver with a passion for innovation, we want to hear from you! As our Innovation Product Owner, you'll have the opportunity to work on some truly cutting-edge projects and help us to stay at the forefront of our industry. So, if you're ready to take your career to the next level and join a team that's always pushing the boundaries, apply today and let's get started!
Industry: CNTT - Phần mềm

Company: Yes4All Trading Services Company Limited
Job Description: Yes4All is one of the leading brands for home sporting goods & furniture in the e-commerce market. Founded in 2010, we have strived to be in the top 1% retailers on Amazon US. Based in California with an operation office in HCMC, we have more than 400 young and talented members with expert knowledge and experience in the e-commerce industry. We are on an ambitious journey to dominate not only Amazon‘s sporting goods market but also to enter new e-commerce markets from many regions like Canada, Europe, Japan. Besides, Home sporting goods, Furniture, Outdoor and Gardening are also great opportunities that we desire to occupy and create significant values. With our steady knowledge in E-commerce, Yes4All started to provide end to-end ecommerce-enabler service in order to help Vietnamese and global manufacturers or struggling sellers bring their products to the US & International markets. I. JOB DESCRIPTIONS 1. Data Collection and Analysis Gather data from various sources (sales, marketing, customer behavior) and conduct detailed analyses to identify trends and insights. 2. Report Generation Create and maintain regular reports and dashboards that provide actionable insights to stakeholders. 3. Support Decision-Making Provide data-driven recommendations to support strategic and operational decisions. 4. Data Quality Ensure data integrity and accuracy by performing regular data quality checks and troubleshooting any issues. 5. Collaboration Work closely with other departments (e.g., marketing, sales, technology) to understand their data needs and deliver relevant insights. 6. Tool Utilization Utilize BI tools and software (Power BI) to create visualizations and reports.
Job Requirements: II. SKILL AND EXPERIENCE At least 3 years’ experience in Business Intelligence or relevant role; Bachelor’s degree and above in Statistics, Business, Data Analytics, and other related fields; Strong in SQL skills; Have experience in using Python is a big plus; Ability to demonstrate a high level of verbal and written to coordinate with internal stakeholders across departments; Be opened minded, think out of the box and willing to do attitude; Experience in business intelligence in E-commerce/Fintech companies is a plus; Having knowledge in Logistics, Operation or Marketing is a plus; Entrepreneurial spirit and start-up mindset. III. WHY YOU WILL LOVE JOINING US? FOR YOU TO JOIN Financial Well-being: A competitive salary with 13th month salary, annual performance bonus and a variety of allowances. Salary review: annually or on excellent performance. Activities: company trips, team-building, and other customized monthly bonding events. Annual leaves: 16 days off and 01 Birthday Leave per year. Healthcare: annual health check, insurance according to Labor Law and extra PTI Insurance package. Working Environment: dynamic, friendly environments with working time flexibility (Mon-Fri), and other perks include snacks, coffee, and healthy food provided daily suited for hardworking, fun, and team collaboration. FOR YOU TO GROW Ambition: We are now keeping on with our hyper growth to multicategory, multichannel, multimarket, and expanding into the world largest e-commerce enabler. Hence, there will continuously be opportunities to challenge yourself, learn new skills and knowledge. Challenges : Your voice can always be heard as we embrace the eagerness of learning and sharing. You can be your own boss and create your own value with the ability to take initiative and make decisions in all aspects of work. Chances: Be led and coached by experienced and inspirational leaders and participate in various training courses where you can enlarge your knowledge and experience in the E-commerce and Supply Chain industry. FOR YOU TO STAY People : Having a headquarter in the US and an operation office in Vietnam, our team is young and highly motivated. You will be working with and alongside members having experiences from International Corporations or high profile from Vietnam that share the same passion and dedication. Culture: Our working environment is humble, collaborative and 100% healthy. We promote Exchange & Speak out, you can receive transparent and supportive feedback so you can perform the best. Career path : Provide you a great career path, open to rotating for your better understanding of the company and contribute across many of our functions. And much more, join us and let yourself explore other fantastic things!

Job Title: [Aeon Long An] Quản Lý Cửa Hàng Chăm Sóc Sức Khỏe Và Sắc Đẹp - Glam Beautique
Company: Công Ty Tnhh Aeon Việt Nam
Job Description: 1/ Operations duties a. Merchandise management - Supervise Group Leader(s) and General Staff to ensure: • Merchandise is fully replenished, in good conditions & quality. • All the display merchandise is according to schematic plan and all the price between display merchandise and price card is tally. • Changing price label (if necessary) is completed before store opens. - Order stock directly with Suppliers and receive stock from MMD. - Verify and approve inventory orders raised by Group Leader(s). - Plan manpower, prepare and attend bi-annually Stock Take as scheduled. - Support Foodline with monthly Stock Take as directed by supervisor. - Plan, assign duties for Group Leader(s) and General Staff to make necessary preparation for Membership Day & Mommy Day and Public Holidays. b. Non-merchandise management - Supervise Group Leader(s) and General Staff to ensure: • Operational equipment, lighting and fixtures (gondola, wagon, shelves, etc.) are in good conditions • Sales floor is kept clean & tidy • All backrooms are locked in good conditions • POP execution is carried out properly • Fire safety procedure is carried out properly - Check and verify variances in stock & sales figures after Stock Take and make report to Line Manager. - Execute store opening & closing as directed by supervisor. c. Customer service - Provide good customer services to encourage “plus selling”. Be polite and listen alternatively to customer needs. - Get information and introduce to customers about new arrivals, promotions, policies regarding to payment, returns/exchanges, etc. - Handle customer complaints raised by Group Leader(s), difficult and complicated sales. - Follow Company’s Rules on Customer Service (greeting, smiling, bowing and attitude towards customers). d. Omni channel Operation - Control stock inventory for Omni sales. - Report and ensure correct related figure data 2/ Sales and Profits - Analyze Sales by item/categoty and Customer behavior to propose a sastisfying selling floor/ event - Brief Group Leader(s) on yesterday sales achievement, today sales budget, up-to-date sales achievement, promotion and company updates. - Brief promoters on promotion scheme. - Breakdown the sales target given by Line Manager to each Group Leader and take responsibilities for sales target achievement of the division. - Overall plan and supervise the execution of promotion schemes. - Observe/gather information/suggestion from Group Leader(s) about sales trend, customer demands and advise Merchandising Dept. for any changes/improvement in merchandise assortment, quality and quantity. - Gather and consolidate all periodical reports from Group Leader(s) about top sales, promotion sales results, market survey/competitor survey and submit to Line Manager. 3/ Manpower management - Plan Monthly Division’s duty roster and manpower schedule. - Ensure sufficient manpower during business in ad-hoc situations. - Monitor Group Leader(s), General Staff and Promoter’s attendance and attire. - Approve duty roster, shift plan raised by Group Leader(s). - Be responsible for Group Leader(s) and General Staff’s performance. - Take part in recruitment & selection activities for Division’s staffing. - Motivate, training and develop staff in order to encourage their professional development. - Identify potential staff for succession planning purposes. - Build and promote team work spirit.
Job Requirements: University/College degree. Service orientation: customer service minded. At least 03 years related experience in retailing business or supermarket environment and 01 year experience in managing a team of at least 5 staffs Strong leadership and excellent relationship management. Strong analytical skill, good at data/figures. Good presentation, problem solving and sales skills. Self-disciplined with ability to work independently. Good command of spoken and written English Computer skill (Word, Excel, Powerpoint). Teamwork skill: Actively promote team work. Ability to cope with stressful situation at work.

Company: Highlands Coffee
Job Description: Summary: The FP&A Manager is responsible for establishing and managing a robust financial budgeting, planning, analysis and forecasting process for the Company. This role involves collaborating with department heads to develop and execute financial plans, budgets, and forecasts that align with the overall business strategy. The FP&A Manager will also provide valuable insights, financial analyses, and recommendations for long-term financial planning and strategic decision-making to optimize financial performance. Key Accountabilities: Financial Analysis and Forecasting: Lead the financial analysis & forecasting process to analyze all financial aspects affecting profitability & business performance, improving forecast accuracy & proposing recommendations for profit maximization and sustainability. Analyze and articulate the drivers of organizational performance through interpretation of financial results and macro-economic trends to support strategic planning and decision-making. Collaborate with department heads to gather data and develop departmental forecasts, ensuring alignment with overall financial goals. Assist in preparing comprehensive business updates and decks to facilitate strategic planning for senior leadership. Manage financial databases by organizing and analyzing diverse data sources, consolidating Profit and Loss statements by channels and formats. Lead both consolidated and segment financial monthly rolling forecasts, including P&L, balance sheet, and cash flow. Financial Planning & Budgeting: Assist the Head of FP&A in developing & maintaining the end-to-end short- and long-term planning processes for Highlands operations, driving effective monthly financial forecasting, reporting processes (including MFR’s), and long-term planning that aligns with Highlands’ business strategic objective. Implement the annual financial budgeting process to ensure alignment with corporate strategy and overall business goals. Collaborate with department heads and senior management to develop annual budgets in alignment with the company strategy goals. Manage and control Store Opex and BU G&A Budgets, defining metrics to evaluate performance against forecasts and goals. Capital Planning and Cost Controlling Assist in capital management and optimize the cash conversion cycle to align the company’s short-term and long-term financing needs with its financial strategy. Evaluate & prioritize capital investments based on potential returns and strategic alignment. Determine the optimal allocation of financial resources across different departments or projects. Implement systems to govern cost control and review departmental accrual expenses, tracking performance against plans. Collaborate with the Accounting Team to manage cash flow and balance sheet, ensuring accurate and timely financial transactions. Reporting and Performance Management Manage all financial reports, including Monthly MFR, QBR, Board Meeting materials, and corporate reporting (JFC and VTI). Analyze financial data to identify trends, risks, and opportunities for improvement. Develop and maintain financial models to support strategic decision-making and conduct scenario analyses for potential impacts of various business decisions across all functions, except Supply Chain and Commercial. Continuously enhance financial reporting and drive business review processes. Lead special projects as designed and defined by the CFO such as digital transformation, finance transformation.
Job Requirements: Job Requirements: 07+ years of experience in financial planning and analysis, budgeting, and forecasting, preferably in the retail or consumer products industry. Proven experience in a managerial role within a finance function, preferably in a corporate environment. Strong financial modeling and analytical skills. Proficient in financial analysis tools and software. Strong proficiency in financial modeling, data analysis, and business intelligence tools (e.g., Excel, SQL, Tableau, Power BI). Excellent organization skills and ability to effectively manage multiple priorities in a rapidly changing environment. Strong presentation & communication skills with the ability to effectively communicate complex financial information to non-financial stakeholders.
Industry: Kế toán / Kiểm toán , Tài chính / Đầu tư

Job Title: Senior Ess Engineer (Erp/Plm - Engineering System Support)
Company: Techtronic Industries Vietnam Manufacturing Company Limited
Job Description: TTI Asia Engineering Services is expanding and will grow its local Vietnam Team to support the TTI Vietnam organizational growth. TTI Asia Engineering Services delivers services and support to TTI Engineering and Manufacturing organizations via Business Digital Transformations, staff training and development. It’s a Center of Expertise in Engineering methodologies, skillsets, digital tools and systems as well as business processes. Its 3 poles are Engineering Systems, Training & Development, and Product Design Services. In line with our strategy to further develop the Engineering Systems group, the Asia PLM group is looking to fill the role of Senior Engineer, Engineering Systems – NPD Support in Vietnam . The Asia Engineering Systems Support (ESS) team has been long established in Dongguan, PRC, and has developed a reputation of offering quality daily support to Business verticals within TTI Asia. Since 2023, ESS is regularly present in Vietnam to deliver face-to-face support and training to Vietnam organizations. This position will focus on the implementation and development of ESS support to different business units in Vietnam by communication, training, coaching, daily support… to drive best practice in usage of our systems platforms. The ideal candidate will be comfortable with a system environment while understanding mechanical or electrical engineering. The position will support the various TTI organizations around Ho Chi Minh City. The base office is expected to be at the TTI SHTP office. Weekly responsibilities will likely require 2 to 3 daily trips to other TTI facilities, either in Cuchi or Dau Giay areas. Main duty: 1. Engineering Systems – PLM (20%): To leverage PRC Engineering Systems teams for project-based supporting activities in the platforms: Teamcenter, TeamWorks & Prodea, Oracle & K2 Engineering systems - Data Entry - Engineering information check and goalkeeping in the platforms - Assistant to Engineering executions in the platforms - Assistant to Engineering documentations in the platforms 2. Engineering Systems – NPD Support (80%): To leverage PRC Engineering Systems teams for general platform supports: Teamcenter, TeamWorks & Prodea, Oracle & K2 Engineering systems - User helpdesk - User pain points or requirements gathering - Usage monitoring and reporting - Performance benchmarking & platform validation tests - Best practice deployment - Assistant to business analysis - User training and communication - Platform / Data maintenance - Assistant to continues improvement
Job Requirements: Requirements: - College degree - Below majors are all accepted: IT, Mechanical Engineering, Electronic Engineering, Mechatronic Engineering, Industrial Engineering, Automations - Two years of experience in any below responsibilities of working with an enterprise level digital platform: User helpdesk, System Administrator, System Trainer, Business Analyst, Process Improvement, Architect Designer. - Preferred in exposure to the usage of any MCAD or ECAD tools, project and product management - Ability to use MS office suite for data analysis and report or Power BI - The ability to remain up-to-date with the latest software developments. - Leadership, vendor and project management skills. - Analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills. - Good in English language Working Location: - Branch site in SHTP - District 9/ Củ Chi/Dau Giay.

Job Description: Affiliate Strategy & Planning: Research and analyze the affiliate marketing landscape, target audience, competitor activities, and company product offerings. Develop and implement comprehensive affiliate marketing strategies and plans aligned with overall business objectives and partner resources. Establish revenue and cost targets for each partner segment (Publishers, KOLs, KOCs, Influencers, etc.). Job Description: Job Purpose The Senior Expert, Claims, will play a critical role in setting up and managing the claims function for a newly established life insurance company. This role is responsible for developing claims processes, defining Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs), collaborating with IT to implement claims management systems, working with reinsurers on claims policies, and establishing strong partnerships with third-party service providers such as medical panels and claims investigators. The Senior Expert, Claims, will also work closely with Techcombank to integrate data insights and ensure a seamless claims experience for customers. Key Responsibilities Claims Process Setup & SOP Development - Develop and implement Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for claims processing, ensuring efficiency and compliance. - Design end-to-end claims workflows, from claim submission to assessment, approval, and payment. - Ensure alignment of claims processes with regulatory requirements and industry best practices. Collaboration with IT & Digital Transformation - Define business requirements for IT teams to implement a digital claims management system. - Work with IT and digital teams to integrate claims automation tools and AI-driven claims assessment models. - Ensure seamless integration of claims processing with policy administration and customer service platforms. Claims Risk Management & Reinsurance Coordination - Collaborate with reinsurance companies to define claims handling guidelines and facultative claims assessment. - Establish governance frameworks for claims risk monitoring and fraud detection. - Work closely with actuarial and underwriting teams to ensure claims trends inform future risk assessment strategies. Stakeholder Engagement & Collaboration with Techcombank - Engage with Techcombank’s distribution and risk teams to develop claims service standards that meet customer expectations. - Work on data integration between Techcombank and the insurance company to ensure smooth claims verification and settlement. - Provide training and support to distribution teams on claims procedures and fraud detection measures. Collaboration with Third-Party Service Providers - Establish and manage relationships with third-party medical panels, hospitals, clinics, and claims investigation firms. - Negotiate and monitor service level agreements (SLAs) with external partners to ensure high-quality claims services. - Ensure that external medical evaluations and claims assessments support the company’s risk management objectives. Customer-Centric Claims Experience - Develop a customer-friendly claims process that balances risk management with a smooth and transparent experience. - Implement digital solutions to allow self-service claims submission, tracking, and updates for customers. - Continuously monitor claims turnaround times and propose improvements to enhance customer satisfaction. Performance Monitoring & Continuous Improvement - Define and track key performance indicators (KPIs) for claims processing efficiency, fraud detection, and settlement ratios. - Analyze claims data to identify trends, potential risks, and areas for process optimization. - Ensure that claims policies evolve based on claims experience and market trends.
Job Requirements: Qualifications and Experience Education - Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Business Administration, Finance, Insurance, Law, or a related field. Experience - Minimum of 7-10 years of experience in life insurance claims management, including experience in setting up claims processes and guidelines. - Experience working with reinsurance companies on claims policies and facultative claims support. - Proven track record in digital transformation of claims operations, including automation and system implementation. - Strong experience in managing third-party claims service providers, including medical panels and claims investigators. - Exposure to bancassurance operations and an understanding of financial data integration to support claims processing. Skills & Competencies - Claims Management & Risk Assessment – Expertise in designing claims policies and handling complex claims cases. - Regulatory & Compliance Knowledge – Strong understanding of Vietnam’s insurance claims regulations and legal frameworks. - IT & Data Integration – Experience in working with IT teams to implement claims automation and digital claims processing. - Reinsurance & Fraud Prevention – Ability to collaborate with reinsurers to ensure risk-appropriate claims handling and fraud mitigation. - Stakeholder & Third-Party Management – Strong skills in engaging with Techcombank, reinsurers, and medical service providers. - Customer-Centric Approach – Ability to balance efficient risk management with an excellent customer experience in claims processing. Personal Attributes - Detail-Oriented & Analytical – Strong ability to assess claims cases with precision and accuracy. - Proactive & Strategic Thinker – Capable of setting up claims processes from scratch while anticipating future challenges. - Customer-Focused – Ensures claims operations are transparent, efficient, and customer-friendly. - Leadership & Initiative – Capable of driving claims transformation and operational setup in a startup environment. - Collaborative & Solution-Oriented – Works effectively with internal teams, reinsurers, and third-party service providers.

Company: Công Ty Cp Vàng Bạc Đá Quý Phú Nhuận - Pnj
Job Description: The CX Leader will oversee and drive all customer experience (CX) projects, ensuring a seamless and exceptional customer journey across all touchpoints. This role requires a strategic thinker with a passion for creating impactful CX initiatives and the ability to lead cross-functional teams to deliver results aligned with the company's vision and customer-centric values. 1. Project Oversight and Management Lead and oversee the execution of CX projects from conception to completion.Define project scope, deliverables, and KPIs to measure the success of CX initiatives. Monitor project timelines, budgets, and resources to ensure timely and cost-effective delivery. Collaborate with internal teams, such as marketing, operations, and sales, to ensure seamless execution of CX projects. 2. Customer Insights and Data Analysis Collect and analyze customer feedback, surveys, and behavioral data to identify trends and insights. Utilize data to design and implement customer-centric solutions and improvements. Report on CX metrics such as NPS, CSAT, customer retention, and engagement to evaluate project effectiveness. 3. Team Leadership and Collaboration Manage and guide a team of CX professionals to deliver high-quality projects and initiatives. Facilitate collaboration between departments to ensure consistency in delivering customer experiences. Provide training and support to employees on CX best practices and standards. 4. Innovation and Continuous Improvement Stay updated on emerging CX trends, technologies, and best practices to maintain a competitive edge. Benchmark against industry leaders and competitors to introduce innovative CX solutions. Continuously review and optimize processes and touchpoints to elevate the customer experience.
Job Requirements: Education: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Customer Experience, or a related field. Master’s degree is a plus. Experience: 5+ years of experience in customer experience management, project management, or a related role, preferably in retail or consumer-facing industries. Proven track record of successfully managing CX initiatives and delivering measurable results. Skills and Competencies: Strong project management and organizational skills, with experience using tools such as Asana, Trello, or similar platforms. Analytical mindset with expertise in data analysis and interpretation. Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills to influence stakeholders at all levels. Creative problem-solving abilities with a focus on customer-centric solutions. Knowledge of CX metrics and frameworks (e.g., NPS, CSAT, CES). Key Competencies Leadership: Ability to inspire and lead cross-functional teams effectively. Strategic Thinking: Capacity to align CX strategies with business objectives. Customer-Centricity: Passionate about understanding and exceeding customer expectations. Adaptability: Thrives in a dynamic environment and embraces change.

Job Description: Category: Beauty. Report to: Beauty General Manager. Location: 555 3/2 Street, Ward 8, District 10, Ho Chi Minh City. Working time: 8:30 AM to 5:30 PM (Monday – Friday) and 8:30 - 12:30 (Saturday Morning). I. Career Objective: The Demand Planning Manager is responsible for forecasting demand, managing inventory, overseeing import and export processes, and closely collaborating with Sales & Marketing to optimize stock levels and ensure product availability to drive sales. This role plays a crucial part in balancing supply and demand, optimizing the supply chain to ensure an effective merchandise strategy, minimizing waste, and maximizing profitability for the company. II. Responsibilities: 1. Demand Forecasting & Supply Planning: Collect and analyze sales data, market trends, and marketing programs to accurately forecast demand for each product line. Develop a demand planning model to optimize inventory levels and prevent stock shortages or overages. Adjust supply plans based on sales performance, seasonal trends, marketing campaigns, and feedback from the Sales Team. Collaborate with different departments to ensure forecasts align with actual market conditions, optimizing costs and operational efficiency. 2. Inventory Management & Product Flow Optimization: Monitor and analyze inventory levels by SKU, expiration dates, and product lifecycle to develop appropriate replenishment plans. Work closely with Sales & Marketing to optimize stock levels, ensuring sufficient supply for major campaigns without excessive inventory. Develop clearance stock strategies, manage near-expiry products, and minimize the risk of unsold inventory. Coordinate with Finance to control warehousing costs, stock turnover rates, and merchandise budget management. 3. Import-Export & Supply Chain Management: Supervise import-export processes, liaising with suppliers, customs, and logistics providers to ensure timely shipments and compliance with legal regulations. Handle certification procedures, tariff duties, and import licenses for international products. Monitor transportation status and proactively address potential logistics and supply chain risks. Work with suppliers to streamline the import process, reducing lead times. 4. Collaboration with Sales & Marketing to Optimize Inventory & Boost Sales: Work closely with Sales & Marketing to accurately forecast product demand for promotional programs and new product launches. Propose discount campaigns, bundle promotions, and clearance sales to optimize inventory levels and drive sales. Assist in developing regional distribution plans, ensuring product availability at key sales locations. Coordinate with the marketing team to ensure adequate product supply for digital marketing campaigns, retail activations, and events.
Job Requirements: 1. Experience: Minimum 5-7 years of experience in Demand Planning, Supply Chain, Inventory Management, or Logistics, preferably in FMCG, cosmetics, or retail industries. 2. Education: Bachelor's degree in Logistics, Supply Chain, Economics, Business Administration, or related fields. 3. Technical Skills: Strong knowledge of demand forecasting, inventory management, and supply chain operations. Experience working with ERP systems (SAP, Oracle, Microsoft Dynamics) and forecasting tools (Excel, Power BI, Tableau; Python is a plus). Understanding of import-export processes, customs regulations, and international logistics. Ability to analyze data, optimize inventory levels, and improve stock turnover rates. Experience collaborating with Sales & Marketing teams to plan inventory for sales campaigns. 4. Soft Skills: Strong data analysis and decision-making skills based on insights. Excellent communication and cross-functional collaboration to achieve business goals. Project management and problem-solving skills to handle challenges effectively.
Industry: Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ

Company: Triumph International Vietnam Co., Ltd.
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Du Lịch', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: PURPOSE OF THE JOB To oversee and drive the performance of stores within the assigned region by achieving sales growth, ensuring operational excellence, developing high-performing teams, and delivering exceptional customer experiences. This role ensures alignment with the company’s strategic goals and retail standards while maintaining profitability and customer satisfaction GENERAL DUTIES and RESPONSIBILITIES 1/ Sales & Performance Management - Achieve and exceed the region’s sales targets, profitability goals, and other KPIs (e.g., UPT, VPT, and conversion rates). - Regularly analyze sales reports and performance data, identifying areas of improvement and developing actionable plans - Monitor footfall and customer behavior to optimize in-store strategies and promotions - Collaborate with the e-commerce team to support omnichannel initiatives like click-and-collect or in-store pickups 2/ Operational Excellence - Ensure adherence to global retail operational standards, including inventory management, visual merchandising, and customer service protocols - Conduct weekly store audits to ensure compliance with store standards, promotional execution, and corporate policies - Partner with cross-functional teams (e.g., Marketing, Merchandising, and Supply Chain) to implement tailored promotional campaigns - Drive sustainability initiatives, such as energy efficiency and waste reduction, in line with company objectives 3/ Team Leadership and Development - Recruit, train, and develop store managers and sales advisors to create high-performing teams - Provide coaching and feedback to store managers, focusing on leadership skills and operational excellence - Conduct regular performance reviews and appraisals, ensuring alignment with company goals - Foster a collaborative and positive working environment, promoting teamwork, creativity, and respect 4/ Customer-Centric Focus: - Monitor customer feedback through reviews, surveys, and mystery shopper reports to continuously improve customer experiences - Address escalated customer complaints and ensure timely resolution. - Implement initiatives to increase customer retention and loyalty in collaboration with the marketing team 5/ Retail Expansion and Strategy - Identify potential locations for new stores and provide recommendations for store openings or closures - Assist in planning and executing store openings, refurbishments, and relocations - Develop and implement tailored strategies to outpace competitors and increase market share. KEY INTERFACES [For Internal interface list Department, Position and specify Activity in Area of Interface Internal key customers Finance Department , Product Management Departments, Advertising & Promotion Department, HR, Demand Planning, Expansion, Procurement, Logistic, Brand Advisor, Sales Teams External key customers Landlord, Properties Management, Local Authority... Key performance indicators (KPI) Sales growth (monthly, quarterly, and yearly) compared to targets. Improvement in customer experience metrics (e.g., Net Promoter Score, mystery shopper results Operational compliance rates (e.g., inventory turnover, VM standards, and store audits). Staff performance metrics (e.g., training completion, attrition rates, and productivity). Execution and ROI of promotional campaigns and omnichannel initiatives.
Job Requirements: Professional Experience: Minimum of 2+ years’ experience in multi-store retail management. Proven track record of driving sales growth and operational excellence in a fast-paced retail environment. Experience in managing omnichannel operations and cross-functional teams. Strong negotiation and relationship management skills. EDUCATION REQUIREMENTS Education Requirements: Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Retail Management, or a related field. Additional certifications in leadership, retail operations, or business analytics are a plus. OTHER REQUIREMENTS Leadership: Ability to inspire and lead diverse teams toward achieving company goals. Data-Driven Decision Making: Proficiency in using sales and operational data to identify trends and opportunities. Customer-Centric Mindset: Strong focus on enhancing customer satisfaction and loyalty. Negotiation Skills: Expertise in securing favorable lease terms and vendor agreements. Technology Proficiency: Familiarity with retail software, POS systems, and inventory management tools. Adaptability: Resilience and flexibility to navigate change and thrive in a dynamic environment. personal qualities Integrity and professionalism Strategic and critical thinking Strong communication and interpersonal skills Passion for retail excellence NOTE This Job Description is not intended to be all-inclusive. Employees may perform other related duties as negotiated to meet the ongoing needs of the organization
Industry: Bán hàng / Kinh doanh

Company: Edupia
Job Description: 1. Thông tin sản phẩm: Edupia Tutor là Chương trình Gia Sư Tiếng Anh chất lượng cao cùng Giáo viên có thành tích giảng dạy xuất sắc được chọn lọc kĩ lưỡng từ các trường sư phạm, ngoại ngữ hàng đầu trên toàn quốc, và đặc biệt nhiều kinh nghiệm chinh chiến các bài thi của Học Sinh Giỏi, chuyển cấp THCS, THPT. Là chương trình Tiếng Anh online với thành tích xuất sắc, chất lượng là ưu tiên hàng đầu trong lớp học gia sư EDUPIA, chương trình thiết kế giúp con đạt chuẩn đầu ra theo hệ Cambridge quốc tế. 2. Mô tả công việc: - Liên hệ, tư vấn bán khoá học online cho phụ huynh, học sinh theo nguồn data có sẵn, tỉ lệ chốt cao (30%) - Chịu trách nhiệm và đảm bảo doanh số được giao.
Job Requirements: - Nữ, có tối thiểu 6 tháng kinh nghiệm Telesale/sale các ngành nghề - Độ tuổi : 1992-2002 - Tinh thần thái độ tốt, xông pha, chăm chỉ - Tư duy nhanh nhẹn - Đam mê kiếm tiền, mục tiêu phát triển sự nghiệp trong nghề Telesale QUYỀN LỢI ĐẶC BIỆT CỦA TELESALE TẠI EDUPIA TUTOR: 1. Thu nhập cao, rõ ràng nhất trong các Công ty cùng ngành: - Thu nhập hàng tháng từ 13 - 30 triệu+++/tháng, bao gốm: + Lương cứng 9-13 triệu. + Hoa hồng: 2 - 9%. Thử việc hưởng 100% lương và hoa hồng. - Thưởng liên tục: thưởng nóng, thưởng best Seller, thưởng tăng tốc theo tuần, tháng, năm. - Đánh giá điều chỉnh tăng lương 2 tháng/ lần, 6 lần/ năm. - Ứng viên tại Edupia Tutor sẽ được: Cung cấp 100% data, không cần tìm kiếm khách hàng. Được trang bị máy tính, tai nghe, làm việc trên hệ thống CRM tiện dụng để liên hệ với khách hàng. 2. Thăng tiến: - Có cơ hội được thăng tiến lên Topsale, Trưởng nhóm (quản lý 10 Telesale) chỉ sau 3 tháng làm việc; Cơ hội thăng tiến lên Trưởng/ Phó Phòng Telesale (quản lý 20-30 Telesale) chỉ sau 6 tháng làm việc. - Được bán các sản phẩm tiếng Anh online chất lượng cao dẫn đầu thị trường Việt Nam. - Topsale được ưu tiên về data bán mới khi thiếu doanh số. - Được chủ trì các cuộc họp chuyên môn nhằm nâng cao kĩ năng cho Telesale cấp phòng. 3. Quyền lợi khác: - Được tặng bộ sản phẩm học Tiếng Anh online trọn đời ngay khi nhận việc tại Edupia. - Thưởng tháng 13, thưởng Lễ/ Tết - BHXH đầy đủ theo luật lao động, nghỉ phép 12 ngày/năm và các ngày lễ - Văn phòng đẹp, tiện nghi, hiện đại - Du lịch hàng năm với địa điểm hấp dẫn, thường xuyên tổ chức các hoạt động team building gắn kết cộng đồng, các hoạt động vui chơi giải trí cho nhân viên. - Môi trường làm việc trẻ trung, năng động với chính sách đãi ngộ tốt, có nhiều cơ hội nâng cao năng lực bản thân và tăng thêm thu nhập.
Industry: Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Tư vấn , Dịch vụ khách hàng

Company: Công Ty Tnhh Một Thành Viên Đầu Tư Và Phát Triển  Giáo Dục Nhân Văn
Job Description: Job Purpose : Responsible for developing and implementing B2C, B2B(*) sales strategies to attract and maintain relationships with high-income clients and partners, driving revenue growth for the school. Key Responsibilities : Develop and execute B2B sales strategy : Create long-term and short-term sales strategies to target and convert businesses, organizations, and high-income families for student enrollment at the school. Analyze the market and competitors to propose effective sales solutions. Manage and maintain client relationships : Build and maintain long-term relationships with business partners and target clients. Update customer information and needs to propose suitable educational solutions. Work closely with the Marketing Manager : Collaborate with the Marketing Manager to optimize marketing campaigns that support sales efforts. Provide market insights, customer feedback, and campaign results to adjust the sales strategy. Meet and exceed revenue targets : Set sales targets for the team and oversee their execution. Ensure revenue goals are met through effective sales strategies and exploiting new business opportunities. Report and analyze sales performance : Regularly report on sales results, business opportunities, and client status to the Marketing Manager. Analyze sales data to adjust strategies and improve results. Organize and participate in events and seminars : Organize and attend events related to student enrollment, school introductions, and educational programs. Build partnerships with organizations and businesses with potential for collaboration.
Job Requirements: At least 3-5 years of experience in sales, especially B2B experience Preferably in the education industry. Strong skills in building and maintaining client relationships, especially with high-income clients. Good leadership and team management skills, with the ability to drive the team to achieve and exceed targets. Ability to work closely with other departments (Marketing, Finance, etc.) to achieve common goals. Excellent communication and negotiation skills with the ability to engage with large partners. Proficient in MS Office, CRM tools, and sales data analysis. Bachelor’s degree or higher, preferably in Business Administration, Marketing, Education, or related fields.
Industry: Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Giáo dục / Đào tạo , Bảo hiểm

Company: Ngân Hàng Tmcp Kỹ Thương Việt Nam (Techcombank)
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Du Lịch', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: Job Purpose The Product Development Senior Expert is responsible for leading the design, development, and implementation of innovative life insurance products. This role requires a strategic thinker with a deep understanding of market trends, customer needs, and regulatory requirements to drive product profitability and competitiveness. Main Responsibilities Product Innovation and Development - Lead the end-to-end product development process, from ideation to market launch, ensuring alignment with company strategy and customer needs. - Conduct comprehensive market research and competitor analysis to identify opportunities for new product offerings and enhancements. - Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including actuarial, legal, operations, and IT, to develop product specifications, policy wordings, and system requirements. Project Management - Oversee multiple product development projects simultaneously, ensuring timely delivery and adherence to quality standards. - Develop and manage detailed project plans, budgets, and timelines, coordinating with internal and external stakeholders. Stakeholder Collaboration and Training - Work closely with sales, marketing, and distribution teams to develop effective go-to-market strategies and promotional materials. - Provide training and support to sales and customer service teams, ensuring a thorough understanding of product features and benefits. Regulatory Compliance and Documentation - Ensure all products comply with local regulatory requirements and company policies. - Prepare and submit necessary documentation for product approvals and filings with regulatory bodies. Performance Monitoring and Continuous Improvement - Monitor product performance metrics, analyzing data to assess profitability, customer satisfaction, and market competitiveness. - Gather feedback from customers and sales teams to identify areas for product improvement and innovation.
Job Requirements: Qualifications and Experience Education - Bachelor's degree in Business, Finance, Insurance, Marketing, or a related field. Experience - 5-8 years of experience in life insurance product development, with a proven track record of successful product launches. - Demonstrated experience in project management and cross-functional team collaboration. Skills - Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, with a creative approach to product innovation. - Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, capable of influencing stakeholders at all levels. - Proficiency in market research methodologies and data analysis. - Familiarity with regulatory requirements and compliance processes in the life insurance industry. - Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously, delivering results within set timelines. This role is pivotal in driving the company's product strategy, ensuring a competitive edge in the market through innovative and customer-centric life insurance solutions.
Industry: Ngân hàng , Tài chính / Đầu tư , Bảo hiểm

Company: Bss Group
Job Description: BSS Group is a trusted leader in full-service eCommerce solutions. Since 2012, we have specialized in delivering cutting-edge solutions for Magento and Shopify merchants, operating across eight brands and serving customers in 150+ countries. We are looking for a Marketing Leader to play a key role in managing marketing projects of our new business unit, driving our ecosystem brand expansion and maximizing global impact. This position requires a strategic thinker with deep expertise in marketing disciplines and the ability to lead in-house and/or clients’ teams effectively. Key Responsibilities 1. Project-based Team Management: Lead and manage the marketing projects to serve in-house/clients’ objectives. Build, develop, and oversee the performance of team members. Ensure team members are aligned on goals, priorities, and execution plans. 2. Marketing Strategy & Performance Analytics: Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitive landscape to guide strategic decision-making. Develop comprehensive marketing plans and KPIs that integrate various channels and strategies. Continuously utilize project performance based on data analytics. 3. Collaboration & Report: Work cross-functionally with other teams (e.g., sales, product, operations) to align marketing strategies with broader goals. Represent the marketing team in meetings with managers and C-level executives for performance reports and strategic recommendations.
Job Requirements: At least 2 years of experience in leading a marketing team or managing marketing projects with proven results, preferably in SaaS, eCommerce, or marketing agency environments. Expertise in at least one core marketing discipline (content, SEO, PPC, etc.). Good planning and organizational skills, with demonstrated expertise in developing and executing detailed marketing strategies. Ability to prioritize tasks, manage timelines, and drive performance in a fast-paced environment. Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English. IELTS 7.0 or above. Proficient in managing, collecting, and analyzing data to drive actionable insights and optimize marketing performance.
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing

Company: Công Ty Tnhh Msc Việt Nam
Job Description: Collaborate with the Trade Manager to develop trade plans and strategies, considering market movements such as rates, vessel capacity, and client requests. Analyze trade data and trends to identify opportunities for cargo lifting, ocean freight improvement, or new products on the trades. Maintain and update freight rates and tariffs based on spot/NACs rates and contractual/long-term agreements. Coordinate with sales and freighting teams to ensure accurate and competitive pricing for all DCAs/IFF. Monitor capacity and space management within allocations given by Geneva/Regional to ensure optimal utilization. Act as a primary point of contact for MSC GVA, MSC Regional, and other MSC Agents to resolve specific issues and problems. Communicate with local stakeholders on GVA/RO directions, strategies, and goals. Achieve budget volume, revenue, and goals for the respective trade. Update prospects on market activities and trade performance, following GVA guidelines on budget volume-driven policy. Monitor space allocation versus booking on each feeder/M/V and coordinate with the ispace team, Transshipment Department, and Capacity team. Monitor cargo selection and yield management to ensure a balance of high/low paying cargo for respective trades daily. Participate in weekly meetings with the Sales team and check daily booking performance to update on trade performance and relevant issues. Prepare, review, and ensure weekly, monthly, and quarterly reports are accurate and submitted in a timely manner to respective management. Work closely with various internal departments, such as operations, logistics, VAS, finance, and HR, to ensure effective coordination and alignment of trade activities. Participate in cross-functional projects and initiatives as required. Perform any duties as assigned by the Trade Manager or Commercial Director
Job Requirements: Key Experience & Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Business, Logistics, Supply Chain Management, or a related field. Proven experience in trade management, logistics, or a related field. Experience in the shipping or logistics industry. Knowledge of international trade regulations and compliance Key Competencies & Skills Strong analytical skills and the ability to interpret trade data and trends. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams. Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and trade management software. Strong organizational and time management skills.
Industry: Xuất nhập khẩu , Vận chuyển / Giao nhận / Kho vận

Company: Công Ty Tnhh Mathpresso Việt Nam
Job Description: The Senior Digital Marketing Executive at QANDA Study plays a key role in building and implementing digital marketing strategies to promote the company's products and services, aiming to increase growth and brand awareness. The job includes: Planning and Campaign Implementation: Develop overall and detailed digital marketing plans for each stage, product, or specific campaign. Implement, manage, and optimize multi-channel advertising campaigns on platforms: Facebook, Google Ads (Search, Display, YouTube), Zalo Ads, Coc Coc, TikTok, and other channels suitable for the target audience. Ensure campaigns are executed on schedule, achieve high efficiency, and adhere to the approved budget. Work closely with the Content Marketing team, Designers, and related departments to create advertising campaigns with engaging content, suitable for the target audience and consistent with the brand message. Analysis, Reporting, and Optimization: Monitor, measure, and analyze the effectiveness of marketing campaigns using data analysis tools (Google Analytics, Facebook Analytics, etc.). Evaluate campaign performance based on established KPIs (CPA, ROI, ROAS, Conversion Rate, Reach, Engagement, etc.). Prepare periodic reports and propose optimization solutions based on analysis results to improve campaign performance and optimize costs. Control and optimize advertising costs within the allocated budget, ensuring maximum efficiency. Supporting Other Marketing Activities: Support the organization of events, seminars, PR activities, and other offline marketing activities (if any). Work with partners, agencies, and marketing service providers (if any). Contribute ideas and propose new marketing strategies based on market trends and customer needs.
Job Requirements: Minimum 3 years of experience working as a Digital Marketing professional, preferably with experience in the online education field. In-depth knowledge of Digital Marketing channels and online advertising tools (Facebook Ads, YouTube Ads, Google Ads, Zalo Ads, TikTok Ads, etc.). Experience in implementing and optimizing multi-channel advertising campaigns, achieving set KPIs. Good data analysis skills, proficient in using analysis tools (Google Analytics, Facebook Analytics, etc.). Project management, teamwork, and effective independent working skills. Proactive, highly responsible in work, ensuring a thorough understanding of product/program information and completing tasks on time. Eager to learn, proactive in seeking new knowledge, willing to receive feedback, and adaptable to a dynamic and ever-changing startup environment.
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing
