Job Title: Chuyên Viên Xử Lý Khiếu Nại - Ban Tiếp Thị
Company: Công Ty Cp Du Lịch Và Tiếp Thị Gtvt Việt Nam- Vietravel
Job Description: ​ Ứng viên sẽ đảm nhiệm các công việc chính sau: Loyalty: Xây dựng và triển khai chương trình khách hàng thân thiết. Quản lý hệ thống phần mềm và công cụ hỗ trợ chương trình Loyalty. Phân tích dữ liệu khách hàng, đánh giá hiệu quả và đề xuất cải tiến. Phối hợp với các bộ phận liên quan để triển khai chiến dịch Marketing. Theo dõi xu hướng thị trường và nghiên cứu đối thủ cạnh tranh. Data KH: Thu thập, xử lý và phân tích dữ liệu khách hàng từ nhiều nguồn. Phân khúc khách hàng, xây dựng chân dung khách hàng. Xây dựng báo cáo, dashboard và trực quan hóa dữ liệu. Đề xuất giải pháp và chiến lược dựa trên dữ liệu. CSADS: Quản lý các kênh tương tác với khách hàng (tổng đài, email, chat, mạng xã hội...). Xây dựng và quản lý nội dung CSKH trên tất cả các kênh. Đảm bảo chất lượng dịch vụ và đáp ứng các tiêu chuẩn CSKH. Phân tích dữ liệu, đánh giá hiệu quả hoạt động của các kênh CSKH. Đề xuất giải pháp cải thiện chất lượng dịch vụ.
Job Requirements: Tốt nghiệp Đại học chuyên ngành Marketing, Quản trị Kinh doanh, Thống kê, Dữ liệu, Công nghệ thông tin, Truyền thông hoặc các ngành liên quan. Có kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực CSKH, Loyalty, Data hoặc Marketing. Thành thạo CRM và các công cụ, phần mềm liên quan. Sức khỏe tốt, ngoại hình dễ nhìn, tác phong chuyên nghiệp Kỹ năng giao tiếp, phân tích và giải quyết vấn đề tốt. Có khả năng làm việc độc lập và làm việc theo nhóm, chịu được áp lực công việc Biết lắng nghe, thấu hiểu, cẩn thận, tỉ mỉ, độc lập, có thể giải quyết vấn đề nhanh
Industry: Du lịch , Dịch vụ khách hàng , Tư vấn

Company: Soctrip
Job Description: About Us : Soctrip.com is a vibrant and rapidly growing ecosystem platform, dedicated to connecting people worldwide and fostering a community of exploration and discovery. Our platform serves as a community for users to share experiences, discover new destinations, and connect with like-minded individuals. Why join Us: We offer an experience that transcends traditional social networking platforms. At its core, our platform integrates a comprehensive array of services including Online Travel Agency (OTA), Food service, and E-commerce, providing users with a seamless and enriching ecosystem for both social interaction and practical needs. We facilitates effortless travel planning, allowing users to book flights, accommodations, and activities with ease, all within the same platform where they connect with friends and family. The Food service brings together culinary enthusiasts and food lovers, enabling them to discover new recipes, share cooking tips, and even order food delivery directly through the platform. Meanwhile, the Shopping feature empowers users to explore a vast marketplace, discover unique products, and make purchases in our ecosystem. What will you do Create and execute robust growth marketing strategies aimed at boosting user acquisition , engagement, and retention. Leverage data-driven insights to pinpoint optimization opportunities and enhance performance across all marketing channels. Oversee and refine digital advertising campaigns on multiple platforms. Implement A/B testing and experimentation to improve conversion rates, user experience, and overall campaign effectiveness. Work collaboratively with product, design, and engineering teams to introduce innovative marketing initiatives. Analyze key performance metrics and provide regular updates on campaign outcomes, highlighting trends and insights to guide future strategies. Stay current with industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in growth marketing to foster innovation and maintain a competitive edge. Manage marketing budgets effectively to ensure optimal resource allocation and maximize return on investment. Keep abreast of advancements in digital marketing tools and platforms, recommending adoption as needed.
Job Requirements: What you will need Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field; advanced degree preferred. Proven track record of success in driving user acquisition and revenue growth through digital marketing channels. Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data, analyze trends, and identify insights to inform decision-making. At least 10 years' experience of managing and optimizing digital advertising campaigns in E-commerce, social networking or OTA industry. Adept at A/B testing and experimentation methodologies to optimize campaign performance. Excellent communication skills with the ability to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams. Creative thinker with a passion for innovation and problem-solving. Results-oriented mindset with a focus on driving measurable business outcomes. Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Tiếp thị trực tuyến

Company: Savills Vietnam
Job Description: C&B Operation: Accountable for developing, implementing and revising the overall C&B structure and policies in line with company objectives, HR policies and labor law to deliver C&B operations. Monitor payroll process including checking timesheet, payrolls (estimation and actual), cost comparison and reports Monitor PIT process and reports. Monitor compulsory insurance data and reports. Monitor bonus calculation and reports. Conduct salary and benefits survey (Mercer methodology) Support in salary review process Design and develop different schemes for variable remuneration packages, including pay structure, bonus, benefits. Prepare annual staff cost budget, including monthly, quarterly review and reporting. Remain up-to-date with laws and regulations in relation to payroll, tax and other legislative requirements, support peers on the implementation of company policies, programs, and initiatives. Manage the master data of employees, including data entry, updates, and storage of personal records for all employees. Monitor labor contract renewals process and record. Employee relation: Handle labor issues, disciplinary procedures (if any). Communicate policies pertaining to contracts, bonus, compensation, and benefits… Investigate and resolve employee complaints and grievances. Conduct exit interviews and provide feedback to management to analyze the turnover rate. Manage employee discipline and performance improvement processes. Performance Management: Manage the performance appraisal process, including communication, training.. Leadership task: Supervise and mentor a team of compensation and benefits professionals, providing coaching, training, and development opportunities. Collaborate with other HR functions, such as Talent Acquisition and Talent Management, Training to support organizational objectives related to talent acquisition and retention. Other tasks as assigned by HR Director.
Job Requirements: Specification: Bachelor's degree or higher in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field. At least 3 years of C&B’s experience in the business size of over 300 headcounts, with at least 1 year in a supervisory role. Manage a team of 2-3 members. Competencies: Strong understanding of compensation principles, Labor law, PIT law, Social Insurance regulation. Familiarity with benefits administration, including health and wellness programs, retirement plans, and insurance policies. Good English communication skills, spoken and written. Hard skill: Must have: Proficient MS: word, excel, powerpoint. Power BI is a plus. Standard C&B Operations such as: Labor Law, Payroll, Insurance, Policies & Procedures, Budget & Planning, PIT,... Nice to have: Total Rewards (salary structure, cost analysis & job evaluation, performance appraisal, recognition, etc.) HR Information System Soft Skill Communication, Solution Focused, Data-driven, Analyzing, Leadership, Change Agile
Industry: Nhân sự

Company: Un-Available Ltd Co.,
Job Description: 1. Team and Project Management · Act as a bridge between technical and business teams, ensuring effective communication and seamless collaboration. · Develop and maintain technical documentation, standards, and team guidelines. · Lead and mentor the technical team, fostering a culture of excellence and accountability. · Plan and prioritize technical tasks to meet project timelines and business objectives. · Manage a small IT team to support business growth and ensure alignment with organizational goals. 2. Technical Oversight & IT Infrastructure Management · Develop and execute a scalable IT infrastructure strategy that ensures business continuity. · Oversee server management (on-premise/cloud), ERP maintenance, and system integrations. · Optimize network performance, IT support, and technology lifecycle management. · Establish standards for database tuning and optimization in SQL-based systems and monitor their implementation. · Define best practices for implementing and managing network/application protocols to ensure secure and efficient operations. · Stay updated on advancements in the .NET technical stack and guide the team in integrating relevant technologies effectively. · Ensure IT infrastructure readiness to support AI and automation tools. 3. IT Governance, Data Security & Compliance · Establish cybersecurity protocols, monitor threats, and ensure data protection. · Develop IT policies and SOPs to ensure compliance with internal and external regulations. · Maintain compliance with ISO 27001, GDPR, and other relevant IT security standards. · Conduct regular IT audits to identify risks and areas for improvement. · Maintain vendor relationships for IT services, software, and hardware procurement. 4. System Monitoring, Maintenance & IT Operations · Ensure the ERP system’s operational health through proactive monitoring, incident management, and performance tuning. · Develop contingency plans and implement disaster recovery protocols to mitigate risks. · Maintain a clean and modular codebase, adhering to best practices in software development and maintenance. · Manage ERP systems, email security, cloud storage, and access control policies. · Lead troubleshooting and IT support for internal teams, ensuring smooth collaboration between IT and other departments. 5. Collaboration with Innovation & Business Teams · Work closely with the Innovation team to integrate AI and automation tools securely. · Assess feasibility, security risks, and infrastructure requirements for new software. · Ensure IT systems are adaptable to support future technological advancements. 6. Leadership & IT Team Development · Provide training and security awareness programs for all employees. · Establish IT governance policies to maintain best practices and compliance. 7. Track Technology Systems Performance & Reporting · System Performance & Uptime – Track server health, network stability, and downtime incidents. · Security & Cyber Threats – Monitor and report threats, vulnerabilities, and resolution steps. · Data Management – Assess backup status, data storage capacity, and system reliability. · IT Support Metrics – Measure response times, key technical issues, and resolution rates.
Job Requirements: Required Technical Skills: Expertise in designing and leading projects using the .NET stack (C#, ASP.NET Webform, Entity Framework). Experience in optimizing SQL-based systems, including query tuning and database architecture. Familiarity with modern front-end frameworks (React/Angular) is a plus. Deep understanding of system architecture, network/application protocols, and security principles (RBAC, authentication/authorization, network security, data protection strategies). Proficiency in building and maintaining high-availability systems. Familiarity with manufacturing workflows, supply chain processes, and inventory systems, particularly in the garment industry, is highly desirable. Other Skills and Qualifications: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to evaluate technical challenges and recommend effective solutions. Exceptional communication skills to liaise between technical and non-technical teams. Experience in managing cross-functional teams and driving technical projects. Fluency in English is an advantage. Preferred Experience: Minimum 5-7 years of experience in IT management, system architecture, and project leadership. Proven experience in managing ERP and cloud-based IT systems. Hands-on experience with IT security protocols and compliance measures. Track record of working with business teams to align IT with organizational goals
Industry: CNTT - Phần cứng / Mạng , CNTT - Phần mềm

Company: Vantage Logistics Corporation
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Du Lịch', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: Analyze internal processes and propose AI application solutions to automate tasks and enhance efficiency. Collaborate with departments to analyze internal workflows and identify AI automation opportunities. Develop and optimize AI prompts to help employees utilize AI effectively. Train and guide employees on applying AI in their daily tasks. Implement AI in functional operations and data analysis tasks. Ensure AI provides accurate information and minimizes errors. Stay updated with the latest AI technologies such as OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, Midjourney, and Copilot AI. Experiment with and propose AI solutions to optimize productivity across departments. Support the testing and deployment of AI applications in logistics and transportation operations. Perform other tasks as assigned by direct management.
Job Requirements: Education: Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Data Science, or a related field. Experience: At least 1 year of experience in utilizing and applying AI in practical work. Understanding of AI operations and real-world business applications. Knowledge & Skills: In-depth knowledge of ChatGPT, Claude, Midjourney, Gemini, Copilot AI, and other AI tools. Strong analytical thinking, experimentation, and AI prompt optimization skills. Preferred candidates with experience in AI implementation in logistics and transportation. Age: 22 - 35 years old. BENEFITS: Salary: Negotiable. Holiday and Tet bonuses, wedding/funeral allowances, 13th-month salary, and annual salary review. Opportunities for specialized training and professional development through company projects. Professional and friendly working environment. Social insurance as per regulations. Company trips, team-building activities, and year-end parties. Working hours: Monday to Saturday morning. (Morning: 08:00 - 12:00 | Afternoon: 13:00 - 17:30) Work location: Tower A (Officetel), Rivergate Residence, 151-155 Bến Vân Đồn, Ward 6, District 4, Ho Chi Minh City.
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , CNTT - Phần mềm , Xuất nhập khẩu

Company: Công Ty Tnhh Daesang Việt Nam
Job Description: Our company is one of the fastest growing packaged food company in Vietnam. To maximize the growth and find the new opportunity, we are seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented Strategic Planning and Intelligence Specialist. This role will focus on finding a new business opportunity and long term growth strategies. The ideal candidate will possess strong analytical skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.This role offers a unique opportunity to shape the company's future through data-driven strategies 1. Market Analysis Conduct in-depth market research to understand consumer behavior, market demands, and potential risks Analyze the market trends, industry development to identify growth opportunities Establish the Market Database to strengthen Company's Market Intelligence Competence Analyze competitior's investments, assets and corporate activities and "connect the dots” with regard to their strategic intent, plot out potintial next moves. 2. Support Company's Strategic Planning Develop and execute long-term business strategies aligned with corporate mission, vision and goals. Participate in multiple business strategy projects that produce recommendations for addressing major strategic issues, identify major growth opportunities and develop business plans for realizing these opportunities. Create new business cases to be presented to senior management and Board. Monitor and coordinate the vast range of company data to find the possible M&A Candidates 3. Reporting and Presentation Develop, analyze and prepare comprehensive reports and presentations for senior management and Board (Vietnam / Korea) on regular or occasional basis. Provide regular updates on Market intelligence and Industrial updates [Advantages] Career Growth: Opportunities for professional development and international exposure. Supportive Environment: Work in a collaborative and dynamic team in both Vietnam and Korea Impactful Work: Play a key role in shaping the company’s growth in Vietnam
Job Requirements: [Key Qualifications] Experience: 3+ years of experience in FMCG field or Foreign Direct Investment Company. MBA is a plus Education: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Economics, Finance, Marketing or a related field. Technical Skills: Proficiency in MS Office(Powerpoint, Excel, Word). Familiarity with business intelligence tools is an advantage. Communication: Proficiency in English is mandatory, Korean language is an advantage [Competencies] Strategic thinking and analytical skills, with the ability to digest and synthesize large amount of data and information into executive-level reports and documents. Integrity and Reliability: Demonstrates responsibility and consistency in delivering work. Abililty to work effectively with internal Daesang teams and executives. Respect for Others: Values diversity and respects the perspectives and contributions of others. Learning Orientation: Actively seeks opportunities to learn and grow professionally. A “can-do” attituce and tolerance of ambiguity
Industry: Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Thực phẩm & Đồ uống

Job Title: Warehouse Process & System Supervisor (Cu Chi Province)
Company: Techtronic Industries Vietnam Manufacturing Company Limited
Job Description: The Warehouse Process & System Specialist will support the Warehouse Process and System Manager in ensuring operational efficiency, system integrity, and process improvements within the warehouse. This role involves assisting in workflow optimization, process documentation, training facilitation, system management, and inventory control. The specialist will collaborate with cross-functional teams to drive efficiency, reduce errors, and support automation efforts to enhance warehouse operations. KEY RESPONSIBILITIES AND AUTHORITIES 1. Process Optimization - Assist in analyzing warehouse workflows and identifying areas for improvement. - Support the development and implementation of Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs). - Participate in Lean and Six Sigma process improvement initiatives. 2. Training and Process Development: - Assist in developing and conducting training programs for warehouse staff. - Help document warehouse processes and implement error-proofing controls. - Conduct training audits to ensure effectiveness and adherence to established procedures. 3. System Management: - Support the administration of the Warehouse Management System (WMS) and related applications. - Assist in system configuration, updates, and troubleshooting. - Provide user training and technical support for warehouse staff. 4. Inventory Control: - Monitor inventory accuracy through cycle counts and reconciliation activities. 5. Safety and Compliance: - Ensure adherence to warehouse safety protocols and compliance requirements. - Assist in safety training and compliance audits. - Support initiatives to minimize accidents and improve workplace safety. 6. Data Analysis and Reporting: - Help track key performance indicators (KPIs) related to warehouse operations. - Assist in preparing reports on process efficiency, system performance, and operational issues. - Utilize data analytics to identify trends and suggest process enhancements. 7. Collaboration and Communication: - Work closely with warehouse staff, IT, logistics, and other departments to ensure smooth operations. - Facilitate communication between teams to resolve operational issues efficiently. - Participate in meetings and contribute to continuous improvement initiatives.
Job Requirements: REQUIREMENTS Education Bachelor's Degree in Supply Chain Management, Logistics, Business Administration, Engineering, or a related field. Experience Minimum of 2 years in warehouse operations, system management, or process improvement. Knowledge 1. Understanding of warehouse operations, inventory management, and logistics. 2. Familiarity with safety regulations and warehouse compliance standards. 3. Knowledge of Lean, Six Sigma, or other process improvement methodologies (preferred). 4. Awareness of warehouse automation tools and technologies. Functional Skills 1. Proficiency in Warehouse Management Systems (WMS) and ERP software. 2. Ability to analyze data using Excel, Power BI, or similar tools. 3. Problem-solving and troubleshooting skills to support system and process improvements. 4. Strong attention to detail and analytical mindset. 5. At least intermediate level of English proficiency - speaking & understanding. Other Abilities 1. Effective communication and collaboration abilities 2. Adaptability and a continuous improvement mindset. 3. Strong organizational and time management skills.
Industry: Sản xuất / Vận hành sản xuất , Vận chuyển / Giao nhận / Kho vận , Điện / Điện tử / Điện lạnh / Điện công nghiệp

Company: Tập Đoàn Karofi Holding
Job Description: Mục tiêu công việc: Lãnh đạo và hướng dẫn đội ngũ kỹ sư AI trong việc phát triển các giải pháp AI tiên tiến, nhằm cải thiện và mở rộng khả năng của các ứng dụng xử lý giọng nói, trợ lý ảo và quản lý dữ liệu lớn Datalake. Mô tả công việc: Xây dựng và thực hiện chiến lược phát triển AI và Big Data của bộ phận. Quản lý và hướng dẫn đội ngũ kỹ sư AI trong việc thiết kế và triển khai các mô hình học máy và học sâu. Đảm bảo tích hợp dữ liệu Datalake một cách hiệu quả và an toàn. Làm việc chặt chẽ với các bộ phận khác để định hình yêu cầu sản phẩm và đảm bảo các giải pháp AI đáp ứng được mục tiêu kinh doanh. Đánh giá và quản lý rủi ro trong quá trình phát triển sản phẩm. Tạo điều kiện cho việc học tập và phát triển kỹ năng của đội ngũ. Các công việc khác theo yêu cầu của Giám Đốc. Quyền lợi Mức lương cạnh tranh, thỏa thuận theo năng lực; Thử việc hưởng 100% lương; Thời gian làm việc linh hoạt từ T2-T6; Môi trường làm việc trẻ trung, năng động, tài năng; Mức lương cạnh tranh, Review tăng lương 2 lần/năm; Thưởng ngày Lễ/Tết, thưởng KPI, thưởng dự án theo tháng; Ăn chơi du lịch theo tháng + các hoạt động team building; Có cơ hội được đào tạo phát triển và thăng tiến. Địa chỉ làm việc: 9A Thanh Liệt - Thanh Trì - Hà Nội
Job Requirements: Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên, ưu tiên các ngành Công nghệ Thông tin, Khoa học Máy tính hoặc các lĩnh vực liên quan. Kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực AI, đặc biệt là xử lý giọng nói và trợ lý ảo. Hiểu biết sâu rộng về lưu trữ, xử lý và mining dữ liệu lớn trên các nền tảng và dịch vụ đám mây phổ biến như AWS, GCP, Azure Kinh nghiệm quản lý dự án và lãnh đạo đội ngũ kỹ sư. Khả năng giao tiếp và thuyết trình tốt. Có các chứng chỉ chuyên môn liên quan đến AI và Big Data là một lợi thế. Khả năng phân tích dữ liệu và tư duy chiến lược.
Industry: CNTT - Phần mềm

Company: Soctrip
Job Description: 1. Xây dựng & Triển khai Chiến lược Digital Marketing: Xây dựng kế hoạch marketing online tổng thể theo định hướng kinh doanh của công ty. Quản lý và tối ưu hóa các kênh SEO, SEM, Google Ads, Facebook Ads, TikTok Ads, Email Marketing, Affiliate Marketing, Influencer Marketing… Triển khai các chiến dịch branding & performance marketing nhằm tăng traffic, lead, conversion. Xây dựng chiến lược Omni-channel Marketing , đảm bảo sự đồng bộ giữa các kênh online và offline. 2. Quản lý Hiệu suất Quảng cáo & Ngân sách: Lập kế hoạch ngân sách quảng cáo và tối ưu hóa ROAS (Return on Ad Spend), CPA (Cost per Acquisition), CPL (Cost per Lead) . Theo dõi và điều chỉnh chiến lược quảng cáo dựa trên dữ liệu A/B Testing, Customer Insights, Data-driven Decision Making . Đánh giá hiệu quả kênh marketing, tối ưu funnel chuyển đổi (Conversion Funnel) . 3. Quản lý Nội dung & Truyền thông Thương hiệu: Xây dựng và giám sát kế hoạch content marketing, social media marketing, influencer marketing . Quản lý nội dung website, landing pages, blog, email để tối ưu SEO và trải nghiệm người dùng. Phối hợp với team sáng tạo để sản xuất hình ảnh, video, infographics, bài PR phù hợp với từng kênh truyền thông. 4. Phân tích Dữ liệu & Báo cáo Hiệu suất: Theo dõi và phân tích dữ liệu từ Google Analytics, Facebook Business Manager, CRM, Marketing Automation Tools… . Báo cáo KPI định kỳ về traffic, engagement, conversion rate, ROI để đánh giá hiệu quả chiến dịch. Đề xuất chiến lược cải thiện dựa trên phân tích hành vi khách hàng và xu hướng thị trường. 5. Phát triển & Quản lý Đội ngũ Digital Marketing: Xây dựng, đào tạo và quản lý đội ngũ marketing online, bao gồm SEO, Ads, Content, Social, CRM… Phối hợp với các bộ phận Sales, Product, Tech để đảm bảo hiệu suất marketing tối ưu.
Job Requirements: Tốt nghiệp đại học các ngành Marketing, Truyền thông, Quản trị Kinh doanh hoặc lĩnh vực liên quan . Có tối thiểu 4-6 năm kinh nghiệm trong digital marketing, performance marketing hoặc growth marketing . Thành thạo các nền tảng quảng cáo: Google Ads, Facebook Ads, TikTok Ads, Zalo Ads, LinkedIn Ads… Hiểu biết sâu về SEO, SEM, Social Media, CRM, Email Marketing, Marketing Automation . Kinh nghiệm quản lý ngân sách lớn và tối ưu hóa CAC, LTV, ROAS, ROI . Thành thạo công cụ phân tích như Google Analytics, Facebook Business Manager, Google Tag Manager, Data Studio .
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Tiếp thị trực tuyến

Company: Chi Nhánh Công Ty Tnhh Olam Việt Nam Tại Tiến Nga
Job Description: Olam Food Ingredients (ofi) is a global leader offering naturally good food & beverage ingredients and solutions. ofi commenced operations in Vietnam in 1997, setting up its representative office. Since then, we have established an extensive presence across different parts of Vietnam, including our head office in Ho Chi Minh City and regional offices in Binh Dinh, Long An, Dong Nai, Phu Yen, Lamdong and Gialai Provinces. ofi Vietnam is currently the largest exporter of Cashews, Pepper & Instant Coffee in Vietnam, investing in the state-of-the-art instant coffee facility and running 7 large factories with 7,500 employees across Central & South Vietnam. Our operations have an interface with a farmer network of 2 million farmers. We are also amongst the largest exporter of Green Coffee in Vietnam. We have established sustainability programmers for black pepper, coffee & cashew. We are excited about our future prospects in Vietnam as the country has huge potential in agriculture. Objective/Purpose of Job: Execute the business plans for the quarter Develop long term strategy, to increase top line and reduce costs Budgetary Responsibility: Execute Minor projects [<$10k] and support large projects Duties & Responsibilities Role is for a dedicated and detail-oriented Associate to support our management team, in driving strategic initiatives and assisting in the execution of business plans. This will include coordinating with various teams such as Logistics, Planning, Warehouse, and Production to ensure effective operations. - Drive the business plans closely, on a quarter to quarter basis. - Analyze data to identify trends and inform decision-making processes - Identify new business opportunities, markets, and partnerships. - Prepare reporting snapshots and communication decks - Continuous Coordination with Imports, Warehousing, Planning, Upcountry Units, and Shipping teams to execute the operations plan - Monitor and control, business health, stock aging, asset utilizations - Develop Process manual by coordinating with Production/Factory manager - Lead process excellence in coordination with the Managers and support the implementation of best practices
Job Requirements: Education/Knowledge, Skills, Attributes, Experience & Other Requirements Bachelor’s/ master’s degree in Business Administration, Supply Chain Management, Logistics, Sales, or related field. 4-7 years of experience in business development or related role Good understanding of import and export regulations and logistics operations. Strong organizational and project management skills and the ability to interpret data Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, Word, PowerPoint) Interest to develop a career in business operations Basic exposure to standardised Quality and GMP systems in Food Processing Our Purpose is to “be the change for good food and a healthy future”. At ofi , we celebrate our diversity. ofi provides equality of opportunity for all persons with respect to hiring without discrimination on the grounds of race, color, religion, national origin, sex, pregnancy, age, disability, veteran status, or sexual orientation. All employment decisions will be based on qualifications, merit, and business needs.
Industry: Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Xuất nhập khẩu , Sản xuất / Vận hành sản xuất

Company: Idocean Co.,Ltd
Job Description: The Trade Marketing Lead acts as the bridge between Sales & Marketing , responsible for optimizing trade campaigns to maximize revenue, enhance customer experience, and strengthen distributor relationships . This role requires a highly experienced trade marketer with a strategic mindset, adaptability, and a growth-oriented attitude to continuously improve business performance. Key Responsibilities: Trade Marketing Strategy & Planning Develop and implement trade marketing programs tailored to different sales channels ( GT , MT, HORECA, Ecommerce…). Work closely with Sales and Marketing teams to design merchandising, promotion, and POSM strategies for effective market penetration. Analyze consumer behavior and sales data to optimize in-store activation and demand-generation initiatives. Boosting Sales Performance & Customer Retention Design and execute loyalty programs to increase distributor engagement and retention . Develop and implement sell-out driven campaigns to ensure strong product distribution and sell-through. Assess campaign performance to optimize costs and maximize revenue . POSM & Budget Management Manage and optimize POSM production and promotion budgets to ensure the highest ROI. Oversee POSM allocation and implementation to maintain brand consistency at retail touchpoints. Market Analysis & Reporting Track and analyze sales performance, stock levels, and market share , proposing strategic adjustments. Conduct market research and competitor analysis to fine-tune trade marketing strategies. Prepare periodic reports on trade marketing effectiveness and ROI . Field Trade & Business Trips Conduct regular market visits and trade field activities to ensure effective execution of trade marketing strategies. Work closely with on-ground sales teams and key distributors to address market challenges and opportunities.
Job Requirements: Experience & Knowledge At least 5 years of experience in Trade Marketing, preferably in FMCG / F&B industries. Proven expertise in sell-out strategies, distributor loyalty programs, and in-store activations . Strong understanding of GT, MT, and HORECA distribution channels. Proficient in sales data analysis and consumer insights . Strategic mindset with strong market awareness and consumer behavior knowledge. Skills & Personal Traits Growth-oriented, proactive, and continuously improving processes for higher efficiency. Fluent in English communication is a plus (both written and spoken). Willing to travel frequently for business trips and field trade activities. Working time: Mon - Sat (8:00 - 17:00, 2 Sat off/month)
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh

Job Title: [Tam Sơn] Hn - Senior Talent Management Executive/ Chuyên Viên Quản Trị Tài Năng Cấp Cao
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Quốc Tế Tam Sơn
Job Description: Responsible for developing and implementing talent management programs, including performance management, competency frameworks, and HR data analysis. Play a key role in developing the workforce, ensuring employee engagement, and maintaining high-quality talent aligned with the Company’s growth strategy. Chịu trách nhiệm xây dựng và triển khai các chương trình quản lý nhân tài, bao gồm quản trị hiệu suất, khung năng lực, và phân tích dữ liệu nhân sự. Đóng vai trò quan trọng trong việc phát triển đội ngũ nhân sự, đảm bảo sự gắn kết và duy trì chất lượng cao của nhân viên phù hợp với chiến lược phát triển của Công ty. A. Performance Management/ Quản trị hiệu suất Collaborate with the Talent Management Lead to design/improve and implement performance appraisal processes aligned with business strategy and organizational regulations. Phối hợp với Talent Management Lead nhằm thiết kế/cải tiến và triển khai quy trình đánh giá hiệu suất theo chiến lược kinh doanh và quy định vận hành của Tổ chức. Support individuals/departments in setting KPIs/OKRs to ensure alignment with business objectives. Hỗ trợ các cá nhân/phòng ban trong việc thiết lập KPIs/OKRs đảm bảo gắn kết với mục tiêu kinh doanh. Analyze performance evaluation data and provide solutions to improve productivity and work effectiveness. Phân tích dữ liệu đánh giá hiệu suất, cung cấp các giải pháp cải thiện năng suất và hiệu quả làm việc. B. Competency Management/ Quản trị năng lực Collaborate with the Talent Management Lead to build and implement competency frameworks for various positions within the organization. Phối hợp với Talent Management Lead nhằm xây dựng và triển khai khung năng lực phù hợp với các vị trí trong Tổ chức. Work with managers to assess employee competencies, identify high-potential talent, and determine training needs. Phối hợp với các quản lý để đánh giá năng lực nhân viên, phát hiện nhân tài tiềm năng và xác định nhu cầu đào tạo. Collaborate with the Training department to design and implement competency development programs. Phối hợp với bộ phận Đào tạo trong việc thiết kế và triển khai các chương trình phát triển năng lực. C. HR Data Analysis/ Phân tích dữ liệu nhân sự Collect and analyze HR data (performance, competencies, turnover rates, satisfaction levels, compensation) to generate strategic reports. Thu thập và phân tích dữ liệu nhân sự (hiệu suất, năng lực, tỷ lệ nghỉ việc, mức độ hài lòng, chế độ đãi ngộ) để đưa ra các báo cáo chiến lược. Provide data-driven insights to support leadership decisions on talent management. Cung cấp các thông tin định hướng từ dữ liệu nhằm hỗ trợ quyết định của ban lãnh đạo về quản lý nhân tài. Use tools such as Excel, Power BI, or Tableau to visualize data and present reports. Sử dụng các công cụ như Excel, Power BI hoặc Tableau để trực quan hóa dữ liệu và trình bày báo cáo. D. Succession Planning & Retention/ Kế hoạch kế nhiệm và giữ chân nhân tài Collaborate with the Talent Management Lead to design and manage succession planning programs for key positions within the organization. Phối hợp với Talent Management Lead nhằm thiết kế và quản lý chương trình kế nhiệm cho các vị trí chủ chốt trong tổ chức. Work with the HR team to implement talent retention initiatives, particularly in the context of the competitive high-end retail industry. Phối hợp với đội ngũ HR triển khai các sáng kiến giữ chân nhân tài, đặc biệt trong bối cảnh cạnh tranh ngành bán lẻ cao cấp. Ensure that talent retention programs are aligned with the company's brand strategy and corporate culture. Đảm bảo các chương trình giữ chân nhân tài gắn liền với chiến lược thương hiệu và văn hóa doanh nghiệp.
Job Requirements: Proficiency in Data Analysis Tools (Advanced Excel, Power BI, Tableau) Thành thạo các công cụ phân tích dữ liệu (Excel nâng cao, Power BI, Tableau) Excellent Communication Skills, Especially in Interfacing with Management and Leadership Kỹ năng giao tiếp xuất sắc, đặc biệt trong việc làm việc với các cấp quản lý và lãnh đạo Time Management Skills, Ability to Work Independently, and Thrive Under High-Pressure Environments Khả năng quản lý thời gian, làm việc độc lập và chịu được áp lực công việc cao Planning Skills Kỹ năng lập kế hoạch Analytical and Reporting Skills Kỹ năng phân tích và báo cáo In-Depth Knowledge of Performance Management and Talent Management Có kiến thức sâu rộng về quản trị hiệu suất và quản trị tài năng Over 5 Years of Professional Experience Kinh nghiệm làm việc trên 5 năm
Industry: Nhân sự

Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Tập Đoàn Đầu Tư Địa Ốc No Va
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Du Lịch', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: 1. Xây dựng chiến lược dữ liệu: 1.1 Xây dựng kế hoạch và chiến lược phân tích dữ liệu phù hợp với mục tiêu kinh doanh của công ty. 1.2 Đề xuất các công nghệ và phương pháp phân tích dữ liệu tiên tiến để cải thiện hiệu suất. 1.3 Đảm bảo các giải pháp phân tích dữ liệu hỗ trợ việc ra quyết định chiến lược và vận hành. 2. Thu thập, phân tích và trực quan hóa dữ liệu: 2.1 Hướng dẫn nhóm thu thập, làm sạch và phân tích dữ liệu từ nhiều nguồn khác nhau. 2.2. Phê duyệt và đảm bảo chất lượng các báo cáo, bảng điều khiển (dashboard), và các kết quả phân tích. 2.3 Xây dựng các mô hình dự đoán và phân tích nâng cao để tìm kiếm cơ hội cải thiện hoạt động kinh doanh. 3. Tổ chức phòng/ nhóm triển khai các giải pháp Quản trị dữ liệu: 3.1 Tổ chức triển khai các Dự án cho các thành viên trong nhóm: lên kế hoạch, điều phối, giám sát đội ngũ triển khai ứng dụng 3.2 Tham gia vào quá trình kiểm thử (UAT - User Acceptance Testing) để đảm bảo các giải pháp đáp ứng đầy đủ các yêu cầu nghiệp vụ và tiêu chuẩn của công ty. 3.3 Hỗ trợ các bộ phận trong việc triển khai hệ thống mới hoặc nâng cấp hệ thống hiện tại, đảm bảo việc sử dụng hệ thống hiệu quả và đúng mục đích. 4: Đảm bảo chất lượng và bảo mật dữ liệu 4.1 Đảm bảo rằng dữ liệu được quản lý, lưu trữ và sử dụng an toàn, tuân thủ các quy định về quyền riêng tư và bảo mật. 4.2 Kiểm soát chất lượng dữ liệu (Data Governance), đảm bảo tính chính xác và đầy đủ của thông tin. 5: Theo dõi xu hướng và đổi mới 5.1 Theo dõi các xu hướng mới trong ngành công nghiệp phân tích dữ liệu, học máy, và trí tuệ nhân tạo (AI). 5.2 Đề xuất các giải pháp đổi mới để giúp công ty nâng cao hiệu suất và tận dụng tối đa dữ liệu.
Job Requirements: Tốt nghiệp đại học, ưu tiên các ngành Khoa học Dữ liệu, Công Nghệ Thông Tin, Thống Kê, Toán Học, hoặc Quản Trị Kinh Doanh. Ít nhất 5 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực phân tích dữ liệu. Ưu tiên đã có kinh nghiệm phân tích dữ liệu ở các lĩnh vực tài chính, bất động sản, ERP,… Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với các công cụ phân tích và trực quan hóa dữ liệu như Power BI, Tableau, SQL, Excel Có kinh nghiệm với các hệ quản trị cơ sở dữ liệu SQL (SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL,…), Non-SQL (MongoDB,…) Thành thạo SQL, Python là bắt buộc. Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với các mô hình máy học (Machine Learning) và mô hình bất động sản là một lợi thế Có kinh nghiệm ETL (Extract, Transform, Load), hoặc kinh nghiệm làm việc với các hệ thống lưu trữ và xử lý dữ liệu lớn (Big -Data) như Hadoop, Spark là một lợi thế Có kinh nghiệm trong việc tích hợp AI và Automation vào quy trình kinh doanh để cải thiện hiệu quả hoạt động. Có kinh nghiệm trong việc xử lý, làm sạch và phân tích dữ liệu từ nhiều nguồn khác nhau. Có kinh nghiệm với các công cụ và nền tảng như SQL, Python, R, Tableau, Power BI, và các hệ thống dữ liệu lớn (Big Data).
Industry: CNTT - Phần mềm , CNTT - Phần cứng / Mạng

Job Title: Branch Manager In Ha Noi(Audio Products)
Company: Công Ty Tnhh Phúc Giang
Job Description: Position Summary: · Report directly to BOD and Bussines Development Head · Work closely and support directly to Sales/Marketing/Services and Logistic. Key mission: The Branch Manager is responsible for overseeing all branch operations, ensuring efficient and profitable functioning of the branch, while maintaining high levels of customer satisfaction and team performance. This role includes managing staff, driving sales, maintaining compliance, and achieving operational goals. Sales & Business Development: · Develop and implement strategies to meet branch sales targets and business growth objectives. · Identify local market opportunities and build relationships with new and existing customers. · Promote branch services/products to drive customer acquisition and retention. · Collaborate with marketing teams to execute promotional campaigns. · Maintain strong relationships with customers, addressing inquiries, concerns, and complaints promptly Leadership & Team Management: · Supervise, mentor, and motivate branch staff to achieve individual and team goals. · Conduct regular team meetings to communicate goals, strategies, and updates. · Provide training and development opportunities for team members. · Address and resolve employee performance issues effectively. Operations Management: Oversee day-to-day branch operations to ensure efficiency and adherence to company standards. Monitor branch performance metrics, including revenue, customer satisfaction, and operational efficiency. Manage the branch budget and financial performance. · Ensure exceptional service delivery to build trust and loyalty. · Regularly gather and analyze customer feedback to improve service quality Ensure compliance with company policies, regulations, and legal requirements. Ensure all branch operations are compliant with applicable laws, regulations, and company policies. Oversee security protocols to protect branch assets. Reporting Prepare and submit regular reports on branch performance to senior management. Analyze data and provide insights to improve branch operations and achieve strategic goals. Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to follow: · Achievement of sales and revenue targets. · Customer satisfaction and retention rates. · Staff performance and engagement levels. · Operational efficiency and compliance scores.
Job Requirements: Must have: · At least 02 years of experience in Sales; Marketing, Bussiness Adminstration · Proficient (intermediate) skills on MS Office software pack. Referred and Plus : · Have experience with Audio Equipment field or Similar. · Good relationship with Audio/Electronics Dealers and Channels (retailer-wholesalers), especially in North Side · Have extensive knowledge and experience in using data analytics tools, such as Power BI, Excel Education and Language : · Bachelor’s degree in Sales, Marketing, Communications, or related field. · Upper Intermediate Level (B2) in English. Basic Qualifications: · Leadership and team-building skills. · Strong business acumen and strategic thinking. · Excellent customer service and relationship management skills. · Ability to analyze and interpret financial data. · Strong organizational and problem-solving skills.Training and Coaching Skills · Be able to adapt and get along to different cultures and persons
Industry: Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Quản lý điều hành , Quảng cáo / Đối ngoại / Truyền Thông

Company: Yes4All Trading Services Company Limited
Job Description: Yes4All is one of the leading brands for home sporting goods & furniture in the e-commerce market. Founded in 2010, we have strived to be the world leader in e-commerce enablers in term of trading, product creating and e-commerce servicing. Based in California with an operation office in HCMC, we have more than 500 young and talented members with expert knowledge and experience in the e-commerce industry. We are on an ambitious journey to dominate not only US e-commerce market but also to enter new e-commerce markets of more than 15 countries in Europe, Asia and North America, not only Amazon channel but also Walmart, Wayfair among others. Besides, Home sporting goods, Furniture, Outdoor and Gardening are also great opportunities that we desire to occupy and create significant values. With our steady knowledge in E-commerce, Yes4All started to provide end-to-end ecommerce-enabler service in order to help Vietnamese and global manufacturers or struggling sellers bring their products to the US & International markets. Our mission: Connect the Worldwide Resources & create innovative platform to bring products and services from innovators and manufacturers to worldwide customers more efficiently. Our vision: To be the world leader of e-commerce enabler in term of trading, product creating, and e-commerce servicing. I. JOB DESCRIPTIONS 1. Develop and Drive BI Strategy Formulate and implement a comprehensive business intelligence strategy aligned with the company's goals. 2. Data Analysis and Insights Analyze data from various sources (including sales, marketing, operation, and finance) to identify trends, generate insights, and uncover growth opportunities. Proactively provide insightful information via reports or presentations 3. Reporting and Dashboard Proactively Design, develop, and maintain intuitive and visually appealing dashboards and reports to facilitate data-driven decision-making across the organization. 4. Team Leadership Lead, mentor, and develop a team of BI analysts, fostering a culture of continuous learning and innovation. Serve as a key connector and leader, inspiring and fostering strong bonds within the BI team, enabling seamless collaboration and alignment toward shared goals 5. Training and Coaching Provide training and coaching to team members and other departments to enhance data literacy and ensure effective use of BI tools and data insights across the organization. 6. Cross-Functional Collaboration Collaborate with key stakeholders across departments (e.g., marketing, sales, finance, operation,...) to ensure alignment and integration of BI initiatives. 7. Technology and Tools Management Stay updated with BI tools and technologies, ensuring the organization leverages best-in-class solutions.
Job Requirements: II. REQUIREMENTS 1. Knowledge A bachelor's degree in Data Science, Business, Economics, or a related field. Advanced degrees are a plus. 2. Skills Proficiency in SQL, Power BI, and other BI tools. Experience with Python is advantageous. Proficiency in analytical and problem-solving abilities, with a talent for translating data into actionable insights. Proficiency in verbal and written communication. Ability to create insightful reports, short and sharp presentation Demonstrated experience in leading and developing a team, with strong project management skills. 3. Experience A minimum of 5 years in a similar BI role, preferably within the e-commerce sector. 2 years experience in team management Candidate with experience in Finance, Planning, and Operation is a plus. III. WHY YOU WILL LOVE JOINING US? 1. FOR YOU TO JOIN Financial Well-being: A competitive salary with 13th month salary, annual performance bonus and a variety of allowances. Salary review: annually or on excellent performance. Activities: company trips, team-building, and other customized monthly bonding events. Annual leaves: 16 days off and 01 Birthday Leave per year. Healthcare: annual health check, insurance according to Labor Law and extra PTI Insurance package. Working Environment: dynamic, friendly environments with working time flexibility (Mon-Fri), and other perks include snacks, coffee, and healthy food provided daily suited for hardworking, fun, and team collaboration. 2. FOR YOU TO GROW Ambition: We are now keeping on with our hyper growth to multicategory, multichannel, multimarket, and expanding into the world largest e-commerce enabler. Hence, there will continuously be opportunities to challenge yourself, learn new skills and knowledge. Challenges: Your voice can always be heard as we embrace the eagerness of learning and sharing. You can be your own boss and create your own value with the ability to take initiative and make decisions in all aspects of work. Chances: Be led and coached by experienced and inspirational leaders and participate in various training courses where you can enlarge your knowledge and experience in the E-commerce and Supply Chain industry. 3. FOR YOU TO STAY People: Having a headquarter in the US and an operation office in Vietnam, our team is young and highly motivated. You will be working with and alongside members having experiences from International Corporations or high profile from Vietnam that share the same passion and dedication. Culture: Our working environment is humble, collaborative and 100% healthy. We promote Exchange & Speak out, you can receive transparent and supportive feedback so you can perform the best. Career path: Provide you a great career path, open to rotating for your better understanding of the company and contribute across many of our functions. And much more, join us and let yourself explore other fantastic things!
Industry: Ngành khác

Company: Công Ty Tnhh Taisun Việt Nam
Job Description: • Develop and implement trade promotions for category, distribution channels, and target customers according to the allocated budget. • Create related support policies and allocate promotions for customer/shopper to avoid channel conflict. • Evaluate trade campaign that provide data & suggestion to improve trade promotion campaign. • Market research & market visit to review and evaluate trade campaign, competitor’s actions and industry data reports (both internal & external) to propose actions plan (Sales / Marketing / Trade) for each channel / region. • Closely work with sales teams, distribution partners to get field inputs and make local plans for execution if necessary. • Well follow through to steer trade MKT activities to ensure quality execution & better results. • Lead PG team to implement trade activation activities. • Guide, manage agencies to fully execute aligned trade MKT activities. • Cross functional communication, coordination & integration internally to facilitate key projects moving forward. • Collect MKT intelligence for analysis, feedback BOD and make suggestions to take actions if any. • POSM creations & management. • Monitor / Coach/ Train for team member to align the Trade team towards the business objectives. Working conditions: Workplace: 08 Phan Dinh Giot, Ward 2, Tan Binh dist., HCMC. Working hour: 08:30 - 18:00 (Monday - Friday).
Job Requirements: Graduated from University in marketing, communications, journalism Business Administration or related major.; At least 3-5 years working experience in trade marketing and managerial level; Leadership skills and Strong management skills, able to lead and drive actions; Innovative thinking & Flexible: able to lead team in new ways of thinking and execution; Speaking and writing proficiency in English; Good at Microsoft Word, Excel, Outlook, and PowerPoint; Capable of analyzing big amount of data and create a strategic suggestion to sales team; Familiar with distribution & retailer development; FMCG experience is a must. Entitlement: Salary: Competitive; Insurance: as regulation; Annual leave: 12 days/year (< 5 yos), 13 days/year (5<10 yos), 14 days/year (10+ yos); Annual bonus (avg. 1.2 month), performance bonus; Labor day bonus; Mid-Autumn bonus; Absenteeism bonus; Reward for Outstanding employee/det; Insurance pay on total salary; Free products; Marital/Funeral/Sickness support; Touring trip/Touring fee; Birthday gift; Int'l Women day's gift; Vietnamese women day's gift; Children day's gift; Year-end gift; No interest loan for emergent needs Premium healthcare; Petrol allowance, attendance bonus; Training on the job.
Industry: Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Tiếp thị trực tuyến , Tiếp thị / Marketing

Company: Công Ty Tnhh Home360
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Du Lịch', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: Number of Vacancies: 03 Working Hours: Monday – Saturday: Morning 08:00 – 12:00, Afternoon 13:00 – 17:00 Sunday: Off Location: 35 DT741 NR, Ben Cat City, Binh Duong, Vietnam 1. Job Overview We are looking for a Marketing Executive who can work independently and take full responsibility for the company’s marketing activities while reporting directly to the Director. This role requires strategic thinking, the ability to execute marketing plans effectively, and strong communication skills. Proficiency in English is required, and Chinese is a plus. 2. Responsibilities Develop and Execute Marketing Strategies · Plan and implement marketing strategies on a monthly, quarterly, and yearly basis, aligning with the company’s business goals. · Analyze market trends, competitors, and customer behavior to propose suitable marketing approaches. · Propose and implement strategies to optimize marketing effectiveness. · Manage and optimize the marketing budget to ensure the highest ROI. · Independently execute marketing activities without coordination with other departments. Content Planning & Management for Website and Social Media Website & Blog: · Develop a monthly/ yearly content plan for the company's website. · Create product/service-related articles, industry news, and optimize SEO for better search engine ranking. Social Media: · Plan and manage content for social platforms such as Facebook, TikTok, Youtube, etc. · Track content performance and adjust strategies to improve audience engagement. Advertising & PR Campaigns · Execute and manage paid advertising campaigns on Facebook Ads, Google Ads, TikTok Ads, etc., to enhance brand awareness and increase sales. · Develop PR content for media, online forums, and partner channels. · Monitor and optimize advertising performance to meet KPIs. Performance Tracking & Optimization · Use Google Analytics, Facebook Insights, CRM tools to track campaign effectiveness. · Provide regular performance reports and propose improvements to maximize marketing efficiency. Brand management & market development: · Define and enhance the company’s brand image. · Develop plans to expand the market and introduce new products/services based on customer needs. · Conduct competitor analysis and suggest strategic improvements. Manage marketing channels and campaigns: · Oversee digital and offline marketing channels, including website, email marketing, social and promotional materials. · Plan and execute promotional campaigns and customer engagement activities. · Monitor and evaluate campaign performance to ensure effectiveness. Sales support & customer engagement: · Propose marketing initiatives to support sales and boost revenue. · Develop marketing collateral, such as brochures, company profiles, and product presentations. · Gather customer feedback and recommend product/service improvements. · Communicate with international clients in English Reporting and strategic recommendations: · Report marketing performance directly to the Director. · Provide data-driven insights and recommendations to optimize marketing strategies.
Job Requirements: 3. Requirements · Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related fields. · At least 2 years of experience in marketing, preferably with independent work experience. · Strong strategic thinking and the ability to execute marketing plans independently. · Market research and data analysis skills to develop realistic marketing strategies. · Proficiency in marketing tools such as Google Analytics, SEO, Ahrefs, Semrush, and email marketing. · Strong planning and budgeting skills. · Fluency in English is required; Chinese proficiency is an advantage. · Excellent communication, reporting, and leadership skills. · Proficiency in edit and filmmaking 4. Benefits · Salary: 13 – 18 million Vietnam dong · Direct reporting to the Director, with opportunities to develop management skills. · Full benefits as per company policies (social insurance, health insurance, paid leave, etc.).

Job Title: Customer Service Staff (Thời Vụ 6 Tháng - Kcn Tân Tạo)
Company: Zuellig Pharma Viet Nam
Job Description: Working location: Tan Tao Industrial Park, Binh Tan In charge of bac order processing/ Phụ trách xử lý đơn hàng chờ Processing backorder at the earliest convenience time as stock is available for sales/ Xử lý đơn hàng chờ trong thời gian sớm nhất ngay khi có hàng bán trở lại. Company: Techtronic Industries Vietnam Manufacturing Company Limited
Job Description: Overview: The Warehouse Process and System Manager is responsible for overseeing the operational efficiency and system integrity of warehouse processes and monitoring the quality performance of the organization. This role involves optimizing workflow, documenting processes, leading and facilitating and evaluating training, ensuring compliance with safety and quality standards, and implementing effective inventory management systems which may involve the use of technology with the aim of automating the process resulting in significant reduction of inefficiencies in the warehouse. The Warehouse Process and System Manager will collaborate with internal and external partners in streamlining upstream and downstream processes that will enhance productivity, reduce costs and errors, and maintain a high level of service to internal and external customers. This role involves looking at usage of technology in Key Responsibilities: 1/ Process Optimization: Analyze current warehouse processes and workflows to identify areas for improvement. Develop and implement standardized operating procedures (SOPs) to enhance efficiency and productivity. Utilize Lean and Six Sigma methodologies to drive process improvement initiatives 2/Training and process development: Develop a training plan, delivering training to the warehouse organization, evaluating the training and conducting audit to assess effectivity of the training provided. Document all processes in the warehouse and implement controls to error-proof the warehousing processes. 3/System Management: Oversee the Warehouse Management System (WMS) and other related software applications. Ensure the accurate configuration and maintenance of the WMS, including updates and system integrations. Train staff on system usage and best practices to maximize efficiency. 4/Inventory Control: Develop and enforce inventory control procedures to maintain accurate stock levels. Monitor inventory accuracy through cycle counts and audits, addressing discrepancies promptly. 5.Team Leadership: Lead, mentor, and develop warehouse staff, fostering a culture of safety, accountability, and continuous improvement. Conduct performance evaluations and provide ongoing feedback to team members. Coordinate training programs to enhance employee skills and knowledge. 6.Safety and Compliance: Ensure compliance with OSHA and other relevant safety regulations. Develop and implement safety protocols to minimize accidents and injuries in the warehouse. Conduct regular safety audits and training sessions. 7.Data Analysis and Reporting: Utilize data analytics to monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) related to warehouse operations. Prepare and present reports to senior management on operational performance, process improvements, and system issues. Identify trends and recommend actions based on data analysis. 8.Collaboration and Communication: Work closely with other departments, such as logistics, sales, and customer service, to ensure seamless operations. Facilitate effective communication between warehouse staff and management. Address any operational issues promptly and efficiently.
Job Requirements: Education: Bachelor’s degree in Supply Chain Management, Business Administration, Logistics, or any engineering field. A Master’s degree is a plus. Experience: Minimum of 5 years of experience in warehouse management or logistics Proven experience in process improvement and system implementation and warehouse automation. Technical Skills: Proficiency in Warehouse Management Systems (WMS) and Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) software. Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and make informed decisions. Familiarity with inventory management principles and best practices Familiarity with available technology and automation products for use in the warehousing process Familiarity with Six sigma is a plus Soft Skills: Excellent leadership and team management abilities. Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Problem-solving mindset with a focus on continuous improvement. Work Environment: The Warehouse Process and System Manager typically works in a warehouse setting, with exposure to various weather conditions and noise levels. The role may require extended hours during peak seasons or special projects and movement between warehouses of different locations. *Working Location: D2 Street, Tan Phu Trung Industrial Park, Cu Chi, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. We are providing shuttle bus from HCM, Binh Duong and Dong Nai
Industry: Quản lý điều hành , Sản xuất / Vận hành sản xuất , Vận chuyển / Giao nhận / Kho vận

Company: Công Ty Tnhh Brenntag Việt Nam
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Du Lịch', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: Job Summary: - Be responsible for Controlling and improving the pool of ingredients suppliers. - Be contact point from the customer facing team on their supply requirements for direct procurement and trade procurement, targeted at non-core suppliers. - Centralize trade procurement requests, analyse supply possibilities within the current pool of suppliers and outside the current supplier’s list, develop the optimum supply network to optimise cost, reduce complexity and increase speed and agility. Duties and Responsibilities: - Work closely with the stakeholders to understand their supply requirements, with a specific focus on non-core suppliers a. Understanding product specificities, b. Making supplier’s choice, (following the direction given by the supplier’s network owner) c. Understanding industry trends and supply opportunities. d. Identifying potential new suppliers, consolidating existing pool of suppliers when necessary - Aligning with the various stakeholders on the optimum supplier’s network configuration for execution. - Strive to source with a purpose a. Cost control and choice based on the company’s direction b. Reduce TCO (total cost of ownership) by negotiating purchase costs, and improving CTS (Cost to Serve) c. Improve client’s satisfaction by improving DIFOTEF (Deliveries in Full, On time and Error Free) - Link with existing suppliers and potential suppliers for a. Contract negotiation, b. Compliance check, and quality check. c. Negotiations to achieve competitive rates and services d. Have overview of TCO to balance price against other priorities such as quality and reliability - Define the functional guidelines of drafting and preparing tender materials, e.g. RFQ templates, vendor communication standard formats, and cost analysis tables - Lead the engagement and ensures strategic alignment between the procurement function and business units. To deliver cost effective and value adding commercial and supply chain outcomes. - Develop and drive strategic sourcing projects which contribute to the delivery of commercially favorable contracts and optimal value to the company in the short (6-12 months), and medium term (1-3 years) - Negotiate a range of commercial deals from spot purchases to more complex commercial term contract deals from inception to completion. Perform research to obtain market knowledge on supplier cost competitiveness and cost/value drivers, using experience and data, and forward-looking market trends to develop product procurement strategies to achieve sustainable cost savings to the business. - Responsible for setting and achieving performance goals/metrics to improve total cost of ownership, quality, working capital and monitor supplier performance. - To report progress continually so that strategic objectives and progress against our common goals is attained Value added to the success of the company: - Reduction of Overheads by a. Reducing complexity, b. Consolidating the suppliers base when possible c. Leveraging local product spend and negotiate cost savings for the business, working with regional sourcing managers to leverage and consolidate spend and suppliers d. Reducing the OCP and OCOP business to a level justified by the business, according to the management’s direction. - Improving the quality of services to the clients by monitoring and improving the quality of service from the non-core suppliers - Improving the Total Cost to Serve.
Job Requirements: Education - University degree or strong professional experience in Nutrition background - Financial acumen Experience : - Procurement in industrial environment, with high complexity. - 5-10 years of working experience with a proven track record of value and savings delivery via working across different functions i.e Sales, Supply Chain. - Having strong Nutrition ingredients sourcing experience - Strong stakeholder engagement and communication skills - Strong negotiation skills, with ability to perform both tactical and strategic procurement activities - Knowledge of procurement systems and processes, i.e SAP, Procurement to Pay processes - Supplier sourcing and development experiences - Good in written and spoken English for effective communication internally & externally. Work relationships with internal and external partners/customers Internal Relationship: - Procurement Managers Source to Contract (S2C) in countries, - Regional Sourcing Managers - Country Business Managers - Data analytics team for Database management (SAP – Qliksense), - Data analytics team for applications management (SAP – Brenntag Connect) - Inventories managers Procure to pay (P2P) for process excellence and flawless execution. External relationship: - Link with existing suppliers and potential suppliers for contract negotiation, compliance check, quality check. - Industry partners to understand industry trends, opportunities, and constraints. Ability to demonstrate the following leadership qualities to fulfill this role. - Engage with customer facing team to control and guide commercial decision regarding non core suppliers. - Engage with customer facing team to advise and direct the technical specs of products - Strong analytical skills, and ability to present analyzed information concisely - Process improvement, continuous improvement mindset, ability to create functional and scalable systems and processes - Well-versed with procurement practices including but not limited to direct-buy, 3rd-party comparison, tendering, and bidding.
Industry: Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Thực phẩm & Đồ uống , Thu mua / Vật tư

Company: Yes4All Trading Services Company Limited
Job Description: Yes4All is one of the leading brands for home sporting goods & furniture in the e-commerce market. Founded in 2010, we have strived to be the world leader in e-commerce enablers in term of trading, product creating and e-commerce servicing. Based in California with an operation office in HCMC, we have more than 500 young and talented members with expert knowledge and experience in the e-commerce industry. We are on an ambitious journey to dominate not only US e-commerce market but also to enter new e-commerce markets of more than 15 countries in Europe, Asia and North America, not only Amazon channel but also Walmart, Wayfair among others. Besides, Home sporting goods, Furniture, Outdoor and Gardening are also great opportunities that we desire to occupy and create significant values. With our steady knowledge in E-commerce, Yes4All started to provide end-to-end ecommerce-enabler service in order to help Vietnamese and global manufacturers or struggling sellers bring their products to the US & International markets. Our mission: Connect the Worldwide Resources & create innovative platform to bring products and services from innovators and manufacturers to worldwide customers more efficiently. Our vision: To be the world leader of e-commerce enabler in term of trading, product creating, and e-commerce servicing. I. JOB DESCRIPTIONS Collaborate with stakeholders (sales, brand, product, T&I) to gather and consolidate data, including market insights, forecasts, and team inputs. Conduct in-depth analyses of market trends, customer behavior, and performance metrics to support data-driven decision-making. Design detailed commercial plans, including timelines, resource allocation, and integration of campaigns, launches, and promotions. Align tactical plans with strategic goals and identify potential risks or challenges in execution. Assist in scenario planning, modeling potential outcomes, and developing contingency plans. Act as a key contributor in ensuring that all plans are adaptable to changing conditions and aligned with organizational priorities.
Job Requirements: II. REQUIREMENTS 1. Knowledge University bachelor’s degree in Economics, Business Administration, Marketing or Finance. Knowledge about the US or international market; Proficient in Microsoft Office. Advanced analytics tool/knowledge is preferable; Strong mathematical and statistical knowledge; 2. Skills Good English is a must; Proficient in Microsoft Office. Advanced analytics tool/knowledge is preferable; Excellent written and verbal communication skills; Capability to multitask in a fast-paced environment; Both the theory-driven and data-driven approaches in solving problems; Strong spoken and written communication skills (in both English and Vietnamese) to collaborate with team members and to explain findings clearly to internal team as well as stakeholders Have logical thinking and strong problem-solving skills. Time management and multitasking 3. Experience At least 2-3 years of experience in Planning, Supply Chain/Business/Data Analytics or similar roles. Retail Supply Chain, E-commerce experience is priority; Working experience in e-commerce/ retail or FMCG category management; Experience in Planning & supply chain; Relevant training and/or certifications as a Demand Planner III. WHY YOU WILL LOVE JOINING US? 1. FOR YOU TO JOIN Financial Well-being: A competitive salary with 13th month salary, annual performance bonus and a variety of allowances. Salary review: annually or on excellent performance. Activities: company trips, team-building, and other customized monthly bonding events. Annual leaves: 16 days off and 01 Birthday Leave per year. Healthcare: annual health check, insurance according to Labor Law and extra PTI Insurance package. Working Environment: dynamic, friendly environments with working time flexibility (Mon-Fri), and other perks include snacks, coffee, and healthy food provided daily suited for hardworking, fun, and team collaboration. 2. FOR YOU TO GROW Ambition: We are now keeping on with our hyper growth to multicategory, multichannel, multimarket, and expanding into the world largest e-commerce enabler. Hence, there will continuously be opportunities to challenge yourself, learn new skills and knowledge. Challenges: Your voice can always be heard as we embrace the eagerness of learning and sharing. You can be your own boss and create your own value with the ability to take initiative and make decisions in all aspects of work. Chances: Be led and coached by experienced and inspirational leaders and participate in various training courses where you can enlarge your knowledge and experience in the E-commerce and Supply Chain industry. 3. FOR YOU TO STAY People: Having a headquarter in the US and an operation office in Vietnam, our team is young and highly motivated. You will be working with and alongside members having experiences from International Corporations or high profile from Vietnam that share the same passion and dedication. Culture: Our working environment is humble, collaborative and 100% healthy. We promote Exchange & Speak out, you can receive transparent and supportive feedback so you can perform the best. Career path: Provide you a great career path, open to rotating for your better understanding of the company and contribute across many of our functions. And much more, join us and let yourself explore other fantastic things!
