Company: Oxford University Clinical Research Unit (Oucru Vietnam)
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Du Lịch', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: Group Hanoi Research Location This post is based in Ha Noi, with travel required. Hours of work 37.5 hours per week, extra hours may be required. Tenure Initially for 1 year, including a 2-month probation period, with possibility of extension. Reporting to Dr Vu Thi Lan Huong Vacancy reference JDHAN-0225-001 Background The Oxford University Clinical Research Unit (OUCRU) is a large-scale clinical and public health research unit, with sites offices in Ho Chi Minh City and Hanoi in Vietnam, Jakarta in Indonesia and Kathmandu in Nepal. In Vietnam, we are hosted by the Hospital of Tropical Diseases (HTD) in Ho Chi Minh City, and the National Hospital for Tropical Diseases (NHTD) in Hanoi. OUCRU Nepal has partnerships with the Patan Academy of Health Sciences and Patan Hospital, and OUCRU Indonesia exists in partnership with the University of Indonesia. As a Wellcome Trust Africa Asia Programme, we have received considerable support from the Wellcome Trust since our establishment in 1991. OUCRU’s vision is to have local, regional and global impact on health by leading a locally driven research programme on infectious diseases in Southeast Asia. Priority is given to health issues important to the hospitals where we work, and to the countries as a whole where we operate: Vietnam, Indonesia and Nepal. All work is intended not only to benefit the patients seen daily at our host hospitals, but also to help improve patient care. OUCRU employs approximately 320 people across Viet Nam and has an average annual budget of USD 12mil. Please see more information on OUCRU website: www.oucru.org Job summary The Research Assistant in Antimicrobial Stewardship (AMS RA) will work in the AMS research team under the supervision of Dr Vu Thi Lan Huong, Senior Research Fellow based in Hanoi, and of the assigned staff with delegated supervisory roles in the team and in collaboration with other teams across the OUCRU Programme, and with local and international study partners. The AMS RA is required to have at least one year of experience working in healthcare settings in Vietnam, and some experience in conducting research studies (preferably in hospital), data collection (quantitative and qualitative) including sampling and management of microbiological specimens for research. Experience with infection control and prevention, clininical microbiology and/or molecular biology is strongly considered. The AMS RA will provide support to the antimicrobial stewardship (AMS) research team in Hanoi in preparing and conducting studies in relation to antibotic use, antibiotic resistance and AMS in healthcare settings. He/she will work closely with other teams across the Hanoi Unit and OUCRU Programme and with study partners to develop locally feasible work plans based on study protocols and implement the work plans to achieve the expected study deliverables. He/she is required to establish good working relationships and provide technical and logistic/operational support to the team, its partners and collborators as required. Key responsibilities and tasks · Support in reviewing literature and developing relevant research techniques and methodologies for use in study design, implementation and analysis · Assist in compiling, cleaning, processing, summarizing and analyzing research information and data to support study designing, development of study proposals and study planning and implementation, and preparing reports, presentations, communication materials for dissemination of research results; · Prepare specific research workplans, standard operating procedures (SOPs) and forms for data collection, collection and management of specimens, data entry and management, and other specific documents following the study protocols; · Work with and provide technical support to study partners to plan, implement and monitor research activities following protocols/SOPs; · Prepare the required research logistics, equipment, supplies and consumables to ensure research activities are carried out following protocols/SOPs; · Assist in collecting and monitoring the quality of research data, information and research specimens following study protocols/ SOPs; · Provide technical support to lab specialists in collection, management and monitoring of the quality of research specimens, test assays and test results following research protocols/ SOPs; · Provide support in coordinating and organizing research related training, events and meetings; · Participate in research meetings, training and skills development activities as appropriate; · Prepare and deliver research specific presentations and training to support in research implementation and data collection as appropriate; · Provide timely reports to PI/ supervisor on the progress, issues and outputs of specific research activities and milestones as required; · Maintain effective communication with other staff and collaborators to facilitate coordination, planning and implementation of research studies; · Collaborate with operations and support staff including CTU and admin & finance team to provide technical inputs to the preparation of regulatory/ admin and ethics approvals, detailed budgets and contracts for study activities, study related invoices and receipts, and financial reporting of detailed activities as appropriate; · Other tasks requested by the Supervisor/Director.
Job Requirements: Selection criteria Essential: · Bachelor degree in Health Sciences, Environmental Health, Epidemiology, Applied Biology or equivalent · Working experience in hospital environments in Vietnam (minimum 1 year) · Experience in conducting research activities, data collection and data analysis (minimum 1 year) · Excellent spoken and written Vietnamese and good levels of English language skills (an IELTS score of 6.0 or equivalent) · Attention to details and highly organized · Strong interpersonal and communication skills · Willingness and ability to travel to different provinces in Vietnam and overseas, interact with, and work in a range of local partners · Ability to work with a high degree of autonomy, and yet be a team player · Energetic and creative; open to new approaches and ideas Desired: · Knowledge and experience in infection control and prevention, clininical microbiology and/or molecular biology · Experience in writing manuscripts and submitting to international peer reviewed journals Benefits - Contracted salary: o Grade: 5 - 6 o Salary ranges Salary ranges: 1,262 USD – 1,402 USD gross per month - Optional insurance: In-patient and out-patient medical coverage; Personal accident insurance coverage - Two months salary for annual bonus and clothes - Annual leave 18 days/year for the first year, a maximum of 30 days - Other responsibilities and benefits are based on Viet Nam Labor Law. How to apply Interested candidates are invited to send curriculum vitae, cover letter and copies of relevant certificates by email to Ms. Pham Thi Thanh Hoa – Operations Manager * The cover letter should detail: - What part of your education, training or employment history has best equipped you for this position and why you would be a good candidate? - Contacts of two referees who are your latest HR/ line manager and can provide details of relevant work experience and attitude *** We thank all candidates for their interest but only short-listed applicants will be notified for interview. Contact person Pham Thi Thanh Hoa Deadline for submission 15 March 2025
Industry: Chăm sóc sức khỏe / Thẩm mỹ / Làm đẹp , Phi chính phủ / Phi lợi nhuận , Giáo dục / Đào tạo

Job Title: Production Planning Senior Staff (Label, Packaging, Garment, Footwear)
Company: Bảo Mật
Job Description: Support the enhancement of production planning across all manufacturing activities related to films, tapes, and labels. This involves inputting, scheduling, and organizing production orders, tracking progress, and coordinating with various departments to optimize resource allocation and material management. Key Responsibilities: Ensure accurate data entry and processing of production orders for semi-finished products (film) as well as their conversion into finished goods. Monitor production progress and, when necessary, propose procurement requests to the appropriate manager to meet ongoing order demands, while also consulting with production operators. Oversee production activities for semi-finished products (film), ensuring execution aligns with the planned schedule from initiation to warehouse storage. Track and update production status regularly. Plan and coordinate both sample runs and large-scale production. Generate new item codes, define production workflows, and establish Bills of Materials (BOM) within the ERP system. Create production work orders, coordinate schedules, assign resources effectively, and ensure on-time completion of production targets. Link production orders with raw material requirements and initiate material requisitions from the warehouse.
Job Requirements: Qualifications & Experience: Education: Minimum requirement of a high school diploma; an associate’s or bachelor’s degree in manufacturing, engineering, or a related discipline is preferred. Experience: At least 5 years in a manufacturing environment, particularly in production planning or scheduling roles. Skills & Competencies: Proficiency in production management software (e.g., SAP, SAM FRAMNET). Strong understanding of inventory control and production scheduling. Ability to analyze data and generate reports for decision-making. Familiarity with supply chain management principles. Effective verbal and written communication skills for clear instructions and reporting. Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities to address challenges and implement solutions. Excellent organizational skills, with the ability to manage multiple tasks and prioritize effectively. Fluency in English (both written and spoken) is mandatory
Industry: Vận chuyển / Giao nhận / Kho vận , Sản xuất / Vận hành sản xuất , Thu mua / Vật tư

Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Blueseed
Job Description: Your responsibilities Develop and implement strategies to improve the online visibility and search engine ranking of ecommerce websites Analyze website traffic and user behavior to identify opportunities for optimization and growth Conduct keyword research and optimize website content, metadata, and images for targeted keywords Monitor and analyze website performance metrics, including traffic, conversions, and revenue, and make data-driven decisions to improve results Collaborate with web developers, content creators, and marketing teams to ensure website content is optimized for search engines and user experience Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in ecommerce SEO and implement new strategies as needed Create and maintain reports on website performance, including SEO metrics, and communicate results to stakeholders Manage and optimize paid search campaigns, including Google AdWords and Bing Ads, to drive targeted traffic and conversions Manage and optimize product listings on ecommerce marketplaces, such as Amazon and eBay, to improve visibility and sales Provide guidance and support to other team members on ecommerce SEO best practices and strategies
Job Requirements: Requirements 3 years of ecommerce SEO experience Proven track record of boosting sales Expertise in keyword research Ability to analyze data and draw insights Familiarity with Google Analytics and Search Console Knowledge of technical SEO and site architecture Experience with on-page optimization Awareness of industry updates and algorithm changes Understanding of user experience and conversion optimization Excellent communication and collaboration skills Why should you apply for Blueseed ? Competitive salary Quarterly Incentives according business result and performance working Adjust salary annually Join in teambuilding, the birthday of an employee monthly, Thank you party, the birthday of the company… Feel safe with premium Health insurance policies after 1-year working Contribute your opinion and be valued by management and colleagues Be recognized (via career enhancement) for your working dedication and achievements Enjoy modern working facilities Light snacks available to all staff every day Succeed as part of a young, motivated and successful team
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Tiếp thị trực tuyến , Thương mại điện tử

Company: Techtronic Industries Vietnam Manufacturing Company Limited
Job Description: JOB SUMMARY Coordinate with operation team and other departments (FA team, forwarder management team) in checking statement of account (SOA) from logistics vendors to ensure accuracy payment amount, sufficient payment documents and strictly follow SOA timeline. Check the accuracy and reasonableness of the abnormal/ad-hoc expenses incurred. Provide cost estimation for export shipments as per operation’s request. Handle weekly Dem/Det/abnormal/ad-hoc expense report, KPI report, other report assigned by superior. Monthly joining meeting with logistics vendors do discuss operations & reporting issue. KEY RESPONSIBILITIES AND AUTHORITIES • Monthly collect SOA from logistics vendors, use SOA checking format to cross check data & main cost in SOA with operation’s report & approved quotation. Cross checking evidence provided by logistics vendors with internal report (ORC, Vnaccs) to verify the dem/det/abnormal cost. • Prepare document and submit payments request follow correct approval levels • Effective communication with the concerned parties to ensure all the mismatching or concerns are closed timely, ensure SOA are handled on time. • Provide cost estimation for export shipments base on approved quotation as per operation’s request in systems (courier shipments), or by email (special cases) • Take responsibility for managing expense report & KPI report, manage vendors’ performance & follow up improvement through monthly meeting. • Report to supervisor if any deviation from the established SOP. • Perform other duties as assigned by supervisor.
Job Requirements: Education University graduated Experience 2-3 years in Manufacturing company (EPE is preferred) Knowledge Computer knowledge (excel, word, PowerPoint, ERP), ERP knowledge & good excel is required. Good in English communication (writing & speaking). Data analysis skill (Power BI/ Power Query) is preferred. Functional Skills Skilled in order processing, shipment arrangement & shipping expense controlling. Having knowledge of project management is preferred. Able to use VNACCS software. Other Abilities Able to work independently and under a tight time schedule. Good team working spirit. Good communication skill. This position will be based in SHTP Factory, District 9, HCMC. Shuttle bus from District 1, 7,10,12/Go Vap/Thu Duc/Binh Thanh/Binh Duong/ Dong Nai is available.
Industry: Hành chính / Thư ký , Kế toán / Kiểm toán , Xuất nhập khẩu

Company: Công Ty Tnhh Onpoint
Job Description: Rapid Opportunity Identification: Within the first [30/60/90] days, conduct a comprehensive assessment of all departments (e.g., Marketing, Sales, Operations, Customer Service, Logistics, Finance, Product Development) to identify key pain points, bottlenecks, and areas where AI can deliver the most significant productivity gains. This requires quick, insightful analysis and strong stakeholder engagement. AI Solution Evaluation & Prioritization: Research, evaluate, and recommend the most promising AI tools and technologies (e.g., Generative AI, Machine Learning, Robotic Process Automation, Predictive Analytics) that directly address the identified opportunities. Prioritize based on potential ROI, speed of implementation, and strategic alignment. We need someone who understands the practical application of AI, not just the theory. Business Case Development & Presentation: Create compelling, data-driven business cases for AI investments, clearly articulating the expected benefits (quantified productivity gains, cost savings, revenue enhancement), risks, and implementation timelines. You need to be able to "sell" the vision to senior leadership. Implementation & Project Management: Lead the implementation of selected AI solutions, working closely with cross-functional teams (IT, Data Science, business stakeholders). This includes defining project scope, managing timelines, tracking progress, and ensuring successful deployment. A hands-on, proactive approach is essential. Change Management & Training: Drive adoption of new AI tools by developing and delivering training programs, creating clear documentation, and fostering a culture of AI literacy across the organization. You will be the AI champion. Performance Monitoring & Optimization: Establish key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the impact of implemented AI solutions. Continuously monitor performance, identify areas for improvement, and iterate to maximize the value of our AI investments. Stay Ahead of the Curve: Continuously research emerging AI trends, technologies, and best practices to ensure OnPoint remains at the forefront of AI adoption in the e-commerce enablement space.
Job Requirements: 1. Education background requirements: Bachelor’s degree in business, Technology, Innovation, or a related field; MBA or advanced degree preferred. 2. Experience/Industry requirements: Proven Experience: Minimum [3-5] years of experience in a role involving AI, machine learning, data science, digital transformation, or a related field. Experience in e-commerce or a related industry is a strong plus. Strong Business Acumen: Exceptional ability to quickly understand complex business processes, identify problems, and develop solutions. You need to think like a business leader, not just a technologist. Project Management Skills: Demonstrated ability to manage complex projects, meet deadlines, and deliver results. Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. Communication & Influence: Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills. Ability to clearly articulate technical concepts to non-technical audiences and influence stakeholders at all levels. Problem-Solving Mindset: A proactive, analytical, and solutions-oriented approach. You must be able to think critically, identify root causes, and develop creative solutions. Self-driven, able to work in a fast-paced environment with a "Get shit done" attitude. 3. Technical requirements Strong understanding of product development processes, including concept validation, market research, and feasibility analysis. Proficiency in Agile methodologies and tools (Scrum, Kanban, Jira). Excellent organizational and multitasking skills, capable of managing multiple projects and timelines. Strong analytical skills for market research, user testing and performance metrics analysis. Familiarity with product management tools (roadmaps, user stories, MVP definition) and innovation frameworks (Design Thinking, Lean Startup)
Industry: Bán hàng / Kinh doanh

Company: Collagen 82X - Công Ty Cổ Phần Lychee
Job Description: • Tư vấn và chốt đơn hàng: - Gọi điện cho khách hàng theo data có sẵn từ Facebook Ads, live stream, inbox, comment, khách cũ. - Giới thiệu và tư vấn sản phẩm collagen 82x, giải đáp thắc mắc của khách hàng. - Phân tích nhu cầu, tình trạng sức khỏe & làn da của khách hàng để tư vấn sản phẩm phù hợp. - Thuyết phục khách hàng mua hàng, xử lý từ chối một cách khéo léo. - Chốt đơn hàng theo quy trình, cập nhật thông tin khách hàng vào hệ thống CRM. • Chăm sóc khách hàng & mở rộng tệp khách: - Gọi lại cho khách hàng cũ để upsell (bán thêm sản phẩm) hoặc cross-sell (bán sản phẩm khác). - Hỗ trợ khách hàng trong quá trình sử dụng sản phẩm, hướng dẫn cách uống để đạt hiệu quả tốt nhất. - Duy trì quan hệ với khách hàng, xây dựng tệp khách trung thành. - Nhắc nhở khách hàng mua lại khi sắp hết liệu trình. • Báo cáo & cải thiện hiệu suất: - Theo dõi đơn hàng, đảm bảo khách nhận hàng đúng hẹn. - Báo cáo kết quả làm việc hàng ngày/tuần/tháng cho quản lý. - Đóng góp ý kiến để nâng cao hiệu quả telesale và cải thiện kịch bản tư vấn.
Job Requirements: - Tối thiểu 6 tháng kinh nghiệm telesale, ưu tiên ngành mỹ phẩm, thực phẩm chức năng, sức khỏe, làm đẹp. - Hiểu biết cơ bản về sản phẩm collagen, thực phẩm chức năng là lợi thế. - Đã từng làm việc với data khách hàng từ Facebook là một điểm cộng. - Chịu áp lực doanh số, có tinh thần làm việc nhóm. - Biết sử dụng hệ thống CRM là lợi thế. QUYỀN LỢI & CHÍNH SÁCH - Thu nhập hấp dẫn: Lương cứng: 7 - 12 triệu/tháng (tùy năng lực) + Hoa hồng theo doanh số - Thưởng KPI: Thưởng nóng khi đạt chỉ tiêu, thưởng tháng, quý, năm. Thu nhập trung bình 12 - 20 triệu/tháng, có thể hơn nếu năng lực tốt. Chế độ phúc lợi đầy đủ: - Hợp đồng lao động, đóng BHXH, BHYT theo quy định. - Nghỉ lễ, phép năm theo quy định nhà nước. Đào tạo & cơ hội phát triển: - Được đào tạo bài bản về telesale, chốt đơn, chăm sóc khách hàng. - Đào tạo kiến thức chuyên sâu về sản phẩm collagen & sức khỏe. - Lộ trình thăng tiến rõ ràng Môi trường làm việc năng động: - Văn phòng hiện đại, đồng nghiệp thân thiện, hỗ trợ nhau. - Làm việc theo team, có sẵn data khách hàng, không cần tự tìm kiếm khách. THỜI GIAN & ĐỊA ĐIỂM LÀM VIỆC Thời gian làm việc: Từ T2 - T6: sáng: 8:30 - 12:00, chiều: 13:00 - 17:30. Thứ 7 làm online, Nghỉ CN. Địa chỉ: Tầng 8, tòa nhà Sao Mai, 19 Lê Văn Lương, Thanh Xuân, Hà Nội
Industry: Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Tiếp thị trực tuyến , Tư vấn

Company: Mattenplant Pte Ltd
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Du Lịch', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: Hỗ trợ đội ngũ bán hàng kỹ thuật về phạm vi cung cấp và tính toán chi phí liên quan đến các yêu cầu về điện, thiết bị đo lường, PLC và lập trình trong giai đoạn tìm kiếm khách hàng tiềm năng cho các hệ thống và dự án liên quan đến nước/nước thải. Thực hiện bản vẽ sơ đồ điện/một dây, sơ đồ GA và bản vẽ sơ đồ điều khiển của bảng điều khiển, lập danh sách BOM và chuẩn bị lập trình PLC (Siemens, Allen Bradley, v.v.) cho tất cả các điều khiển quy trình và chức năng của các hệ thống và thiết bị liên quan đến nước/nước thải. Làm việc, đàm phán và quản lý các nhà cung cấp phụ/liên quan đến việc mua sắm tất cả các công việc đi dây và cáp, gia công và lắp ráp bảng điều khiển cho các hệ thống cũng như lắp đặt tại chỗ các hệ thống hoặc dự án liên quan đến nước/nước thải. Liên lạc và trao đổi với khách hàng là người dùng cuối về các chi tiết kỹ thuật và thông số kỹ thuật của các bộ phận và linh kiện liên quan đến các công việc về điện, PLC và lập trình. Xác định và giám sát tiến độ mua sắm và lắp đặt tại công trường đối với các công việc đi dây và cáp, các công việc liên quan đến PLC của bảng điều khiển và việc cung cấp thiết bị. Chịu trách nhiệm lập kế hoạch và triển khai hoàn thiện nội thất cho các công việc điện và thiết bị đo lường của dự án. Kiểm tra các trạm xử lý nước thải (WWTP) và trạm xử lý nước (WTP) hiện tại để đề xuất các giải pháp cải tiến. Tạo và cập nhật Kế hoạch Chất lượng Dự án, bài học kinh nghiệm và tải dữ liệu lên hệ thống. Biên soạn và bàn giao sổ tay hướng dẫn vận hành và bảo trì (O&M) (phần điện và PLC, v.v.) cho khách hàng sử dụng cuối cùng. Cung cấp dịch vụ khách hàng một cách tốt nhất và làm việc với các đối tác (nhà cung cấp, MEP,...) để đạt được chất lượng bàn giao dự án tốt nhất. Đi đến các địa điểm dự án tại địa phương, văn phòng MATTEN và/hoặc khu vực khi cần thiết cho công việc tư vấn, giám sát lắp đặt tại công trường và/hoặc để xử lý sự cố và/hoặc công việc thử nghiệm và vận hành thử. Chuẩn bị các báo cáo thường xuyên bao gồm cập nhật tiến độ cho Giám đốc Dự án/Giám đốc điều hành. Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ khác theo yêu cầu của Giám đốc Dự án/Giám đốc điều hành. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Assisting the technical sales team in terms of scope of supplies and costing with respect to electrical, instrumentation, PLC, and programming requirements during the prospecting stage for water/wastewater-related systems and projects. Performing electrical/single-line diagrams, control panels' GA & schematic drawings, BOM list generation, and preparing PLC programming (Siemens, Allen Bradley, etc.) for all process and functional controls of water/wastewater-related systems and instruments. Liaising, negotiating, and managing sub-suppliers/sub with respect to procurements of all wiring and cabling works, fabrication and assembly of control panels for systems as well as for in-situ installation of water/wastewater-related systems or projects. Liaising and communicating with end-user customers on technical details and specifications of parts and components where electrical, PLC, and programming works are concerned. Determining and monitoring procurement and site installation progress and schedules where cabling and wiring works, control panels' PLC works, and supplies are concerned. Have responsibility for planning and delivery of interior fit-out for the electrical and instrumentation works of projects. Audit current WWTPs and WTPs to propose improving solutions. Create and update the Project Quality Plan, lessons learned, and load data on the system. Compiling and handing over operation and maintenance (O&M) manuals (electrical and PLC portions, etc.) to our end-user customers. Providing excellent client service and working with partners (suppliers, MEP,...) to achieve the best quality project handover. Traveling to local and/or regional project sites, MATTEN’s office where required for consultant service, site installation supervision works, and/or for troubleshooting and/or testing and commissioning works. Prepare regular reports including progress updates to the Project Manager/Managing Director. Perform other tasks as required by the Project Manager/Managing Director.
Job Requirements: A Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering, Instrumentation Engineering, Control Systems Engineering, or a related field is typically required. Advanced degrees or certifications (e.g., Professional Engineer license) may be preferred for senior roles. Strong knowledge of electrical systems, including power distribution, wiring, and circuit design. Expertise in instrumentation systems, such as sensors, transmitters, control valves, and PLCs (Programmable Logic Controllers). Familiarity with industry standards and codes (e.g., IEC, IEEE, ISA). Proficiency in design and analysis software (e.g., AutoCAD, EPLAN, MATLAB, or similar tools). Understanding of process control systems (e.g., DCS - Distributed Control Systems, SCADA - Supervisory Control and Data Acquisition). Excellent problem-solving, analytical, and project management skills. Strong communication skills with the ability to interact effectively with clients and cross-functional teams. Willingness to travel for project execution and client meetings.
Industry: Điện / Điện tử / Điện lạnh / Điện công nghiệp

Company: Techtronic Industries Vietnam Manufacturing Company Limited
Job Description: • Plan, coordinate, and conduct supplier process audits to ensure that necessary process controls are in place during supplier assessment visits or on-going supplier management assessments. • Implement and maintain process improvement and monitoring systems with suppliers as appropriate. These systems will focus on process controls, metrology, quality control, quality management and quality systems. • Understand the supplier's current capabilities and potential new capabilities and communicate to purchasing, engineering, and quality personnel. • Identify systemic supplier quality issues and drive corrective and preventative actions through 1) data and information collection regarding trends and issues 2) data and information collection from assessments and from supply base, and 3) root cause analysis and problem resolution. • Demonstrated specialized depth and/or breadth of process expertise in required area of focus. • Resolves complex problems using Root Cause, 8Ds, Six Sigma, Shainin Red X, and decision matrices. • Leads others to solve problems using analytical thought, exercising judgment and identifying innovative solutions. May lead functional teams or projects. • Communicates difficult concepts such as process improvements and changes and negotiates with others to effectively influence as appropriate. • Vendor metrology assessment and development to meet Milwaukee requirement
Job Requirements: Education: Electronic Engineer, Mechanical, Engineering major. Experience: 3 years in quality: QE, SQE Knowledge: In-depth knowledge and experience in die casting, machining, stamping, sintering, forming, welding, grinding, heat treatments and finishing processes (i.e., e-coating, painting, plating, etc). • Effectively investigate and identify potential metal vendors for casting, stamping, machining and motor laminations. • Ability to make a determination on metal vendor capabilities as it applies to manufacturing Milwaukee Tool parts and to isolate any areas of concern with these vendors. • Strong analytical skills, knowledge and experience in process evaluation tools: PFMEA, DOE, statistical data analysis, risk analysis, flow layout and other related engineering tools. • Strong emphasis on tool and die design along with gaging design and their implementation for repeatable process performance. • Ability to interpret part drawings (including knowledge of GD&T), understand tolerances and translate to process set up, offsets, parameters, etc. • Ability to set up, operate and troubleshoot equipment required for commodity of expertise. • Direct daily communications, both verbal and written (technical level), to ensure all groups are working toward the goal of timely project completion. • Well-developed and innovative problem-solving skills required • Proven track record of demonstrating leadership in managing complex, integrated projects. • Working knowledge of Quality Management Systems to support and validate Supplier Corrective Actions (SCAR) and root cause analysis (8D) related with process issues. • Work with engineering team to recommend process changes to support cost reduction initiatives • Well understanding about PCBA, ICP requirement
Industry: Quản lý chất lượng (QA/QC)

Company: Công Ty Tnhh Onpoint
Job Description: I - Handling Administrative Tasks for BAU and Ad-hoc Requests · Organize and clarify information received from various departments. · Send RFQs (Request for Quotation) to three suppliers, provide guidance to ensure accurate and complete quotations, and follow up to meet deadlines. · Prepare comparison tables by structuring and presenting data in a standardized format. · Review and edit contract wording and formatting; coordinate between suppliers and the legal team to ensure goods/services details are consistent with requirements. · Handle document approval, printing, record-keeping, and courier dispatch between suppliers and internal teams. · Collect payment documents, including contracts, invoices, and delivery notes, and verify their accuracy. · Co-receive goods with the request owner. · Resolve conflicts related to damaged goods/services and address stakeholder concerns at a low level. II - Expense Tracking and Management · Perform monthly cost reconciliation to identify incorrect exchange rate charges, ensuring accurate data for year-end negotiations (e.g., Office 365, cloud services, or other subscription-based software). · Monitor monthly expenses to prevent unnecessary charges. · Track purchasing history to avoid duplicate requests. · Monitor service contract renewal deadlines to negotiate early, securing better deals and avoiding last-minute renewals.
Job Requirements: 1. Education background requirements: - Bachelor at relevant experience. 2. Experience/Industry requirements: - Adhering to a high level of integrity is a must. - Good in negotiations and communication. Fluent in English and Vietnamese is a must. - Proven working experience as a procurement manager in multinational companies, manufacturing environments, or packaging industries is a plus. - Expertise in supplier management and procurement with good knowledge of ERP systems is preferable. - Good interpersonal skills. - Aptitude in decision-making and working with numbers. - Negotiation and contract management. 3. Competency requirements: - Analysis & Problem Solving: Identifies and analyses a range of problems by isolating key issues, evaluating relevant data and reaching logical conclusions. - Client Centric: Building strong customer relationships and delivering customer-centric solutions. - Communication: Communicates confidently and professionally, respecting the audience, engendering confidence and trust from external stakeholders and from individuals, teams, departments and the company. - Accountability & Ownership: Plans and balances a range of tasks, assignments, projects and resources. Is able to cope with conflicting demands without undue disruption in order to get things done. - Stakeholder management: Identifying, engaging, and satisfying the needs and expectations of various stakeholders involved in a project or organization. - Teamwork and Collaboration: · Building partnerships and working collaboratively with others to meet shared objectives. · Building strong-identity teams that apply their diverse skills and perspectives to achieve common goals.
Industry: Thương mại điện tử , Vận chuyển / Giao nhận / Kho vận , Hành chính / Thư ký

Company: Yes4All Trading Services Company Limited
Job Description: Yes4All is one of the leading brands for home sporting goods & furniture in the e-commerce market. Founded in 2010, we have strived to be the world leader in e-commerce enablers in term of trading, product creating and e-commerce servicing. Based in California with an operation office in HCMC, we have more than 500 young and talented members with expert knowledge and experience in the e-commerce industry. We are on an ambitious journey to dominate not only US e-commerce market but also to enter new e-commerce markets of more than 15 countries in Europe, Asia and North America, not only Amazon channel but also Walmart, Wayfair among others. Besides, Home Sporting Goods, Furniture, Outdoor and Gardening are also great opportunities that we desire to occupy and create significant values. With our steady knowledge in E-commerce, Yes4All started to provide end-to-end ecommerce-enabler service in order to help Vietnamese and global manufacturers or struggling sellers bring their products to the US & International markets. Our mission: Connect the Worldwide Resources & create innovative platform to bring products and services from innovators and manufacturers to worldwide customers more efficiently. Our vision: To be the world leader of e-commerce enabler in term of trading, product creating, and e-commerce servicing. I. JOB DESCRIPTIONS At Yes4all, we aim to triple our global growth this year. To support this goal, we are seeking a talented and ambitious Performance Marketing Executive to join our fun and fast-paced environment. This individual will play a crucial role in managing day-to-day performance marketing initiatives across different marketplaces. Develop and execute performance marketing campaigns on the Amazon platform using data-driven insights Optimize campaigns for search engines through effective SEO, SEM tactics Manage budgets, supervise search operations, and optimize bids for performance marketing initiatives to ensure maximum ROI Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product, content, sales to ensure campaign success. Regularly analyze performance and make recommendations for improvement Accurately report campaign performance to line managers Stay up-to-date with industry trends and implement new strategies for continuous improvement Conduct market research to identify new opportunities for customer acquisition and sales growth Demonstrate a love of learning, sharing, teamwork, and personal development.
Job Requirements: II. SKILL AND EXPERIENCE Bachelor‘s degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field 1-3 years of experience in performance marketing, with a strong focus on e-commerce Experience in performance marketing, specifically with PPC channels (Google, Coc Coc, etc.) and knowledge of SEO Strong analytical skills and ability to make informed decisions using data Proficient in data analytics tools such as Excel, Google Sheets, and Google Data Studio Proficient in SEO and SEM tactics and able to create effective performance marketing plans Excellent project management and organizational skills, with the ability to handle multiple projects simultaneously Strong communication and interpersonal skills, able to work cross-functionally and collaborate with teams across the organization Good English and comfortable interacting in a multinational team. Will be plus: Experience with Amazon advertising platforms and tools (e.g. Amazon PPC, Amazon DSP) Experience with e-commerce/social commerce platforms such as Amazon, or Walmart/Target/Tik Tok,… and so on. Passion for sports and sport-related products. III. WHY YOU WILL LOVE JOINING US? FOR YOU TO JOIN Financial Well-being: A competitive salary with 13th month salary, annual performance bonus and a variety of allowances. Salary review: annually or on excellent performance. Activities: company trips, team-building, and other customized monthly bonding events. Annual leaves: 16 days off and 01 Birthday Leave per year. Healthcare: annual health check, insurance according to Labor Law and extra PTI Insurance package. Working Environment: dynamic, friendly environments with working time flexibility (Mon-Fri), and other perks include snacks, coffee, and healthy food provided daily suited for hardworking, fun, and team collaboration. FOR YOU TO GROW Ambition: We are now keeping on with our hyper growth to multicategory, multichannel, multimarket, and expanding into the world largest e-commerce enabler. Hence, there will continuously be opportunities to challenge yourself, learn new skills and knowledge. Challenges : Your voice can always be heard as we embrace the eagerness of learning and sharing. You can be your own boss and create your own value with the ability to take initiative and make decisions in all aspects of work. Chances: Be led and coached by experienced and inspirational leaders and participate in various training courses where you can enlarge your knowledge and experience in the E-commerce and Supply Chain industry. FOR YOU TO STAY People : Having a headquarter in the US and an operation office in Vietnam, our team is young and highly motivated. You will be working with and alongside members having experiences from International Corporations or high profile from Vietnam that share the same passion and dedication. Culture: Our working environment is humble, collaborative and 100% healthy. We promote Exchange & Speak out, you can receive transparent and supportive feedback so you can perform the best. Career path : Provide you a great career path, open to rotating for your better understanding of the company and contribute across many of our functions. And much more, join us and let yourself explore other fantastic things!
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ , Tiếp thị trực tuyến
