Job Title: Giám Đốc Công Nghệ - Cto (Chief Technology Officer)
Company: Ngân Hàng Tmcp Tiên Phong (Tpbank)
Job Description: Mục tiêu công việc Chịu trách nhiệm định hướng, triển khai và tối ưu các giải pháp công nghệ cốt lõi cho ngân hàng. Tập trung vào việc xây dựng và tích hợp các nền tảng công nghệ tiên tiến, hỗ trợ chuyển đổi số, tăng cường năng lực cạnh tranh và bảo mật dữ liệu. Vai trò này yêu cầu kiến thức chuyên sâu về hệ thống ngân hàng và các xu hướng công nghệ hiện đại, đồng thời phối hợp chặt chẽ với CIO để định hình chiến lược công nghệ dài hạn. Mô tả công việc 1. Phát triển Chiến lược Công nghệ Nghiên cứu và đề xuất chiến lược phát triển công nghệ phù hợp với xu hướng ngành và mục tiêu kinh doanh. Xây dựng lộ trình công nghệ dài hạn, hỗ trợ quá trình chuyển đổi số. Phối hợp với CIO trong việc đánh giá và áp dụng công nghệ mới. 2. Quản lý và Triển khai Công nghệ Mũi nhọn Đề xuất và triển khai các giải pháp dựa trên AI/GenAI/ML/DL, Blockchain, Cloud Computing, Big Data, RPA và IoT. Theo định hướng AI First, Data First và Cloud ready. Quản lý việc tích hợp các công nghệ FinTech và Open Banking. Xây dựng hệ thống API mở và tối ưu hóa trải nghiệm khách hàng qua ứng dụng di động, ví điện tử và ngân hàng số. 3. Phát triển và Tối ưu Hệ thống Thiết kế kiến trúc hệ thống (System Architecture) và tích hợp các nền tảng công nghệ trên nền Cloud và Hybrid Cloud. Tối ưu hóa hiệu suất hệ thống và cải thiện khả năng mở rộng. Hỗ trợ đội ngũ kỹ thuật trong việc triển khai các giải pháp CI/CD và DevOps. 4. Nghiên cứu và Đổi mới Công nghệ Theo dõi xu hướng công nghệ và thử nghiệm các giải pháp mới nhằm thúc đẩy đổi mới sáng tạo. Hợp tác với các đối tác công nghệ và nhà cung cấp để xây dựng hệ sinh thái ngân hàng số. 5. Lãnh đạo và quản lý Có khả năng và kinh nghiệm lãnh đạo và quản lý các đội ngũ kỹ thuật lớn hoặc phân tán, bao gồm tuyển dụng, phát triển và duy trì đội ngũ nhân tài. Có khả năng xây dựng văn hóa làm việc hiệu quả, sáng tạo và hợp tác trong đội ngũ công nghệ. 6. Quản lý chiến lược và tài chính Thành thạo việc quản lý ngân sách, đảm bảo chi tiêu hiệu quả cho các dự án công nghệ. Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với các đối tác, nhà đầu tư hoặc khách hàng trong việc trình bày và bảo vệ chiến lược công nghệ.
Job Requirements: Yêu cầu công việc 1. Trình độ Học vấn và Kinh nghiệm Tốt nghiệp đại học trở lên chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin, Khoa học máy tính hoặc các lĩnh vực liên quan. Tối thiểu 7–10 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực phát triển và triển khai công nghệ trong ngân hàng hoặc tổ chức tài chính, công ty Fintech. Đã từng tham gia hoặc lãnh đạo các dự án công nghệ quy mô lớn, từ giai đoạn lên ý tưởng đến triển khai thực tế. Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với các công nghệ như AI/ML, Blockchain, Cloud, RPA, Big Data và API Banking. 2. Kỹ năng Chuyên môn Kiến thức sâu rộng về kiến trúc hệ thống, quản lý cơ sở dữ liệu (Oracle, SQL Server). Kinh nghiệm trong việc xây dựng và triển khai các mô hình Microservices và API Gateway. Thành thạo các công cụ DevOps như Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins. Hiểu biết về nền tảng BackBase (Backbase platform). Am hiểu về bảo mật thông tin, bao gồm mã hóa dữ liệu, IAM và hệ thống giám sát an ninh. 3. Năng lực và Kỹ năng mềm Khả năng phân tích chiến lược và giải quyết vấn đề phức tạp. Tinh thần đổi mới sáng tạo và nhạy bén với công nghệ. Kỹ năng giao tiếp và làm việc nhóm tốt. Có năng lực lãnh đạo, kết nối, đào tạo và huấn luyện tốt. 4. Khả năng thích ứng Sẵn sàng làm việc trong môi trường thay đổi nhanh chóng. Đam mê đổi mới và cải tiến công nghệ. Kỳ vọng Một CTO (Chief Technology Officer) trong ngành ngân hàng cần phải nắm bắt các công nghệ mới và xu hướng đổi mới để đảm bảo tính cạnh tranh và an toàn cho ngân hàng. Dưới đây là các công nghệ quan trọng: 1. Trí tuệ nhân tạo (AI) và Học máy (ML) Ứng dụng: Phát hiện gian lận, phân tích dữ liệu hành vi khách hàng, đánh giá tín dụng tự động. Công cụ: TensorFlow, IBM Watson, Oracle AI. 2. Điện toán Đám mây (Cloud Computing) Ứng dụng: Cơ sở hạ tầng linh hoạt, khả năng mở rộng nhanh chóng và giảm chi phí vận hành. Công cụ: AWS, Microsoft Azure, Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI). 3. Bảo mật mạng (Cybersecurity) Ứng dụng: Bảo vệ dữ liệu nhạy cảm, quản lý truy cập và phòng chống tấn công mạng. Xu hướng: Zero Trust Security, mã hóa dữ liệu đầu cuối, bảo mật sinh trắc học. Công cụ: Palo Alto Networks, Fortinet, Symantec. 4. Dữ liệu lớn (Big Data) và Phân tích dữ liệu (Data Analytics) Ứng dụng: Dự báo xu hướng thị trường, phân tích hành vi khách hàng và cải thiện dịch vụ. Công cụ: Hadoop, Apache Spark, Oracle Big Data SQL. 5. API (Open Banking và Open API) Ứng dụng: Tích hợp các dịch vụ bên thứ ba, cho phép ngân hàng tạo ra hệ sinh thái tài chính mở. Công cụ: RESTful APIs, GraphQL. 6. Ngân hàng số và Ứng dụng Di động Ứng dụng: Tăng cường trải nghiệm khách hàng với giao dịch trực tuyến, ví điện tử và các công cụ quản lý tài chính cá nhân. Công cụ: Flutter, React Native, Firebase. 7. DevOps và CI/CD (Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment) Ứng dụng: Tăng tốc phát triển phần mềm, triển khai nhanh và an toàn. Công cụ: Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes.
Industry: Ngân hàng , Tài chính / Đầu tư , CNTT - Phần mềm

Company: Công Ty Nabati Việt Nam
Job Description: Job Objective: To manage daily EDD operational follow the company process, policy and procedure To make sure enough product at EDD to sales Key roles and responsibilities : 1. Inventory control Supervise the warehousing Control Inventory in System and actual Monthly Stock Check 2. AR Control Control and manage SFA data Check AR Report 3. Cash control Reconcile Cash report and DSR Manage petty cash of EDD 4. Delivery control Arrange the daily delivery route Status Delivery Report Delivery sevice level (100% delivery) Confirm Delivery Cost (COD, Unloading, Road fee, Rental Car and bike fee) 5. EDD monthly Closing Check EDD Cash in account Check EDD revenue account Check EDD Cash out account Check Inventory account Check AR account Other Project from FECM, FAM * Benefit package: Net Salary: Your take-home pay after deductions. 13th Month Salary & KPI Bonus Healthcare: Extra health coverage beyond the basic. Opportunities for professional development. Supportive and employee-centric work environment. Engagement Activities: Activities to enhance employee engagement and team spirit.
Job Requirements: Age/Gender/ Other requirement Age: Over 26 years old Gender: Not require Knowledge/ experience in FMCG is advantage Able to keep confidential company data is required Qualification and Experience Education: Economic university Experience: Have 4 years experience about accounting and operational control Capability requirement: Specific knowledge about Operation of branches, control cost, manage employees. Personalities: Carefully, Honerst, interity, willing to learn, willing to work extra time Ability to work fast, effectively, under high pressure. Ability to work overtime for meeting deadlines. Proficient at Office (excel) and accounting software. Able to self-acknowledged and learn from experience, able to acquire knowledge for self–improvement Able to communicate in English. Skills requirement: Staff management skill Inventory management skill Asset management skill Logistics management skill Cost management skill Problem solving skill Teamwork skill
Industry: Vận chuyển / Giao nhận / Kho vận , Thực phẩm & Đồ uống , Kế toán / Kiểm toán

Company: Công Ty Cp Dược Phẩm Pharmacity
Job Description: We are looking for an experienced Engineering Manager to lead our digital platform engineering team, responsible for our e-commerce web and app platforms and integrations with marketplaces, logistics providers, and partners. This role will oversee the development of seamless, scalable integrations while ensuring our core platforms remain reliable and performant. Key Responsibilities Team Management: Lead and mentor a team of ~10 engineers (backend, frontend, mobile) and collaborate with product owners to align technical execution with business goals. Technical Leadership: Oversee the architecture, development and integration of our e-commerce ecosystem, covering: Web & App (Next.js, React Native, Golang backend) Marketplaces (e.g., Grab Mart, Shopee …) 3rd-party logistics (e.g., AhaMove, GiaoHangNhanh…) External partners integration (Healthcare systems, HIS systems) Internal system integration: ERP, BI reporting, OMS, WMS… Development & Delivery: Own the engineering roadmap, manage sprints, and ensure timely delivery of high-quality software and integrations. Operational Support & Reliability: Ensure the platform runs smoothly by implementing monitoring, incident response, and continuous improvement processes. Integration & API Development: Drive the development of robust, scalable APIs for partner integrations, ensuring performance, security, and uptime. Scalability & Performance: Ensure our architecture supports high-traffic transactions, order synchronization, and real-time data exchange. Collaboration: Work closely with product, business, and external partners to design and implement integration strategies that enhance efficiency and user experience. Hiring & Growth: Recruit, onboard, and grow engineering talent within the team to support business expansion.
Job Requirements: 8+ years of experience in software development, with at least 3+ years in a leadership role managing engineering teams to work on fully SDCL with combination of Lean, Agile & Design Thinking experience. Strong background in system architecture & backend development with Golang and experience with React Native (mobile) and Next.js (web). Experience designing and managing API-driven integrations with the ecommerce domain, marketplaces, logistics providers, and enterprise systems (HIS, OMS, ERP, etc.). Solid understanding of microservices, cloud infrastructure, event-driven architecture (Kafka/Pulsar/WebSockets), and DevOps practices. Deep understanding of SDLC, with a strong focus on operational support, monitoring, and incident resolution. Excellent leadership and team-building skills, with the ability to foster a culture of ownership, continuous learning, and innovation. Excellent communication skills and the ability to bridge the gap between technical and business stakeholders. Nice to Have Experience with CI/CD, Kubernetes, or cloud platforms (AWS/Azure). Knowledge of message queues (Kafka, RabbitMQ) and real-time data streaming. Prior experience supporting high-availability, high-traffic systems in e-commerce, logistics, or healthcare.
Industry: Dược phẩm/ Hóa Mỹ Phẩm , Chăm sóc sức khỏe / Thẩm mỹ / Làm đẹp , CNTT - Phần mềm

Job Title: Cvc/Cvcc Phân Tích Kinh Doanh (Mảng Thu Hồi Nợ) - Ta156
Company: Ngân Hàng Tmcp Việt Nam Thịnh Vượng - Vpbank
Job Description: Là đầu mối phân tích các chỉ số hoạt động thu hồi nợ (THN) nhằm đề xuất nguyên tắc giao danh sách phân bổ, chỉ tiêu thu nợ và chiến lược vận hành THN. Cụ thể: Xây dựng báo cáo phân tích chuyên sâu, hiệu quả về các chỉ số RFR, NFR, Rollback, Stabilized, Paid of, Recovery rate, %RPC, %TPC, %UNC nhằm kịp thời phát hiện ra các vấn đề về chất lượng danh mục, chất lượng tác nghiệp thu hồi nợ để đưa ra đề xuất hành động/chiến lược cải thiện nhằm đạt chỉ tiêu THN theo từng thời kỳ. Phối hợp Trung tâm phân tích kinh doanh xây dựng báo cáo, phân tích chuyên sâu về năng suất lao động theo quantile, các chỉ số: working time, Productivity của các cán bộ thu hội nợ nhằm tìm ra chân dung cán bộ thu hồi nợ có năng suất cao, đề xuất cơ chế, cách thức vận hành nhằm đạt tối ưu hiệu suất thu hồi nợ phù hợp chiến lược từng thời kỳ. Phối hợp với Phòng phân tích nâng cao (Data science) về đề bài và logic để xây dựng các model dự báo sớm về chất lượng danh mục theo mô hình chiến lược dựa trên phản hồi của khách hang (Responsed base) từ đó có sự sắp xếp nguồn lực nhân sự theo từng chiến lược (Call/field) và phân khúc. Phân tích chuyên sâu chất lượng danh mục thu hồi nợ dựa trên phản hồi của khách hàng từ đó phân hóa (segmentation) danh mục, đề xuất chân dung khách hang mục tiêu và đề xuất áp chiến thuật, chiến lược tác động và tần suất tác động phù hợp nhằm đạt hiệu quả thu hồi nợ. Phân tích chuyên sâu hiệu quả các chương trình giải pháp tài chính áp dụng cho các phân khúc khách hang nhằm có khuyến nghị vê chính sách, sản phẩm nhằm đạt hiệu quả thu hồi nợ, giảm NPL và giảm trích lập dự phòng. Thực hiện báo cáo định kỳ, đột xuất về hoạt động thu hồi nợ cho Trưởng phòng quản lý hoạt động thu hồi nợ theo yêu cầu. Thực hiện các công việc khác theo sự phân công của cấp trên theo quy định của Ngân hàng từng thời kỳ. Thực hiện các công việc khác theo sự phân công của cấp trên trong từng thời kỳ.
Job Requirements: Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên các chuyên ngành Toán kinh tế, Kinh tế, Tài chính – ngân hàng. Am hiểu về lĩnh vực tín dụng, thu hồi nợ, xử lý nợ. Có tối thiểu 02 năm kinh nghiệm tại 01 trong các lĩnh vực trong ngành ngân hàng như: quản trị rủi ro, thu hồi nợ, xử lý nợ, kế hoạch chính sách, kế hoạch tài chính… Sử dụng thành thạo SQL, VBA, Excel, Power Point, Word. Tiếng anh (Giao tiếp, viết, nói). Tổng hợp, tính toán, phân tích số liệu. Kỹ năng thuyết trình; kỹ năng lập kế hoạch, tổ chức công việc; kỹ năng giải quyết xung đột và làm việc áp lực cao. Cẩn thận, tỉ mỉ, chủ động, kỷ luật. QUYỀN LỢI Thu nhập hấp dẫn, lương thưởng cạnh tranh theo năng lực; Thưởng các Ngày lễ, Tết (theo chính sách ngân hàng từng thời kỳ); Được vay ưu đãi theo chính sách ngân hàng từng thời kỳ; Chế độ ngày phép hấp dẫn theo cấp bậc công việc; Bảo hiểm bắt buộc theo luật lao động + Bảo hiểm VPBank care cho CBNV tùy theo cấp bậc và thời gian công tác; Được tham gia các khóa đào tạo tùy thuộc vào Khung đào tạo cho từng vị trí; Thời gian làm việc: từ thứ 2 – thứ 6 & sáng thứ 7; Môi trường làm việc năng động, thân thiện, có nhiều cơ hội học đào tạo, học hỏi và phát triển; được tham gia nhiều hoạt động văn hóa thú vị (cuộc thi về thể thao, tài năng, hoạt động teambuiding...).
Industry: Ngân hàng , Thống kê , Tài chính / Đầu tư

Company: Công Ty Tnhh Millennium Furniture
Job Description: JOB SUMMARY The Continuous Improvement (CI) Manager is responsible for leading and managing initiatives to enhance operational efficiency, productivity, and quality within the organization. This role involves analyzing current processes, identifying areas for improvement, and implementing strategies to streamline operations. The CI Manager will work closely with various departments to foster a culture of continuous improvement and drive sustainable changes that align with the organization's strategic goals. ESSENTIAL DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES Process Analysis and Improvement: Conduct thorough analyses of existing processes to identify inefficiencies and areas for improvement. Identify, remove, and minimize the impact of manufacturing opportunities through waste elimination, increased capacity, improved efficiency, improved logistics, and reduced complexity. Lead initiatives that integrate Lean manufacturing, throughout the facility, using continuous improvement (CI) tools such as Kaizen events, 5S, Six Sigma, OEE, mistake proofing, etc. to reduce waste, optimize capital assets, and improve throughput. Project Management: Lead continuous improvement projects from inception to completion, ensuring timely and successful implementation. Coordinate cross-functional teams to execute improvement initiatives and achieve project goals. Data Analysis and Reporting: Collect, analyze, and interpret data to track performance metrics and identify trends. Provide regular reports on the progress and impact of continuous improvement projects. Training and Development: Train and mentor employees on continuous improvement tools, techniques, and best practices. Develop training materials for Lean processes and principles, as well as other training materials as necessary. Promote a culture of continuous learning and improvement throughout the organization. Collaboration and Communication: Collaborate with department heads and team leaders to understand their challenges and opportunities for improvement. Facilitate workshops and meetings to generate ideas and solutions for process enhancements. Innovation and Best Practices: Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in continuous improvement methodologies. Benchmark best practices and incorporate innovative solutions to enhance operational efficiency. SCOPE OF RESPONSIBILITY Take care of all operational continuous improvement in all business divisions: Cut and Sew, Casegood, Bedding, and Plastic.
Job Requirements: MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS Education Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Engineering, Operations Management, or a related field. Proven experience in process improvement, quality management, or operational excellence roles. Strong knowledge of continuous improvement methodologies such as Lean, Six Sigma, Kaizen, etc. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills. Proficiency in data analysis and process mapping tools. Strong project management skills with the ability to lead cross-functional teams. Effective communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously. Experience More than 7 years of experience in Lean/ CI/ Production Certification in Lean Six Sigma (e.g., Green Belt, Black Belt). Familiarity with change management principles and practices. Advanced knowledge of statistical analysis and quality control tools. Knowledge of: Manufacturing and Lean Skills and Abilities Good at number, cost Analysis ability Highly capable of identifying problems and solving problems. Very proactive and energetic. Systematic, methodical, detailed, thorough, and transparent. Good at Written and Spoken English Positive, enthusiastic, creative, embraces changes, performs under pressure. Work well in a team-based environment. EQUIPMENT USED Computer: MS Office, Statistical software, Auto CAD Scientific Calculator MENTAL & PHYSICAL DEMANDS/WORKING CONDITIONS Mental Effort Ability to meet deadlines Attention to detail Working Conditions General office conditions Factory and warehouse environment
Industry: Quản lý điều hành , Sản xuất / Vận hành sản xuất , Ngành khác

Company: Công Ty Tnhh Kingden Trading
Job Description: About us: TELEHIVE CORP was founded in 2021 - An global company specializing in business of home appliances in the Southeast Asian market. We have branches in China, Malaysia, Philippines and Vietnam. With more than 200 employees, we are an experienced, enthusiastic and dynamic team. About the position: We are looking for a passionate and results-oriented ecommerce operation Leader to join our growing team! This is a key leadership role, you will be responsible for the stable operation & growth results of the whole ecommerce team. Job Responsibilities Responsible for all operation of daily ecommerce platforms, including strategy, details plan, results measure,... to promote the achievement of sales target; In charge of analyzing all the data effectively, including find out the actual reasons, risks... and have detailed solutions; Manage and train the team to improve the overall skills to achieve goals; Aside with warehouse dept to monitor and control inventory status to ensure the available goods for sales campaigns; Support other depts to ensure the achievement of project objectives; Other tasks required by company.
Job Requirements: Requirements Bachelor's degree in Ecommerce, Marketing, Business Adminstration or other related fields; Fluency in English or Chinese; More than 5 years exp of ecommerce operation; successful exp of operating ecommerce stores; From 2-3 years exp at Leader position (manage 5-10 members), strong at team management skill; Work proactively and actively, Strong sense of responsibility, strain ability and strong execution ability; Strong data, market analysis ability, good problem analysis and solving ability; Strong communication ability, team organization and coordination; Metric-oriented, but still come up with creative problem solutions, and not afraid to try new ideas. Allowances & Benefits: Visa, return flight tickets; Dormitory with full amenities; Annual leaves (base on Philip law); Working devices are fully provided; Complimentary snacks and drinks; Monthly Incentives; Internal activities & Team Building. Location and Working Hours In Vietnam Location: Ha Son Tower, 277A Nguyen Van Dau St, Ward 11, Binh Thanh District, HCM City; Working days: Mon - Fri (Alternative Sat in month); Working hours: 9:00 - 18:00 (break time 1.5h). In Philippines Location: Tektite West Tower, Exchange Rd, San Antonio, Pasig City, Metro Manila; Working days: Mon - Sat (Sat: work from home); Working hours: 9:30 - 18:30 (break time 1h).
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Tiếp thị trực tuyến

Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Công Nghệ Sen Đỏ
Job Description: Position Overview: The Product Manager will lead the strategic direction and management of our product portfolio, overseeing the entire product lifecycle from ideation to launch and beyond. This role requires a visionary leader with a deep understanding of market trends, customer needs, and technological advancements to drive product innovation and align with the company's business objectives. Key Responsibilities: Product Strategy and Vision: Develop and execute a comprehensive product strategy that aligns with the company's goals and market opportunities. Product Development Oversight: Lead cross-functional teams in the design, development, testing, and launch of new products and features, ensuring timely delivery and alignment with quality standards. Market and Customer Analysis: Conduct thorough market research and analyze customer feedback to identify needs, preferences, and emerging trends, informing product development and enhancements. Product Roadmap Management: Create and maintain a detailed product roadmap, prioritizing initiatives based on business value, resource availability, and strategic goals. Performance Monitoring: Establish key performance indicators (KPIs) to assess product success, analyze performance data, and implement improvements as necessary. Stakeholder Collaboration: Work closely with engineering, design, marketing, sales, and other departments to ensure cohesive product development and successful market entry. Risk Management: Identify potential risks in the product development process and develop mitigation strategies to ensure successful project outcomes.
Job Requirements: Educational Background: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Technology Information or a related field. Experience: A minimum of 8 years in product management, with at least 3 years in a leadership role within the technology sector. Ladership Skills: Proven ability to lead and inspire cross-functional teams, fostering a culture of collaboration and innovation. Strategic Thinking: Demonstrated experience in developing and executing product strategies that drive business growth. Analytical Abilities: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to leverage data to inform decision-making. Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, capable of effectively conveying complex concepts to diverse audiences. Technical Proficiency: Familiarity with agile methodologies, product management tools, and a solid understanding of current technological trends. Market Insight: Deep understanding of market analysis, competitive landscape, and customer segmentation. Benefits: Competitive salary and benefits Attractive 13th month salary and performance bonus Annual performance review for salary raise and promotion Premium private insurance (PTI Insurance) with discount for family members Annual health check 18 days of annual leave Company trips and team buildings Gifts on special accession: individual /company birthday, Tet and Holidays Internal activities, sport and social clubs Opportunity to training both technical and soft skills to develop your career path
Industry: CNTT - Phần mềm

Company: Vietnamese-German University (Vgu)
Job Description: The duties and responsibilities of Admission Officer include but is not limited to: 1. Work on admission and entrance examination regulations. Work on rules for all entrance examinations carried out at VGU; Work on and develop the Admission and Entrance Examination processes; Help to conceptually optimize all regulations if administrative problems are arising 2. Work on online applications system closely with Student Recruitment Dept. and study programs. Provide consulting to candidates of Bachelor programs about admission and application process; Review online applications following admission regulations; Check and reply emails of applicants and relevant departments/ units. 3. Make admission announcements, admission decisions, meeting minutes, relevant documents and ensure it is issued and released on time. Announce admission results to applicants. 4. Work on Integrated Campus Management System (ICMS). Keep track and validate admission results of applicants of all study programs. Provide statistic data and relevant reports on demand. 5. Organize VGU's own entrance examinations for Bachelor applicants. Work closely together with other departments/units (e.g. Student Recruitment, Language Center and Foundation Year and Student Affairs) and the faculties for the admission and enrollment procedures. 6. Give general guidance to applicants and coordinators/ relevant units concerning admission and entrance examination regulations. 7. Review,·develop and manage to issuing/archiving the VGU's Bachelor admission processes and relevant guidelines and regulations; make sure that all legal requirements are fulfilled. 8. Maintain an up-to-date understanding of regulations of the Ministry of Education and Training and practices of other universities regarding admission and entrance examination for bachelor programs and contribute to the revision of university regulations, policies and procedures. 9. Organise internal/external workshops, trainings, events relating to admission, entrance examination or arrange staff and faculty attendance at such events organised by external institutions if necessary. 10. Archive, manage and maintain update-to- date content/documents/ decisions related to admission, entrance examination on VGU's website, Quality Handbook on wiki page, VGU's cloud, cabinets and other archive systems.
Job Requirements: 1. Qualification: Bachelor's degree relevant field. 2. Experience: Experience in university administration, admission, examination for bachelor programs. More than 2 year of experience in admission for bachelor programs at universities in Vietnam would be a plus 3. Knowledge: Knowledge about examination procedures, university administration and Vietnamese legal regulations regarding all examination and admission procedures; knowledge of German regulations is an advance. 4. S kills Good proficiency in Vietnamese and English both in written and orally; Good command in using MS Office Software; online Office tools; Demonstrate the practice of records and data management process by office software; Strong customer service skills, creative, initiative, can-do attitude; Be able to work efficiently under pressure to multi-tasks and time constraint, independent and self-organized. 5. Behaviours required Good manners of expression, good writing skills and organizational skills; Ability to work cross-teams in a service and outcome-oriented way.
Industry: Giáo dục / Đào tạo , Hành chính / Thư ký , Kế toán / Kiểm toán

Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Hasaki Beauty & Clinic
Job Description: Category: Beauty. Report to: Brand Manager. Location: 555 3/2 Street, Ward 8, District 10, Ho Chi Minh City. Working time: 8:30 AM to 5:30 PM (Monday – Friday) and 8:30 - 12:30 (Saturday Morning). I. Job Objectives: The Product Management Specialist is responsible for executing the process of new product research & development (NPD), working with manufacturers and R&D teams to ensure products are developed according to standards and timelines. Additionally, the Product Specialist collaborates with relevant departments to ensure smooth product launches, conducts market research, and monitors marketing activities, including working with agencies to implement KOL/KOC campaigns. II. Key Responsibilities: 1. New Product Research & Development (NPD): Monitor and oversee the product development process from ideation to launch. Work with manufacturers and R&D teams to ensure product formulations, packaging, and standards meet requirements. Track production progress, inspect sample quality, and suggest necessary adjustments. Coordinate with the legal department to ensure product compliance with registration and certification regulations. 2. Market Research & Trend Analysis: Collect and analyze market data, beauty trends, and customer needs to propose product improvements. Monitor competitor activities and report to the Brand Manager to adjust strategies as needed. Conduct customer surveys to gain insights and feedback on products. 3. Cross-Department Collaboration for Product Launches: Support the Brand Manager in working with Marketing, Trade Marketing, and Sales teams to implement product launch plans. Track the supply chain process to ensure timely product availability across distribution channels. Prepare product documents and assist in training sales and customer service teams. Collaborate with agencies to oversee marketing campaigns related to KOL/KOC, PR, and sampling. Review marketing content to ensure alignment with brand and product messaging. Monitor campaign performance and compile reports to optimize marketing activities
Job Requirements: III. Requirements: 1. Experience: At least 2-3 years of experience in cosmetics, beauty, or FMCG in Product Management, Brand Management, or equivalent roles. 2. Education: Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Economics, Business Administration, Biotechnology, or related fields. 3. Technical Skills: Understanding of the product development process for cosmetics, skincare, and makeup. Experience in market research, data analysis, and product strategy development. Ability to track and manage projects from ideation to market launch. Experience working with agencies and KOL/KOC in the beauty industry. 4. Soft Skills: Strong time management and multi-tasking abilities to ensure project timelines. Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate with multiple stakeholders. Strong analytical thinking, strategic mindset, and creativity. Proficiency in MS Office. Fluency in English is an advantage.
Industry: Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ

Job Title: Chuyên Viên Phát Triển Phần Mềm It
Company: Ngân Hàng Thương Mại Cổ Phần Bảo Việt
Job Description: Thực hiện các yêu cầu phát triển mới/chỉnh sửa hệ thống Corebanking T24; hệ thống thẻ Way4; Các hệ thống kênh giao tiếp điện tử: Internet Banking, Mobile Banking, SMS banking, Payment Gateway, E-Commerce ... ; Các hệ thống hỗ trợ MIS, FTP … - Tham gia nghiên cứu, thử nghiệm và nâng cấp hệ thống Core Banking, Hệ thống thẻ, DataWarehouse... - Tìm hiểu các giải pháp Công nghệ trong lĩnh vực ngân hàng, nghiên cứu khả năng ứng dụng vào hoạt động của BAOVIET Bank - Tiếp nhận chuyển giao, đào tạo công nghệ từ các đối tác. - Thực hiện những nhiệm vụ và trách nhiệm khác do Lãnh đạo có thẩm quyền phân công. - Tuân thủ Nội quy lao động của Ngân hàng.
Job Requirements: Yêu cầu về học vấn: Tốt nghiệp Đại học ngành đào tạo Công nghệ Thông tin hoặc Toán tin ứng dụng hoặc Điện tử viễn thông. Có khả năng lập trình tốt với ít nhất một trong những ngôn ngữ sau: Java, C#, Info Basic (jBase) Có hiểu biết cơ bản ít nhất một trong những cơ sở dữ liệu sau: Oracle, SQL Server, jBase Hiểu biết cơ bản ít nhất một trong những hệ điều hành sau: Windows, Unix, Linux. Hiểu biết về ISO message 8583, NDC++, Diebold912, EMV, ATM, POS, NAC/NCC, HSM là một lợi thế. Có hiểu biết về một trong những kiến thức sau là một lợi thế, bao gồm: Kiến trúc hướng đối tượng (SOA), Lập trình hướng đối tượng (OOP), Phân tích thiết kế hướng đối tượng (OOAD); DataWarehouse, Business Intelligence (BI).
Industry: Ngân hàng , CNTT - Phần mềm

Job Title: Area Sales Manager (Kien Giang/Long An/Tay Ninh)
Company: Adi Consulting'S Client
Location:
Kiên Giang
 Long An
 Tây Ninh
Job Description: SALARY : VND 30M - 60M JOB RESPONSIBILITIES: Sales Management: Develop and implement strategic sales plans to meet sales goals within the assigned territory. Ensure that both sell-in and sell-out targets are achieved or surpassed. Monitor and analyze sales performance metrics to steer team efforts and adjust strategies as needed. Team Leadership: Lead, mentor, and motivate a team of Sales Representatives to hit individual and team targets. Provide ongoing training and development opportunities to enhance the skills and capabilities of the sales team. Conduct regular performance reviews and offer constructive feedback to team members. Market Penetration and Expansion: Identify new business opportunities and expand the network by opening additional C1 and C2 accounts in the territory. Develop and maintain strong relationships with key accounts, including C1 customers, C2 intermediaries, and farmers. Conduct market research to understand customer needs, competitor activities, and emerging market trends. Sales Operations: Ensure efficient and effective product distribution from C1 to C2 and directly to farmers. Oversee inventory management to maintain optimal stock levels and reduce excess inventory. Collaborate with the logistics and supply chain teams to ensure timely product delivery. Financial Management: Ensure timely customer payments and manage overdue accounts. Monitor and manage sales budgets, forecasts, and overall financial performance. Work closely with the Finance Team to track due and overdue customer statuses, implementing strategies to improve cash flow and reduce outstanding receivables. Reporting and Analysis: Prepare and present regular sales reports to the Sales Head for Zone 1 or Zone 2. Utilize data and analytics to inform sales strategies and decision-making processes. Continuously monitor and manage sales budgets, forecasts, and financial outcomes. Customer Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with customers to ensure high levels of satisfaction and loyalty. Address and resolve customer inquiries and issues promptly and effectively. Conduct regular customer visits and meetings to understand their needs and provide tailored solutions.
Job Requirements: REQUIRED EDUCATION, EXPERIENCE & SKILLS: Minimum of 5 years’ experience in sales within the agriculture sector or related fields, with a proven track record in a managerial role. Bachelor’s Degree in Agriculture, Agronomy, or a related field. Strong leadership and team management skills. Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities. Proficient in analyzing sales data and market trends. Highly self-motivated with the ability to work independently. Willingness to travel within the designated territory as required. KEY COMPETENCIES: Results Orientation: Demonstrated ability to focus on tasks and achieve goals by solving problems, maintaining productivity, and making swift, well-considered decisions. Resilience: Capacity to manage crises and volatile situations effectively, maintaining objectivity, a calm demeanor, and sound judgment in the face of adversity. Customer Focus: Proven ability to build strong customer relationships and deliver solutions that prioritize customer satisfaction. Resourcefulness: Skilled at identifying, securing, and deploying resources (people, funds, infrastructure) efficiently to achieve goals. Strategic Mindset: Ability to anticipate future possibilities and translate them into breakthrough strategies, analyze complex trends and issues, and effectively implement actions or define a clear course to achieve objectives.
Industry: Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Nông nghiệp , Hóa học

Company: Theodore Alexander Hcm
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Du Lịch', 'Xe đưa đón']
Job Description: BPM (Business Processes Management) 40 % - Evaluating existing business processes. - Determining and outlining business process improvements. - Coordinating business process improvement strategies with internal stakeholders. - Overseeing all aspects related to the implementation stages of business processimprovement initiatives. - Analyzing and monitoring implemented changes to business processes and makingadjustments as needed. - Performing ongoing analyses on business processes related to productivity, quality, costs, and time management. - Revising and updating procedures and policies. - Lead business process reengineering and continuous improvement studies. - Identify opportunities to streamline business processes to best leverage business systems Business Analyst and Project Management 40% - As part of a broad cross-functional team, play an integral role in the learning, training,and implementation of ERP and in-house software. - Assist users in all aspect of ERP system use. - Interact with users to develop use case, design specification and testing scenarios. - Work with functional leaders to help develop business case for additional softwaredevelopment and/or acquisition. - Manage the configuration and operation of ERP systems; provide technical support for ERP and software issues. - Monitor the system daily and respond immediately to security, usability concerns and resolve help desk requests. - Collaborate on implement and upgrade systems and processes as required forenhanced functionality and security issue resolution and manage infrastructure toinclude firewalls, databases and other processes as they relate to ERP software. - Capture detailed requirements for blueprinting, solution design, implementation andfunctional testing for business - Develop strategies for future business process flows to best utilize system functionality - For system modification(s), define the business requirements and prepare functional design documents for formal review that include the analysis of project scope, problem definition of current situation, objective, constraints, cost estimates, project tasks/schedule, system and user documentation, user training materials and integrated systems design considerations and data flows - Develop and maintain strong working relationships with both internal and external contacts. Training and Documentation 20% - Develop training plans, prepare training documentation and conduct the training - Develop/Create and participate in the development of testing plans and scenarios ensuring all aspects of the modules are fully tested: Application/unit test, integrated test, parallel test and performance/stress test. - Proactively share knowledge with team members and provide assistance in areas of expertise. Present and lead training events. - Work closely with the SMEs (Subject Master Expert) team to develop comprehensiveuser documentation. - Working Time: Monday - Friday, 8-17h10, - Transport Location: Sai gon, Binh Duong, Bien Hoa
Job Requirements: Professional experience - Dot NET, SQL DBA, SSRS, Crystal report - Experience implementing ERP a manufacturing environment preferred - Minimum 2 years of ERP implementation experience with at least two full lifecycle ERPimplementations - Demonstrated ability to manage projects across technical and functional disciplines - Experience managing consultants and external vendors - Project Management skills and experience - Experience or Finance and Accounting, Inventory Control, Manufacturing and Logistics Professional knowledge - Good experiences in Manufacturing company - Furniture industry experience is plus - Strong analytical skills with demonstrated ability to synthesize complex and diverse information,collect and researches data, and design complex work flows and procedures - Knowledge of processes and methodologies used to support large complex business enterprisesystems - Advanced problem-solving skills. Ability to identify and resolve problems in a timely manner,gather and analyze information skillfully, develop alternative solutions and work well in groupproblem solving situations - Planning and organization/Project Management Skills. Ability to independently coordinatemultiple projects and tasks (determine relative importance of each; prioritize and plan workactivities; set appropriate deadlines to complete activities accordingly); effectively manage timeand resources; set and achieve goals and objectives. Competencies - Responsive to customer needs with a high attention to detail - Excellent time management skills with the ability to multi-task and prioritize responsibilitiesProblem Solving Skill - Demonstrated proficiency in ERP implementation & post go-live support - Ability to work independently as well as within in a team
Industry: Quản lý điều hành , CNTT - Phần mềm , CNTT - Phần cứng / Mạng

Company: Ngân Hàng Tmcp Việt Nam Thịnh Vượng - Vpbank
Job Description: Landing Zone & AWS Account Management Operate and maintain VPBank’s AWS Landing Zone. Manage and provision AWS accounts through Account Factory for Terraform (AFT). Enforce governance policies, including SCP, RCP, and AWS Organization features. Infrastructure & Networking Build and manage Golden AMIs, supporting projects with custom AMI development. Oversee core cloud networking, including VPCs, routing, F5-LB-WAF, Direct Connect (DX), and Next-Generation Firewalls (NGFWs). Establish and maintain partner connections via AWS PrivateLink and site-to-site VPNs. Manage VPC endpoints and centralized Route 53 DNS resolution. Administer internet-facing services to ensure secure and compliant public access. Security, Identity & Compliance Manage SSL certificates to ensure secure encrypted communications. Control access through Just-in-Time (JIT) permissions and AWS Role Anywhere. Govern exceptional resource requests, including NAT Gateway, S3 replication, and special deletion processes. Implement centralized tagging policies for resource tracking and cost management. Backup, Disaster Recovery & Monitoring Oversee cloud backup services, ensuring data integrity and disaster recovery readiness. Manage Disaster Recovery Services (DRS) for high-availability applications. Deploy and maintain centralized monitoring dashboards to support cloud operations. Project Support & Automation Assist in cloud migration and digital transformation projects. Evaluate cloud solutions and collaborate with stakeholders for efficient cloud deployments. Support cost estimation and cloud cost optimization initiatives. Maintain and enhance CI/CD pipelines for cloud operations. Develop scripts and Terraform modules to automate operational tasks. Change Management All changes must be carefully tested in a non-production environment before deployment to production. Follow VPbank’s CR process to implement on production environment. Coordinate with DevOps, Security, and Application teams to assess risks, dependencies, and rollback plans. Ensure all changes are documented, tested, and implemented following VPBank’s governance policies. Human Resource Management Actively allocate resources to balance daily operations and project workloads. Organize regular sharing sessions within the team and across IT departments. Provide mentorship and guidance to junior or other engineers, ensuring they develop the necessary skills for cloud operations. Develop and maintain processes, guides, and workshops to improve operational efficiency.
Job Requirements: 1. Trình độ đào tạo ( Educational Qualifications ) A bachelor's or master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or other computer-related fields. 2. Kiến thức/ Chuyên môn cần có( Relevant Knowledge/ Expertise) 3+ years of experience in cloud operations, infrastructure automation, security governance, and multi-cloud/hybrid cloud environments. Strong understanding of AWS (Landingzone, Multi-account, EC2, RDS, S3, Lambda, IAM, VPC, CloudWatch, AMIs, AWS Backup etc.). Familiarity with Azure, GCP (optional but beneficial for multi-cloud environments) Expertise in Terraform/Terragrunt, Ansible, CloudFormation for automating infrastructure deployment Strong scripting skills in Python, Bash, or PowerShell for automation tasks Experience with CI/CD pipelines using tools like Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, or AWS CodePipeline Hands-on experience with cloud monitoring tools (AWS CloudWatch) Experience with Grafana for data visualization and building operational dashboards Log analysis and troubleshooting of system performance, networking, and security to resolve incidents quickly to minimize downtime Familiarity with incident management & response processes Knowledge of IAM policies, Service Control Policies (SCPs), AWS Organizations for governance Understanding of cloud security best practices, encryption, and network security Strong knowledge of VPC, Subnetting, Endpoint, Privatelinks, VPN, Direct Connect, Load Balancers, Firewalls, F5, Paloalto. Troubleshooting connectivity between on-premises and cloud environments Ability to investigate and analyze information, and to draw conclusions. Flexibility, adaptability and desire to learn new technologies. 3. Các kỹ năng ( Skills ) Strong collaboration skills, with a demonstrated ability to work well as part of the team. Be able to catch up and manage works quickly and effectively Be able to work independently with high pressure, good in teamwork Detailed-orientation, careful, responsible, and secure in protecting information/data belong to Bank Clear documentation of cloud operations and best practices Good knowledge of risk management principles, methodology and practice Mentor and coach other devops engineers. Assigned as a buddy to support new employees according to the new recruitment needs of each period in the center Able to use English at moderate level
Industry: CNTT - Phần cứng / Mạng , CNTT - Phần mềm , Ngân hàng

Company: Công Ty Tnhh Gearment
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Du Lịch', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: How are you going to make a difference? T his position will take charge of performing, collecting & analyzing business data to support the CFO/tax process, following and supporting other teams on SOP and working files - Create, maintain or update operational trackers, databases, and/or systems; - Assist with company research, market research & data analysis; - Proactively work with teammates to identify and recommend process improvements to reduce inefficiencies and improve the accuracy of workflow; - Provide support for executive departments and build relationships with other teams; - Prepare reports as requested, such as pricing analysis, customer and vendor analysis reports, KPI reports, A/R and A/P analysis reports, Cashflow analysis; - Provide support for preparing and reviewing financial statements on a monthly basis; - Support compliance needs related to accounting (Tax declaration and finalization: Sales tax, CIT), liaise with Tax authority; - Provide frequent status updates and weekly reports to managers and team leads; - Help organize and keep track of property, inventory, and asset acquisitions; - Assist company needs in funding, lending opportunities, business reporting as required; - Other ad-hoc tasks assigned by manager, team leads, and CPAs; - Work with other departments to obtain necessary information.
Job Requirements: Are you a fit? - Bachelor's degree in accounting, finance, or a relevant field; - At least 1 year working experience in Accounting or Business; - Knowledge of finance principles, IFRS or GAAP and VAS and Tax regulations; - ERP software experience is a must (QuickBooks Online preferred); - Must be organized, detail-oriented, accurate, and responsive. Good at teamwork attitude, willing to learn. Open to feedback & improvement; - Have analytical skills, data mining and ability to solve problems; - Able to study, research, and analyze the workflow of an operational process; - Excellent skills in Excel, Word, Google Sheets/Document; - Ability to multi-task, a sense of accountability, and an eagerness to learn and support the growth of the business, willingness to learn new accounting tools; - Can-do attitude, dynamic and motivated personality; - Excellent communication and interpersonal skills; - Be able to perform as an effective team player and also work independently; - Strong time management and organization skills; - Have integrity, be trustful, positive thinking, and open mindedness; - Confidence and a high sense of commitment; - Willing to work early morning or evening sometimes (meeting with the US team, helping with month-end reports, tax and compliance deadlines); - Good English communication skills; - Interest in setting up and improving business processes. Why should you apply? - Salary: Up to 18,000,000 Gross - 100% official salary during the probation period - Premium health care insurance and annual health check-ups. - All benefits followed Vietnamese labor law, including a 13th-month salary plus a competitive bonus. - Bonding money per quarter - Annual company trip and team building - Weekly Happy Lunch on Friday - Bonuses and gifts for holidays, Tet such as Mid Autumn, Women’s Day, etc - Dynamic and professional working environment. - Allocate modern working devices: Laptop, Second Monitor and anything you need. - Working from Monday to Friday (8.30 am – 5.30 pm).

Job Title: Kỹ Sư Chất Lượng Cơ Khí/ Mechanical Qc Engineer
Company: Công Ty Tnhh Averna
Job Description: TÓM TẮT CÔNG VIỆC/ JOB SUMMARY Kiểm soát chất lượng sản phẩm bằng cách thực hiện kiểm tra, thu thập thông tin kỹ thuật, lập các hướng dẫn cho việc kiểm tra, đo lường, đảm bảo chất lượng sản phẩm. Lưu giữ kết quả kiểm tra, hệ thống hóa dữ liệu, tổng hợp, phân tích và báo cáo kết quả kiểm tra. Control quality of product by inspecting, collecting technical information, making work instruction, checklist for inspection, measurement, assure product meet requirement. Record inspection results, summary and analyze data. NHIỆM VỤ VÀ TRÁCH NHIỆM/ ESSENTIAL DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES · Được phân công vào dự án, lập kế hoạch kiểm soát chất lượng và biểu mẩu kiểm tra cho dự án Be assigned to project, create “Quality control plan” and checkslist for project. · Nhận và thu thập tất cả các thông tin kỹ thuật từ dự án: DFM, BOM, bản vẽ, datasheet, hướng dẫn lắp ráp, yêu cầu từ khách hàng. Collect & get all technical information: DFM, BOM, drawing, assembly SOP, customer’s requirement/specification. · Thực hiện kiểm tra, ghi chép đầy đủ kết quả kiểm tra thử nghiệm vào phiếu kiểm tra, phiếu đánh giá chất lượng Inspect and record result to checksheet, form. · Thống kê, phân tích & báo cáo chi tiết kết quả kiểm tra & thử nghiệm. Summary, analysis & report for inspection & testing results. · Viết hướng dẫn hướng dẫn cách kiểm tra, hướng dẫn sử dụng thiết bị. Make work instruction (WI), guide how to use measuring equipment. · Lập báo cáo Không phù hợp & đề xuất phương án xử lý gửi cho các bên liên quan. Make non-conforming report, give solution & inform to relative department. · Hệ thống hóa và theo dõi lỗi phát sinh trong quá trình kiểm tra và sản xuất. Keep in-process inspection data & all non-conforming (issue) into the tracking file/log · Cập nhật danh sách tài liệu và các hồ sơ nội bộ (phiếu ghi chép kết quả đo). Update the list of documents and internal records (measurement result). · Xem xét & cập nhật các yêu cầu đặc biệt trong bản vẽ nguyên vật liệu, cụm lắp ráp vào phiếu ghi chép kiểm tra. Review/update the special requirements in the drawings of materials, assembly kit to checklist. · Vận hành các thiết bị đo kiểm và các dụng cụ/thiết bị kiểm tra khác có liên quan. Use measuring equipment and other related inspection tool/equipment. · Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ khác theo sự phân công của trưởng nhóm/trưởng phòng kiểm tra chất lượng. Other assignment as assign from QA Leader/Manager.
Job Requirements: 1. Trình độ ( Education) - Tốt nghiệp Đại học chuyên ngành kỹ thuật Cơ khí, Cơ điện tử Bachelor of Engineering in Mechanical, Mechatronic 2. Kinh nghiệm (Experience) - Trên 2 năm kinh nghiệm tại vị trí kỹ sư sản xuất/quản lý chất lượng trong công ty đa quốc gia sản xuất sản phẩm cơ khí, máy móc hoặc liên quan. Over 02 years of work experience at position of Production Engineer/ QA/QC of MNC Manufacturing that produce mechanical part, machinery or relate field. - Kinh nghiệm làm việc liên quan đến kiểm tra cơ khí, thiết bị đo đạc chính xác. Working experience in related jobs that relate to mechanical inspection, precision measurement tool/equipment. 3. Hiểu biết và kỹ năng (Knowledge & Skills) - Giao tiếp tốt, khả năng giải quyết vấn đề và khả năng làm việc nhóm. Good communication, problem solving & teamwork - Đọc bản vẽ cơ khí và các bản vẽ kĩ thuật tiếng Anh. Technical mechanical drawing reading. - Tiếng anh giao tiếp tốt. Good English communication. - Phân tích dữ liệu và ra quyết định Data analysis and decision making - Sử dụng thành thạo MS office, phần mềm đồ họa (Auto Cad, Solidwork) Ability to use MS office, engineering software (auto CAD, Solid work) - Thành thạo trong việc làm báo cáo, các bài thuyết trình. Ability to make reports, presentations. - Có kiến thức và khả năng sử dụng máy móc thiết bị, dụng cụ kiểm tra đo lường cơ khí Have knowledge, ability using mechanical measurement equipment/tool - Hiểu biết tiêu chuẩn ISO 9001, và các công cụ quản lý chất lượng. Have knowledge about ISO9001, and quality tools.
Industry: Cơ khí / Ô tô / Tự động hóa , Quản lý chất lượng (QA/QC) , Sản xuất / Vận hành sản xuất

Company: Action Composites Hightech Industries
Job Description: * WE OFFER THE BENEFIT PACKAGE FOR THIS POSITION AS BELOW: OFF ALL SATURDAYS , Leave office at 4 pm on Friday. Free Shuttle bus from Ba Ria Vung Tau/ Cantavil Thu Duc/ Thu Duc Crossroad/ Bien Hoa to Nhon Trach (our factory ~ 40 minutes for travelling) "Star of the Month" bonus: 2.000.000 VND /Month Health care insurance (after probation) + For Family Performance Evaluation bonus yearly Public holidays and company day bonus up to 2.000.000 VND/Year Participate in team building activities 600.000 VND/year. Year end bonus 3 Years Service/Contribution Award: Medal & 2.480.000 VND (half-month regional salary) 5 Years Service/Contribution Award: Medal & 4.960.000 VND (1-month regional salary) Each next 5 Years Service Contribution Award: Medal & 1 gold thread (1 chỉ vàng) Extensive training opportunities from third parties, including IATF: 16949, 5 Core Tools, VDA6.3, ISO 27001, Tisax , and more. Collaborate in an English speaking, professional workplace. * JOB DESCRIPTION Plan, organize, control, and evaluate IT infrastructure and software development initiatives to ensure alignment with the company's strategic goals. Manage IT staff by recruiting, training, and coaching employees, setting clear job expectations, and conducting performance appraisals. Design, develop, implement, and coordinate IT systems, policies, and procedures to maintain a well-organized and efficient IT environment. Ensure the security of data, network access, and backup systems to safeguard company information and assets. Align IT activities with user needs and system functionality to support organizational policies and objectives. Identify problematic areas and implement timely strategic solutions to address them. Audit IT systems and assess their outcomes to ensure optimal performance and security. Preserve company assets, information security, and control structures to minimize risks and liabilities. Manage the annual IT budget and ensure cost-effectiveness in resource allocation and spending. Oversee server systems, and manage SQL, SAP, and MES services to maintain seamless and efficient operations. Manage project progress by creating and organizing plans, allocating resources, and guiding the IT team in developing new solutions to meet the company's requirements. Responsible for master data processing and maintenance in SAP Test and training of the developed system solutions Responsible for the coordination and verification of the respective key users Central point of contact for all SAP matters (support of key users and contact persons for all departments)
Job Requirements: Bachelor's degree or higher in Information Technology Engineering or a related field. Good English communication skills. 5-7 years of experience in a similar position or related field. Ability to manage and assign IT tasks to staff, operate IT systems, and support users as required. Knowledge of process management, thread and concurrency, socket, I/O management, virtualization, memory storage, and file systems. Experience with firewalls, DNS, HTTP, FTP, SSL, and other security-related issues. Proficiency in SAP, MES, WMS, CCNA, CCNP, MCSA, MCSE, Windows Server, Linux, Domain, Security+, Server, MS SQL Database, backup/restore, antivirus, MS systems, ISO27001, WAN, LAN, cameras, and VMWare. Experience managing software and hardware teams, as well as building IT teams in a production environment. Ability to manage IT staff by recruiting, training, coaching employees, communicating job expectations, and appraising their performance. Responsibility and cooperation with internal/external operations to ensure the IT system runs smoothly. Experience handling annual budgets and ensuring cost-effectiveness. Ability to plan, organize, control, and evaluate IT and electronic data operations. Skills in designing, developing, implementing, and coordinating systems, policies, and procedures. Capability to guide and develop the IT team and advise the Board of Directors on IT solutions. Proactive in searching for and updating new technologies, as well as collaborating with vendors to solve IT problems. Strong systematic thinking and analytical skills. Ability to work under pressure, hardworking, honest, positive mindset, and effective personnel management skills. Having IoT experience is an advantage.
