Company: Concung.Com - Con Cung Joint Stock Company
Job Description: Key Responsibilities: Sales Performance Management : Monitor and drive sales performance across retail stores, ensuring all locations meet or exceed sales targets and KPIs. Implement strategies to boost sales and enhance store performance. Team Leadership and Development : Lead, train, and mentor store sales teams to achieve business goals. Provide ongoing training to enhance product knowledge, sales skills, and customer service standards. Planogram Management : Monitor and implement the planogram at stores to increase the customers’ experience and satisfaction. Sales Reporting and Analysis : Monitor sales performance, analyze sales data, and identify trends to develop action plans. Provide regular sales reports and insights to senior management for decision-making. Inventory and Stock Management : Work with the supply chain to ensure stores are stocked appropriately, maintaining optimal stock levels and product displays. Address inventory issues and ensure smooth stock replenishment. Promotions and Campaign Execution : Collaborate with the marketing team to implement promotional campaigns, seasonal sales, and in-store events to drive foot traffic and increase sales. Sales Strategy and Market Development : Continuously assess the market and competitor landscape to adapt sales strategies, expand market reach, and capitalize on emerging opportunities.
Job Requirements: Qualifications and Skills: Experience : Minimum 2 years of experience in retail sales management. Experience with fashion brands is highly preferred. Leadership Skills : Proven experience in managing and motivating sales teams, with the ability to lead by example and inspire a high level of performance. Analytical Skills : Strong ability to analyze sales data, track performance, and identify opportunities for improvement. Industry Knowledge : Solid understanding of the fashion retail market, trends, and consumer behavior. Data analysis : Proficient in using retail management software, and data analysis. Communication Skills : Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build relationships with customers, staff, and management. Problem-Solving Ability : Ability to think critically and make decisions quickly in a fast-paced retail environment. Benefit: - Annual bonus: 2 - 3 months under minimum KPI requirement - Fast promotion opportunities based on personal ability - Work in a dynamic, open, creative environment - Regular training, company team building, birthday bonus
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh

Company: Idocean Co.,Ltd
Job Description: Key Responsibilities: 1.1. Develop and Implement Digital Advertising Campaigns: Plan and run ads on digital channels (SEO, SEM, Google Ads, Facebook, Instagram, etc.). Update and optimize campaigns based on platform changes. Monitor ad performance and costs. 1.2. Create Advertising Content and Visuals: Develop and design ad content and visuals. Ensure content meets platform standards. 1.3. Manage Website and E-commerce Channels: Post products and manage promotions on e-commerce platforms. Monitor keyword ads and report performance. 1.4. Manage and Track Budget: Set and track ad budgets. Report on budget usage and effectiveness. 1.5. Other Duties: Analyze market and competitor activities. Support customers and address inquiries. Develop marketing processes and manage ad data. Prepare regular and ad-hoc reports.
Job Requirements: Requirements: Bachelor’s degree in marketing or related field. 2-3 years of experience in digital marketing. Experience with digital ad tools (Google Ads, Facebook Ads, SEO, SEM). Strong skills in campaign planning and management. Proficient in data analysis and performance reporting (preferable using basic Python to clean data, Google Data Analytics...) Content creation and design skills, or experience working with designers. Knowledge of digital marketing trends and channels. Good project management and cross-department collaboration skills. Good communication, problem-solving abilities, time management skills. Ability to work under pressure and adaptation. Benefits: Competitive salary package with annual salary reviews. Annual bonuses and other benefits. A young, dynamic work environment with numerous opportunities for advancement. Participation in exciting activities such as birthdays, festivals, team-building events, and company trips. Training, coaching, and mentoring programs. Insurance according to labor laws. Working hours: 08:00 - 12:00 and 13:00 - 17:00, Monday to Saturday (2 Saturdays off per month).
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Tiếp thị trực tuyến

Company: Diag
Job Description: As a Senior Performance Marketer at Diag, you will play a critical role in driving our digital marketing strategy and execution excellence. Your primary focus will be on developing and implementing performance-based marketing initiatives to increase patient acquisition, engagement, and retention. Ads Setup: detailed-oriented ad setup with minimal errors. Manage budgets (1+ million) of Google Ads, TikTok Ads, Facebook Ads for lead generation. Supervise search operations, and optimize bids for performance marketing initiatives to ensure maximum ROI Creative Asset improvement: Consult & suggest the creative team how to create better static/ video ads and landing page content for higher Conversion Rate & ROAS Campaign Planning: Media Research and Plan for digital campaigns following best practices across various digital channels, including search engines, social media, email, and display advertising, etc., ensuring performance marketing is integrated with other activities across Online-to-Offline touchpoints, maximizing investment in holistic approach effectively & efficiently. Data Analysis & Reporting: Monitor and analyze campaign performance data to identify trends, optimize strategies, and report on ROAS and other key performance indicators (KPIs). Project management: Be the owner and lead all related stakeholders to plan, build and track the project, ensuring to deliver in set timeline with committed quality. Provide administrative support for documentation and compliance.
Job Requirements: Minimum of 5 years of experience in performance marketing, with a proven track record. Experienced in media buying on online platforms including; Facebook Ads, Google AdWords, Tiktok Ads,.. is a must Detailed oriented and hard working Good logical thinking & data-driven analysis Proficiency in digital marketing tools (e.g., Google Analytics, AdWords, Facebook Ads Manager), Ability to work and thrive in a fast-paced, rapidly changing work environment and business centric mind-set Passionate and pro-active: a driven, self-starter who can work independently and as part of a team. Can work independently
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Tiếp thị trực tuyến , Quảng cáo / Đối ngoại / Truyền Thông

Job Title: Content Moderation Team Leader - App Social Video Project
Company: Công Ty Tnhh Transcosmos Việt Nam
Job Description: Lead, manage, recruit & develop a team of Data Labelling, helping them to achieve their full potential and maintain high standards and quality of work. Ensure that all services are delivered within the framework core values and in line with existing policies and procedures. Handle escalated transactions from clients/customers/team members (if any). Actively promote and support inclusion, ensuring that individuals are supported to participate in community and work opportunities according to their interests and goals. Use performance data to coach and improve the agents. Review the performance appraisal and organize the discussion of Individual Development Plan. Quickly grasp changes in the system and processes, and accurately and promptly communicate information to agents. Can conduct report of manage team base on KPI orientation: Result, Rootcause and action plan. Collaborate with teams and other departments to achieve the common goals of the project. Working Time: Working 6 days/ week (1 day off any), from 10 AM – 7 PM.
Job Requirements: At least 1 year of experience in Team Leader position. Fluently in English (Equivalent to IELTS certificate 5.5 or higher; if the certificate expires, the candidate will take 01 competency assessment test sent from the Human Resources department). Good in using Excel, good data organization, analysis and logical thinking skills. Serious and responsible work attitude, meticulous and rigorous, strong execution. Interested in e-commerce platform business, understanding the operation mode of domestic and foreign e-commerce platform. Having e-commerce operation experience is preferred.

Job Title: Chuyên Viên Vận Hành Hệ Thống Martech - Ban Sản Phẩm Và Marketing (Ho25.76)

Job Title: Hcm - Customer Experience Executive - Nhân Viên Trải Nghiệm Khách Hàng
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Maison Retail Management International
Job Description: We are looking for a proactive and customer-centric individual to join our team as a Customer Experience Executive (CX Executive). In this role, you will be responsible for optimizing the customer journey based on feedback from shopping experiences and customer interactions. You will support the management of the Voice of Customer and Voice of Staff systems, working closely with cross-functional teams to implement service improvement initiatives while contributing to CX department projects that enhance a customer-first culture and increase overall satisfaction. Participate in the operation of CX surveys (NPS, CSAT, Complaint Feedback, Internal Surveys) to collect, analyze, and generate insights that enhance customer experience management. Collaborate with relevant functional departments to identify and address pain points in the customer journey, implement improvement actions, and follow up on post-survey engagement activities. Process and manage data from available sources (including survey feedback and operational activities) in accordance with internal guidelines and requirements. Support administrative tasks related to CX operations, including documentation, reporting, and coordination with stakeholders to ensure smooth execution of CX initiatives. Develop and work alongside the team to execute projects that enhance customer-centric culture, employee experience, internal connection, and communications to improve the overall customer experience. Stay up to date with industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies related to customer experience to introduce fresh and innovative ideas to the organization. Assist with general administrative duties in compliance with company procedures, ensuring proper documentation, internal approvals, and adherence to operational workflows. Benefits: Attractive salary + lunch allowance + parking allowance Holiday bonus, 13th month salary bonus, annual KPI bonus based on revenue, social insurance, Union, year-end party, team building.. Employee discount purchases 12 - 15 days annual leave
Job Requirements: Bachelor’s degree in business/ economics/ finance / marketing or related field. Proven experience in a customer-centric role, preferably in customer experience, customer service. Familiarity with omnichannel retail and customer feedback mechanisms is a plus. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Data-driven mindset, with proficiency in data analysis tools and techniques. Experience working with cross-functional teams. Ability to adapt quickly to changing business needs and be proactive in finding opportunities to enhance the customer experience. Creative thinking and innovation, with a passion for delivering exceptional customer experiences.
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ , Dịch vụ khách hàng

Company: Công Ty Tnhh Bảo Hiểm Nhân Thọ Mb Ageas
Job Description: The Business Analysts ensure that business needs are accurately captured, analyzed, and translated into actionable solutions. 1, Business Requirements and Solution Development: Utilize in-depth knowledge of life insurance, finance, and the current system functionalities to define business problems and requirements. Collaborate effectively with business users and IT teams to recommend suitable solutions. Take ownership of developing comprehensive Business Requirement Documents (BRD) and Business Solution Documents (BSD), Software requirements specifications (SRS), and User stories to ensure End-to-end business processes and detail for required applications. 2, Research and Analysis: Conduct thorough research, solution analysis, and fit-gap analysis between business requirements and current IT system functionalities. Identify and recommend practical solutions for system implementation and document the impact analysis from both business and functional perspectives. 3, Quality Assurance and Testing Support: Assist the QA team in developing detailed test plans,and test scenarios Coordinate with stakeholders to ensure successful User Acceptance Testing (UAT), including identifying issues and ensuring resolution before deployment. 4, User Training and Support: Provide on-site training for users, focusing on the fundamental components of the system. Offer ongoing support for daily operations and application usage, including troubleshooting, root-cause analysis, and addressing user queries. 5, Project and Stakeholder Management: Act as a liaison between business and technical teams, ensuring alignment of goals and priorities, and identifying opportunities and process improvements by leveraging data to drive business solutions. Participate in project planning, status reporting, and change management processes to ensure successful implementation of business initiatives.
Job Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Business, Economics - Finance, or equivalent. Minimum of 3 years of experience in a Business Analyst role or equivalent position Experience with Waterfall and agile software development methodologies. Experience in using Jira and Confluence for managing requirements and projects Experience in using suitable tools/languages for business modeling, and technical diagrams (Figma, Visio, BPMN,…) Experience in banking finance and life insurance is an advantage. Company: Heineken Vietnam
Job Description: We are on the hunt for a brilliant Innovation Product Owner to join our team and help us drive forward with some out-of-the-box thinking and ideas. As the Innovation Product Owner, you will be responsible for leading the charge on innovative product development, leveraging emerging technologies and pushing the boundaries of what's possible. In fact, we’re looking for someone who can make an impact to the market of food & beverage itself, in (several) innovative projects that connect end consumers and b2b customers. Responsibilities: Shape the value: Identify needs & gaps from current market and its distribution, internal stakeholders, and referrable oceans… to create values for the organization through initiations of new digital products, platforms, and technologies. Collaborate with stakeholders across the organization to ensure that innovative products and services align with the company's overall strategy and goals. Own the journeys : You create and define journeys for our end consumers, but also to connect them with the ecosystem of our organization. We don’t digitalize clumsy processes, but bring them to the next level (perhaps having less processes is actually better – it’s your call) Deliver stuff, digital stuff: Lead (and own the success of) the development of those innovative product ideas and concepts, leveraging emerging technologies and trends (either from the market or Heineken Global). Development teams can be in-house, our Innovation dev hub, or external partner and Global partner, or can buy / rent a technology entirely. It’s up to you! Understand the customers / users: Develop a deep understanding of customer needs and preferences and use this knowledge to drive the development of products that resonate with our target audience. Depending on projects, users can be a normal beer drinker, or an accountant doing manual work, or a retail owner who barely knows about tech & app. That’s the exciting part of the job. Be the connector: Work closely with cross-functional teams to plan and execute the development of innovative products and services, using Agile methodologies and tools. Champion the Innovation: Keep in touch with the world to identify trends, technology and opportunities in the market, and use this information to inform product development decisions. Live by data: Use data and analytics to track the performance of innovative products and services, identify areas for improvement, and make data-driven decisions. Some of your projects might generate invaluable data as well. Fun fact: you can work with a lot of 1st party data, and pionner the transformation game of extracting values from data.
Job Requirements: 7-10 years of experience as a Digital Product Owner or similar role, with a proven track record of delivering digital products, services or transformation. A business domain regarding FMCG, B2B business, supply chain, marketing & trade marketing … is a plus. Strong experience in software development life cycle, especially consumer-facing mobile application and promotion-related softwares. Know enough PowerBI, SQL, Python to explore data indepently. Can estimate how many mandays a feature can get to start arguing with the tech lead. Strong leadership skills, with the ability to inspire and motivate cross-functional teams to achieve shared goals. In fact, you need to shape your story and convince people to follow! Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to build strong relationships with stakeholders across the organization. Excellent project management skill, capable of driving projects from initiation to closing - sprinkled some pilots here and pivots there. Good with numbers. Seriously, there’re lots of numbers to crunch and estimate and project. At least you can sell your projects confidently with a wildly-estimated business cases. Experience working in an Agile environment, with a relatively thorough understanding of Agile methodologies and tools. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to use data to drive decisions. A passion for emerging technologies and trends, with a strong understanding of the latest developments in the market. If you're a creative problem solver with a passion for innovation, we want to hear from you! As our Innovation Product Owner, you'll have the opportunity to work on some truly cutting-edge projects and help us to stay at the forefront of our industry. So, if you're ready to take your career to the next level and join a team that's always pushing the boundaries, apply today and let's get started!
Industry: CNTT - Phần mềm

Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Metub Việt Nam

Job Description: We are looking for a dynamic and innovative Product Owner / Developer (beauty) with a strong background in e-commerce and social commerce to join our team. This role is responsible for leading the end-to-end product development process, ensuring beauty products are optimized for digital-first sales channels, including e-commerce platforms and social commerce (TikTok, Instagram, Shopee, Lazada, etc.). The ideal candidate is a trend-savvy, data-driven, and customer-centric individual who understands how to create high-performing beauty products for online shoppers. With expertise in digital marketing, online sales trends, and consumer behavior in e-commerce, you will play a key role in developing products that resonate with the digital audience and drive online sales growth. Market Research & Digital Product Strategy Analyze beauty trends, consumer preferences, and online shopping behavior to identify market opportunities. Develop a product roadmap optimized for e-commerce and social commerce, ensuring alignment with brand and business goals. Identify winning product formats, pricing models, and bundling strategies tailored for online consumers. Leverage real-time data from e-commerce platforms, search trends, and social listening tools to validate product ideas. Product Development & Digital-Ready Optimization Define product specifications, including formulation, ingredients, benefits, packaging, and digital-friendly attributes (e.g., visual appeal, convenience, and social-sharing potential). Work closely with R&D, manufacturers, and packaging designers to develop products that meet e-commerce and social commerce trends. Ensure product formats and packaging are optimized for unboxing experiences, live selling, and influencer marketing. Conduct A/B testing with sample products, leveraging influencer and key opinion leader (KOL) feedback before launch. Project Management & Digital Launch Execution Oversee the entire product lifecycle, ensuring seamless execution from development to online launch. Collaborate with Marketing, E-commerce, and Performance Ads teams to craft high-converting product pages and ad creatives. Align product launch strategies with key e-commerce sales events, platform promotions, and social media trends. Define digital-first pricing, bundling offers, and flash sale strategies to drive conversions. Performance Tracking & Iteration Monitor sales performance, conversion rates, and customer feedback across e-commerce platforms (Shopee, Lazada, Amazon, TikTok Shop, etc.). Leverage analytics tools (Google Analytics, platform dashboards, and customer insights) to optimize product listings and offerings. Identify opportunities for product enhancements, extensions, or pivots based on online consumer sentiment and demand shifts. Stay updated on platform algorithm changes, social commerce trends, and emerging technologies to refine product strategy.
Job Requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, Product Development, or a related field. 5-8 years of experience in beauty product development, preferably in e-commerce or D2C brands. Strong understanding of beauty trends, online consumer behavior, and digital shopping habits. Experience in developing beauty products for online-first brands, with a proven track record in e-commerce performance. Knowledge of SEO for product listings, online product storytelling, and social commerce tactics. Ability to work with e-commerce data, customer insights, and social media engagement metrics to optimize product strategy. Proficiency in project management tools (Trello, Asana, Jira, etc.) and data analytics platforms. Familiarity with beauty product testing, quality control, and compliance standards. Soft Skills: Strong communication skills, especially in working with cross-functional digital teams. Creative and trend-driven mindset, always looking for new product opportunities. Analytical and results-oriented, able to interpret online sales data and customer feedback effectively. Highly adaptable and agile, comfortable with fast-changing e-commerce and social commerce dynamics.

Job Description: 1. New product introduction (NPI): Design for Manufacturability (DFM) Review and provide feedback to customer, create process flowchart, Failure Mode and Effects Analysis (FMEA), define critical process parameters, select appropriate equipment, and establish efficient assembly methods. Create and maintain Bills of Materials, build instructions, conducting process trials, and addressing any issues or challenges that arise during the NPI build. 2. Process Analysis: Analyze existing manufacturing processes to identify areas for improvement in terms of efficiency, productivity, quality, and cost-effectiveness. This includes studying process flows, conducting time studies, and gathering data to identify bottlenecks and opportunities for optimization. 3. Process Documentation: Create and maintain detailed documentation of manufacturing processes, including process flow diagrams, standard operating procedures (SOPs), work instructions, and equipment specifications. Ensure that documentation is up to date and accessible to relevant stakeholders. 4. Component evaluation: Participate in evaluating the raw material and new supplier/ vendor with SQE, review and propose to customer for alternative component. 5. Process Improvement: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including production, engineering, and quality assurance, to identify and implement process improvements. This may involve proposing and testing new techniques, technologies, or equipment to enhance productivity, reduce cycle times, minimize waste, or improve product quality. 6. Data Analysis: Collect, analyze, and interpret data related to manufacturing processes to monitor performance, identify trends, and drive decision-making. Use statistical tools and software to analyze data and generate reports, enabling informed process optimization and problem-solving. 7. Troubleshooting and Problem Solving: Investigate and resolve issues related to manufacturing processes, equipment failures, and product quality deviations. Work closely with production and maintenance teams to identify root causes, implement corrective actions, and prevent future occurrences. 8. Continuous Improvement: Actively participate in continuous improvement initiatives, such as Lean Manufacturing or Six Sigma, to promote a culture of continuous improvement. Contribute to projects aimed at reducing waste, improving efficiency, and enhancing overall process performance. 9. Collaboration and Communication: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including engineers, operators, technicians, and management, to ensure effective communication and alignment on process improvement initiatives. Share findings, recommendations, and progress updates with relevant stakeholders.

Solid understanding of engineering principles and product development concepts. Familiarity with product testing methodologies and data analysis. Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities. Ability to work well in a team environment and contribute to cross-functional projects. Adaptability and willingness to learn new technologies and tools. Basic understanding of quality control principles and standards. Proficiency in Microsoft Office applications. Proficiency in the English language (reading, writing, speaking and comprehension). Self-motivated with a strong desire for professional growth and development

Proficient in breaking down business objectives , translating research insights into actionable strategies. Well-versed in research methodologies, analytical tools, market research channels, and data platforms. Strategic thinker with a strong learning mindset and adaptability to dynamic market conditions. Fluent in Chinese , with basic proficiency in English.
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Vận chuyển / Giao nhận / Kho vận , Xuất nhập khẩu

Company: Công Ty Tài Chính Tnhh Ngân Hàng Tmcp Sài Gòn - Hà Nội  (Shbfinance)
Job Description: Aking responsibility for constructing and automating periodic reports tracking the approval and rejection rates of each product and region, and analyzing detailed reasons for rejection. Evaluating the portfolio using various analytical techniques (Vintage, Was-Is, Flow rate, Lag/Coin delinquency, etc.). Assisting in managing the quality of the credit portfolio, establishing risk analysis reports for the credit portfolio, including: Business performance, application assessment, approval results; Credit quality status, credit risk, and non-performing loan quality; Provisioning levels and loss ratios; Other risk reports as assigned. Analyzing data to support the development/modification of credit policies and product policies. Regularly monitoring the quality of the portfolio, conducting in-depth analyses related to risk, and proposing appropriate credit risk management solutions. Performing calculations for KPI measurement indicators and calculating incentives for teams within the appraisal and debt collection center. Participating in debt classification and preparing provisioning reports, reports for the State Bank, and information reports for credit institutions.​
Job Requirements: A. Skills, Knowledge, Experience Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree or higher, or an equivalent degree in a related field involving data, such as Applied Mathematics, Statistics, Econometrics, Banking and Finance, Information Management, Operations Research, etc. Experience: At least 3 years of experience in portfolio report analysis or similar fields. Language Proficiency: Good reading and writing skills in English. Understanding of Products, Services, and Policies: Knowledge of consumer finance products and services. B. Competency and Professional Skills Skill Requirements: Proficient in using query languages and data processing tools such as SQL, Python, etc. Proficient in report development software: Advanced skills in Excel, Power BI, etc. Experience working directly with portfolio quality control metrics: Familiarity with metrics such as Vintage, Was-Is, Delinquency, Flow Rate, Lag/Coin Delinquency. Data Analysis: Ability to analyze data to support the development/modification of credit policies and product policies. Experience in implementing loan classification reports, provisioning reports, SBV reports, and information reports for credit institutions. REASONS TO JOIN SHBFINANCE: A professional, open working environment that emphasizes 5 core values: “Smart – Honest – Brave – Friendly – Cooperation”: Working hours: Monday to Friday, with a 1.5-hour lunch break. Friendly and open-minded colleagues who value individual development. Spacious open office with all necessary equipment provided for work. Special attention to employees: Competitive compensation package with regular salary increases. Total income can reach up to 14 months' salary per year. Lunch allowance of up to 1,200,000 VND/month. Exclusive healthcare benefits with comprehensive SHBFC Care insurance. Annual health check-ups at top hospitals in Vietnam, along with social insurance benefits as per state regulations. Annual company trips and team-building activities. Focused on supporting personal development: Guidance, companionship, and career development support from experienced, talented managers. Opportunities to participate in major projects, leading in the consumer finance sector. Support for learning activities, knowledge exchange, and cultural interaction (Training, Seminars, ETC.)
Industry: Ngân hàng , Tài chính / Đầu tư

Company: Công Ty Tnhh Maker Sixty Four
Job Description: BENEFITS: ​ BHXH 100% lương thỏa thuận, ngoài ra tham gia bảo hiểm sức khỏe cao cấp hàng năm Cung cấp trang thiết bị đầy đủ để phục vụ công việc Có Shuttle Bus đưa đón từ Bình Dương - HCM đến Long An YOUR JOBS: 1. Strategic Planning and Research Strategize brands’ collection roadmaps based on a comprehensive understanding of the furniture industry. Consolidate and analyze sales data to identify collection gaps through quantitative and qualitative research, then deliver cohesive product range plans. Conduct market research to inform product development and positioning, focusing on style and price-point benchmarking. 2. Product Development Supervise the product team to meet development timelines. Oversee the product development cycle, from concept to market launch. Facilitate sample reviews and manage sample improvement processes. Supervise material and finishing development to align with collection needs. Work closely with design and production teams to ensure product feasibility. 3. Process Management Manage timelines, resources, and budgets for product development projects. Input and maintain product data in Odoo, including codes, images, line drawings, and packaging details. 4. Cross-Functional Collaboration Collaborate with marketing teams on go-to-market strategies and assigned tasks for tradeshows. Work with QC/QA teams to establish collection standards and conduct random quality audits on production floors. Lead customized orders, guiding them from design to concept approval before handing them over to Sales and R&D.
Job Requirements: Time-to-Market for New Products: Measure the efficiency of the development process. Product Development Budget Adherence: Ensure all projects stay within the allocated budget. Market Fit and Demand Fulfillment Rate: Evaluate how well products align with market needs. Number of Products Developed: Track the volume of successful product launches. Database Accuracy on Odoo: Maintain precise and complete data for smooth cross-department workflows. Stakeholder Satisfaction: Assess feedback on the quality and relevance of new products.
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Nội ngoại thất

Job Title: Hcm - Merchandise Planning Specialist - Mujosh & Triumph
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Maison Retail Management International
Job Description: I. JOB BRIEF: - Merchandise Planning Specialist will be on the full spectrum analysis on all product categories and to offer solutions in order to effectively establish a strong inventory and merchandising processes. II. JOB RELATION: 1. Direct superior: Group Brand Manager. 2. Direct reports: N/A 3. Major internal communication: All departments. 4. Major external communications: Principal. III. DETAILED JOB DESCRIPTION: - Process sales, traffic, and stock on hand data weekly to ensure data accuracy & timely uploading onto Brand Principal system. - Monitor shipment dates, goods receiving and launch to store schedule. - Manage Expired Date, Displayed Date of Products at Shopfloors, Warehouse, and propose with BD/OM the way to solve effectively. - Coordinate stock movements between regions and between stores and warehouses. - Run weekly inventory reports to monitor sales performance. - Work closely with Brand Principal to execute inventory actions like replenishment, consolidation, price changes. - Coordinate defects/repairs and shipment error claims. - Coordinate customer service inquiries. - Doing Monthly Forecast for next 6 months with Regular Products. - Doing Weekly Order with Principal Team for Fresh Products. - Basing on Weekly Sale Report, define and analyze product positions, correct the QTY order suitably with actual sale. - Work with warehouse to print QR code for product with each new shipment. - Ensure all products are in Shop floor must have pricing labels on products. - Competitor research. - Other tasks that are required by Group Brand Manager.
Job Requirements: - Preferably 2 years experience in merchandising/ inventory/ planning or related fields. - Excellent interpersonal and communication skills. - Posses data analysis skill - Proficient in Excel. - Analytical with a head for numbers and attention to detail. - Business savvy with excellent planning and organization skills to multi-task in a fast-paced environment. - Knowledge in Cosmetics category, products would be huge advantages.
Industry: Tài chính / Đầu tư , Dệt may / Da giày / Thời trang

Job Title: [Hcm]Merchandising Executive ( Chuyên Viên Thu Mua Cửa Hàng Đồng Giá Daiso)
Company: Công Ty Tnhh Aeon Việt Nam
Job Description: 1. Make the strategy for department-in-charge: - Research, analyze and evaluate the market to identify customer's needs and product/range opportunities. - Develop a range assortment that delivers Competitive Advantage in the Vietnamese Market. - Maintain data for analysis and keep updated with Market trend, Competitor benchmark 2. Manage the performance of department-in-charge: - Responsibility of “the target of Sales”, Margin, Later Income, Old Stock, Potential Old Stock, Turn-over day, Stock Day's, Private Brand Share, Core Customer Share, Stock Correction & Availability. - Manage the performance of a defined product category effectively in terms of pricing, promotion, products assortment, quality of products, planning and allocation. - Supplier management, negotiation of payment terms, rebates etc. - Work with Customer Management Team (Marketing team) to propose the regular promotion plan of Groups to ensure that the range fully reflects the Core Target Group needs in terms of the complete offer. - Full responsibility in the development and implementation of Private Brand Strategy within the Category. - Ensure that the Pricing Strategy is fully in place and understood by Suppliers. - Design and implement with Merchandising Plano grams delivering right space allocation and achieve the best productivity of each gondola. - Achievement of Commercial Key Performance Indicator - Identify with Supply Chain the most effective/cost efficient means of delivering product to the store. Follow the designated Import process. - Re-assess article performance on a regular basis to identify and deal with any old stock. - Proactively evaluate and act on results of promotional activity to implement any key learning's. - Maintain effective internal communications channel particularly with other Merchandise team, operations, sales & marketing, logistic and other functions within the organization - Provide all necessary information and documentation is passed to supporting staff, ensuring all necessary Admin is completed in a timely and fashion manner. 3. Support for Operation & New store Opening: - Ensure clear communication and understanding to Operations of any action taken that impact on the Customer or Stores. - Support for New store Opening 4. Other duties: - Other tasks assigned by NBD Manager - This job description will be reviewed yearly to adapt with business' demand
Job Requirements: - Bachelor/College degree in Economic, business administration or equivalent qualifications - 2-4-years experience in retail - Customer-focused - Show the passion of the merchandise career - Good communication and negotiation skills - Strong analytical ability and good in data/ figures - Abilities to use computer, office programs and database
Industry: Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ , Thu mua / Vật tư , Ngành khác

Company: Công Ty Tnhh Mtv Healthpost
Job Description: Job Purpose: - The Operation Manager will be responsible for the overall operation, including Supply chain management, Vendor management, Stakeholder management, and Customer service (Rescue) operations to organize and deliver the goods to our customers - The Operation Manager must demonstrate strong attention to detail to oversee daily operations such as 3PLs performance through vendor management, inventory monitoring, coordinating with the Product team to replenish products, and coordinating with other stakeholders to improve the delivery rate - In addition to having excellent organizational skills, she/he must possess in-depth knowledge of logistics and inventory control - The Operation Manager will work with several 3PLs and stakeholders to ensure their performance and collaboration meet company expectations and can deliver all the reports related to business processes daily Job Description: - Coordinating with 3PL vendors to ensure the distribution process starting from the production process until goods delivered to our customer succeeded on time - Collaborating with other departments to create coordinated plans for business growth that are reflected in the Delivery rate - Coordinating with the Sales and BD team to see DR progress from the pub, agents, and product performance level - Checking the DR process and progress to ensure everything is still on the right track to achieve the DR target - Ensuring the productivity and performance of the CS team (Rescue & Inbound) to generate the Delivery rate from the process - Creating a roadmap for tools and technology needed to ensure improvement in terms of operation through accurate reports - Leveraging data to drive continuous improvement in areas such as productivity, quality, and SLA - Coordinating with the Regional Product team to ensure the availability of stock - Keeping track of quality, quantity, stock levels, delivery times, transport costs and efficiency - Conducting meetings with the Management team and evaluating operation performance, pointing out the issues that need to be fixed - Review current processes and improve them to develop the team's performance (if necessary) - Working time: Monday - Friday, 9 AM - 6 PM - Working place: District 1, Ho Chi Minh City Benefit: - Paid 100% salary in 02 probation months - Paid nearly full salary for social insurance - Take a premium health insurance after the probation - Review for increasing salary once or twice for outstanding yearly - Give bonus on KPIs in year end - Take part in team building and health check – up once yearly
Job Requirements: Requirement: - Education: Graduate from University at least (Bachelor's Degree) - Major: All major - Experience: + At least 5 years of relevant working experience in the equivalent position + More than 3 years of experience in vendor management - Specialized knowledge: + Rich understanding of ERP and distribution/order to cash scheme + Highly goal and result-oriented + Excellent organizational and project management skills + Fluent in English, both verbal and written + Data-oriented and strong attention to detail + Comfortable using Excel and another tool to do manual data processing + Experience leading by influence and success in being a driver of change in an organization + Ability to discuss and reach an agreement in a professional manner + Ability to manage and analyze a situation and develop a professional solution for the organization - Skills required: + Fluent in English (written and verbal) + Strong at data processing, interpretation, and reporting + Rich knowledge in Logistics and Supply chain and have an experience in the logistics industry for more than 3 years + Strong at people management + Coming from the telesales and e-commerce industry is a plus
Industry: Vận chuyển / Giao nhận / Kho vận , Xuất nhập khẩu , Thu mua / Vật tư

Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Công Nghệ Sen Đỏ
Job Description: - Oversee and optimize online sales performance on the Sendo Farm app, ensuring a seamless and engaging shopping experience. - Collaborate with the purchasing team to curate an attractive product assortment, maintain competitive pricing, and develop effective promotional campaigns. - Develop and execute data-driven sales strategies based on customer shopping behavior and market trends. - Track and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) such as conversion rates, order volume, and customer engagement to identify growth opportunities. - Work closely with Marketing, Operations, and Tech Teams to enhance the in-app user experience and maximize customer reach. - Utilize sales data insights to optimize product offerings, pricing strategies, and promotional initiatives
Job Requirements: - Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, E-commerce, Economics, or a related field. - 5 years of experience in retail or e-commerce, preferably within supermarket chains, convenience stores, or online grocery platforms with app-based ordering systems. - Strong expertise in e-commerce operations, product assortment management, and online sales growth strategies. - Highly analytical, with a data-driven mindset and the ability to derive actionable insights from sales performance metrics. - Excellent collaboration and communication skills, with the ability to work cross-functionally across multiple departments. - Experience in the retail industry is highly preferred. Competitive salary & benefits - 13th - month salary and performance bonus (based on KPI) - Salary Review and promotion - Insurance For Yourself - Annual Health Check - 20 days of annual leave - Company trips and team buildings - Gathering Activities on special occasions - Other
Industry: Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Tiếp thị trực tuyến , Thực phẩm & Đồ uống

Company: Công Ty Tnhh Hoa Viên Bình An
Job Description: - Tìm kiếm, tiếp cận và tư vấn cho khách hàng tiềm năng dựa trên mạng lưới truyền thông rộng khắp của công ty. - Phát triển data khách hàng, tạo mối quan hệ với khách hàng để tạo ra doanh số: Thiết lập, xây dựng mối quan hệ với Cộng tác viên (cá nhân, tổ chức…) để mở rộng data khách hàng. - Chủ động đưa ra các sáng kiến về các kênh tiếp cận nguồn khách hàng mới. - Thực hiện các công việc, nhiệm vụ khác do cấp trên giao phó.
Job Requirements: Kinh nghiệm: Ưu tiên đã có ít nhất 02 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực bất động sản, mỹ phẩm/thời trang cao cấp, chăm sóc sắc đẹp, hàng tiêu dùng cao cấp... Nam/Nữ tuổi từ 25-45 tuổi; trung thực, nhanh nhẹn. Ưu tiên: Ngoại hình ưa nhìn là 1 lợi thế. Yêu cầu thành thạo vi tính văn phòng. Hoa hồng: tối thiểu 40 triệu/tháng. Được đào tạo bài bản bởi các chuyên gia hàng đầu trong lĩnh vực Công viên nghĩa Trang. Được tạo điều kiện tiếp cận data KH từ các sự kiện, các kênh truyền thông do Chủ Đầu tư thực hiện. Được hưởng các chế độ phụ cấp, đãi ngộ, thưởng: Lễ, Tết, Hiếu, Hỷ... Di chuyển bằng ô tô khi đưa khách đi tham quan dự án. Được làm việc trong một môi trường chuyên nghiệp, có cơ hội thăng tiến cao. Được hưởng các chế độ: lương tháng 13, BHXH, BHYT, BHTN,... Số lượng: 20 nhân sự.
Industry: Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Bất động sản

Job Description: - Support data gathering and provide review and analysis of data. - Collaborate with marketing and e-commerce teams to design and build automated solutions for business intelligence and reporting dashboards. - Provide key business insights based on emerging data trends.
Job Requirements: - Fresh Graduates preferably in those fields (Econometrics, Finance, Economics, Engineering, Mathematics, Applied Sciences, Statistics or job-related discipline or equivalent experience) - Course work and/or experience related to SQL, Python/R, Programming basics. - Course work or experience in mathematics and statistics. - Natural curiosity and flexibility in problem solving. - Ability to generate insights from information. - Excellent communication and problem-solving skills - Ability to work independently multi-tasking in a deadline-driven environment. - Very good at Reading in English

Company: Vietnamese-German University (Vgu)
Job Description: The Head of the Human Resources (HR) Department is responsible for developing and implementing HR strategies, policies, and programs that support the university’s mission, vision, and strategic goals. This role ensures the effective management of human capital, fosters a positive work environment while maintaining compliance with Vietnamese labor laws and international HR best practices. A. Daily responsibilities 1. HR Strategy and Policy Development Develop and execute HR strategies aligned with VGU’s mission and strategic plan. Establish and update HR policies, procedures, and guidelines to comply with Vietnamese labor laws and international standards. Advise university leadership on HR best practices, workforce planning, and talent management. 2. HR planning, talent acquisition and recruitment Lead recruitment, selection, and onboarding processes to attract and retain top talent for academic and administrative staff. Develop HR planning initiatives to support university growth and expansion. Oversee the implementation of fair and effective hiring procedures in compliance with local labor laws and international recruitment standards. 3. Employee relations and performance management Develop and implement performance management systems, including templates for setting KPIs and staff evaluations. Foster a positive institution culture through employee engagement, training, and professional development programs. Handle employee relations matters, grievance procedures, and conflict resolution in accordance with labor laws and university policies. 4. Compensation, benefits, and payroll Administration Design and oversee implementation salary structures, benefits programs, and incentive schemes to ensure competitive compensation packages. Ensure accurate and timely payroll processing in compliance with tax regulations and labor laws. Manage social insurance, health insurance, and other statutory employee benefits. Continue to develop the University’s reward strategy and supporting systems Plan and monitor the HR budget and organizational development. Development, implementation and administration of performance management, compensation and benefits, and improvement policies and systems. 5. Training and Development Prepare and provide training schemes to help new member integrate with organization’s culture, operation & expectation. Develop and oversee training programs to enhance employee skills and career development. Implement leadership and succession planning initiatives to build internal talent pipelines. Organize workshops and HR-related training sessions for faculty and staff. 6. Compliance & Disciplines: Safeguarding the compliance of all HR-policies and procedures with the labour law and external and internal regulations Ensure all employment terms and conditions are aligned with the University’s provision and governmental legislations. Deal with governmental authorities on functional HR related issues. Advise the management and employees on updated labour law and legal regulations. Develop and maintain excellent management information and HR systems support for the University. Provide advice and case management support in areas of grievance and discipline (usually at the appeal stage to supplement and support operational HR departments). Develop modern HR policies in response to the University’s strategic objectives and legal compliance requirements. Ensure that decisions on HR matters are made in accordance with good employment practices, HR policies and procedures, legislative requirements. 7. Legal affairs Provide legal advice on revision-related issues in all affairs to VGU, Board of President. Prepare comments for draft legal documents sent by agencies, units for comments or for suggesting relevant competent authorities to revise, supplement or issue a legal document; Draft up contracts and other legal documents. Contribute ideas regarding legal aspects for documents drafted by VGU’s departments/units before submitting to Presidential Board. Provide instruction on document formulation according to regulations. Assign staff to draft documents, official letters of VGU to send to authorities as assigned. Draft, revise contracts, agreement between VGU and parties as requested. Draft, review internal regulations of VGU in compliance with laws, regulations. Propose and improve forms, templates of official letters in accordance with Vietnamese legal procedure. Provide legal support to all departments 8. Organizational development and change management Develop and revise the university governance and organizational structure Lead HR initiatives in organizational change management, ensuring smooth transitions during restructuring or policy changes. Foster a collaborative and inclusive work environment that aligns with VGU’s values and international academic culture. Promote diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives within the university. 9. HR technology and data management ·Oversee HR information systems (HRIS) and digital transformation initiatives to enhance HR operations. Utilize HR analytics and reporting tools for data-driven decision-making and workforce planning. B. Periodic/ Irregular responsibilities Analyse statistics, collate reports from other departments and to report on a periodic basic or ad hoc by the Presidential Board Develop relevant HR content and ensure regular updating of the website, Attendance at local, national and international recruitment events and workshops to promote VGU giving talks and presentations as required. C. Other duties Administration such as Health Check, Staff Outing, teachers’ day, Event Holding. Cooperate with Procurement and Finance in purchasing: Health Insurance Package, Training courses Special projects with iHRP system
Job Requirements: 1. Qualification: At least master’s degree in Human Resources Management, Business Administration, Organizational Development, or a related field. 2. Experiences: Minimum of 10 years of HR experience, with at least 5 years in a leadership role. Strong knowledge of Vietnamese labor laws and international HR best practices. Experience in an academic or international organization is preferred. Proven ability to develop HR strategies, manage HR operations, and lead teams effectively. 3. Knowledge: Have in – depth knowledge and skills in administration especially Human Resources Knowledge and understanding of current issues in the higher education sector Knowledge of widening participation and access agendas in higher education Knowledge of legal issues regarding labor relations in Vietnam. 4. S kills Strong leadership, problem-solving, and decision-making capabilities. Fluent in both oral and written English, fluently use English in discussions/meetings and prepare English report Knowing German is an advantage Excellent in office softwares (Word, Excel, PPT,…) Excellent communication skills Excellent written and presentation skills Excellent listening skills Strong negotiation skills Experience of public speaking Excellent interpersonal and communication skills and ability to work collaboratively Ability to understand and analyse data and produce coherent reports to present to senior management Ability to work on own initiative and to deadlines Ability to work as part of a team Ability to present in formation to groups as well as individuals Strong problem resolution skills Strong managerial and leadership abilities Excellent organisational skills 5. Required Competency Highly responsible Open, willing to collaborate Innovative and dynamic Capacity to work under pressure to tight deadlines Willingness “to work in non regular working hours (evening or weekend) in urgent cases and on demand by PB”
Industry: Giáo dục / Đào tạo , Nhân sự , Quản lý điều hành

Company: Sps Vietnam
Job Description: A. Principal duties: As an IT auditor, you will be responsible for running several audits of an organization’s technologies and processes, run an information security (IS) audit to evaluate the organization’s security processes and risk. B. Responsibilities: 1. System maintenance and ISO 27001 certification: Document control. Define and improve system processes/policies. Ensure compliance with standards. Measure system performance. 2. Make an assessment: Conduct audits, i.e. process audits, product audits, system audits, etc. Report on audit results. 3. ISO Coordinator: Working with ISO9001 and 14001 support for document management. Document management quality management system/ Environmental management system.
Job Requirements: *** Education : Bachelor's degree in related fields. *** Technical skills and experience: Knowledge in IT Service management and ISO 27001. *** Soft skill: Good at verbal and writing skills in English and Vietnamese. Documentation skill. *** Experience: 1- 3 years. Company: Coca-Cola Beverages Vietnam
Job Description: Job Summary Develop and execute the EOSH plan for CCBVL at specified region to ensure, the operation safely and compliance to KORE and all requirements of local Authorities. Key Responsibilities 1.Strategy formulated and managed through continuous improvement initiatives - Develop the EOSH strategy, EOSH inspection daily, weekly, monthly for Plant, Warehouse and market - Implement applicable continuous improvement programs i.e. SOE, TPM, etc. - Identify benchmarks and best practices. - Set goals and targets for improvement. - Ensure sustainability of all initiatives. - Develop the contractor management system that based on the KORE and local requirements - Develop the activity plan (Kaizen, near miss, etc) to support for EOSH improvement 2.Manage & Execute the EOSH - Report and analysis all EOSH requirements, internal, external and authorities - Contractor management - Develop the plan and execute ISO management system: ISO 14001; OHSA 18001 - Identify hazards and risk assessment all works and jobs within Plant, Warehouse such as: LOTO, machine - Develop, Execute and control all wastes (solide wastes, hazardous wastes and waste water treatment plant) - Investigate, report all accidents, incidents (if any) - Coordinator with all employees, contractors, departments resolve problems (if any) 3.Manage the compliance: - Build the awareness and ensure the understanding of EOSH processes/requirements to all departments, employees, contractors, third parties and ensure all compliances - Ensure the compliances with local and KORE requirement of EOSH for South region, including plant, warehouse, distribution and sales - Ensure all EOSH reports are well prepared and send to local Authorities and BIG as required and on time - Develop and close all CAP from internal, external audits timely 4.Training and Development: - EOSH training for all contractors, third parties and employees - Coaching and developing staffs 5.Manage EOSH KPIs & cost: - Manage the COE of EOSH - Control, analysis and action plan for improving EUR, WUR, etc weekly and monthly
Job Requirements: - University/Bachelor’s Degree - Minimum qualification plus some business qualification in a technical field preferably in Environmental Engineering, Occupational Safety and Health, Chemistry, Engineering, or related field. - Minimum 5 years of relevant EOSH experience working for plant including ISO 14001 and OSHAS 18001 - Networking, Influencing and Communication Skills - Leadership - People Management - Apply new methods, new technologies for beverage production/ distribution, etc. - Thinking, coaching, teaching, giving the best practice of EOSH culture of CCBVL - Best ideas improving EOSH systems, etc. ***Please note that by submitting an application to us, you consent to our processing of personal data about you that is provided by you and otherwise lawfully collected by us (which may include sensitive data) for our company's recruitment purpose. Company: Hr Vietnam’S Ess Client
Job Description: Developing and implementing HR strategy. (recruitment, training, and performance evaluation) Managing the recruitment process and onboarding proces. Employee lifecycle and Off boarding. Training and development of human resources and Performance management and performance review(employee evaluation). Employee Relations - Resolving human resources issues and Managing administrative and human resources activities. Managing compensation and benefits and supporting in-house training. Employee Health & Wellbeing Response to external agency official documents. Legal support, insurance management. Employment Law - Policy writing/guidance etc. HR Admin - Management of major internal(in-house) events and schedules. HR Admin - Managing asset inspections and office supplies.
Job Requirements: Bachelor's degree or above in business administration, sociology, law or a related field. 10+ years of experience of HR (Manufacturing industry preferred). At least 5years experience at HR advisor or Manager level . Business-level (Fluent) English and Vietnamese Communication & Interpersonal Skills Business Acumen (Strategic thinking,Data analysis and interpretation and Knowledge of labor laws) Ability to lead and mentor a team of HR and Administration. HR Expertise (Recruitment, Onboarding, Performance, Compensation) Technological Skills (Microfost office, Data management, HR software)
